hātha bajra aru dhvajā birājai । kām̐dhe mum̐ja janeu sājai ॥
saṅkara suvana kesarinaṅdana । teja pratāpa mahā jaga baṅdana ॥
vidyāvāna guni ati chātura । rāma kāja karibe ko ātura ॥
prabhu charitra sunibe ko rasiyā । rāma lakhana sitā mana basiyā ॥
sukṣma rupa dhari siyahi dikhāvā । bikaṭa rupa dhari laṅka jalāvā ॥
bhima rupa dhari asura sam̐hāre । rāmachaṅdra ke kāja sam̐vāre ॥
lāya sajivana lakhana jiyāye । shri raghubira haraṣi ura lāye ॥
raghupati kinhi bahuta baḍāi । tuma mama priya bharata sama bhāi ॥
sahastra badana tumhāro jasa gāvaiṅ । asa kahi shripati kaṅṭha lagāvaiṅ ॥
sanakādika brahmādi munisā । nārada shārada sahita ahisā ॥
jama kubera digapāla jahām̐ te । kabi kobida kahi sake kahām̐ te ॥
tuma upakāra sugrivahi kinhā । rāma milāya rāja pada dinhā ॥
tumhāro maṅtra bibhiṣana mānā । laṅkeshvara bhae saba jaga jānā ॥
juga sahastra jojana para bhānu । lilyo tāhi madhura phala jānu ॥
prabhu mudrikā meli mukha māhiṅ । jaladhi lām̐ghi gaye acharaja nāhiṅ ॥
durgama kāja jagata ke jete । sugama anugraha tumhare tete ॥
rāma duāre tuma rakhavāre । hota na ājñā binu paisāre ॥
saba sukha lahai tumhāri sharanā । tuma rakṣaka kāhu ko ḍara nā ॥
āpana teja samhāro āpai । tinoṅ loka hām̐ka teṅ kām̐pai ॥
bhuta pishācha nikaṭa nahiṅ āvai । mahābira jaba nāma sunāvai ॥
nāsai roga harai saba pirā । japata niraṅtara hanumata birā ॥
saṅkaṭa se hanumāna ch̄uḍāvai । mana krama bachana dhyāna jo lāvai ॥
saba para rāma tapasvi rājā । tina ke kāja sakala tuma sājā ॥
aura manoratha jo koi lāvai । soi amita jivana phala pāvai ॥
chāroṅ juga paratāpa tumhārā । hai parasiddha jagata ujiyārā ॥
sādhu saṅta ke tuma rakhavāre । asura nikaṅdana rāma dulāre ॥
aṣṭa siddhi nau nidhi ke dātā । asa bara dina jānaki mātā ॥
rāma rasāyana tumhare pāsā । sadā raho raghupati ke dāsā ॥
tumhare bhajana rāma ko pāvai । janama janama ke duḥkha bisarāvai ॥
aṅta kāla raghubara pura jāi । jahām̐ janma hari-bhakta kahāi ॥
aura devatā chitta na dharai । hanumata sei sarva sukha karai ॥
saṅkaṭa kaṭai miṭai saba pirā । jo sumirai hanumata balabirā ॥
jai jai jai hanumāna gosāi । kr̥pā karo guru deva ki nāi ॥
jo sata bāra pāṭha kara koi । ch̄uṭahi baṅdi mahā sukha hoi ॥
jo yaha paḍhai hanumāna chālisā । hoya siddhi sākhi gaurisā ॥
tulasidāsa sadā hari cherā । kijai nātha hr̥daya mam̐ha ḍerā ॥
(dohā)
pavanatanaya saṅkaṭa harana, maṅgala murati rupa ॥
rāma lakhana sitā sahita, hr̥daya basahuṅ sura bhupa ॥
shri hanumānaji utsava
jayanāda
siyāvara rāmachaṅdraki jaya, pavanasuta hanumānaki jaya
umāpati mahādevaki jaya, bolobhāi saba saṅtanaki jaya
hanumaṅta maṅtra
oṅ namo hanumaṅte bhaya bhaṅjanāya sukhaṅ kuru phaṭ svāhā ॥ (5)
shri kaṣṭabhaṅjana deva ki jaya ॥
shri pavanasuta hanumāna ki jaya ॥
shri rāmachaṅdra bhagavāna ki jaya ॥
shri svāminārāyaṉa bhagavāna ki jaya ॥

title: maṅgala murati māruti naṅdana, sakala amaṅgala mula nikaṅdana ॥
content:
135. rāga : rāmāyaṉani chopāi
maṅgala murati māruti naṅdana, sakala amaṅgala mula nikaṅdana ॥
pavana tanaya saṅtana hitakāri, hr̥daya birājata avadha bihāri ॥ maṅgala
māta-pitā guru gaṉapati nārada, shivā sameta shaṅbhu shuka shādara ॥ maṅgala
charaṉa-kamala bandu saba kāhu, deha rāmapada nehu nibāṭhahu ॥ maṅgala
jayajaya jaya hanumāna gusāi, kripā karo gurudeva ki nāi ॥ maṅgala
bandau rāma lakhana baidahi, jo tulasi ke parama sanehi ॥ maṅgala

title: ḍhāḏa : āja māruṅ bhāgya alaukika sajani...
content:
136. rāga : garabi pada-1
ḍhāḏa : āja māruṅ bhāgya alaukika sajani...
sarve jaya bolo hanumaṅtani, duḥkha bhaṅjana re moṭā haridāsa.. jaya..1
shuravira ne saṅta shiromaṉi, prite ubhā re prabhuji ne re pāsa.. jaya..2
jeṉe suraja pakaḍyo janamatāṅ, māri rāhu ne re manavi jeṉe hāra.. jaya..3
kapi kesari kuṅvara koḍāmaṉo, enā nāve re parākrama kero pāra.. jaya..4
vanamāṅ āvi maḏyā raghuvira ne, kidho udyama re sitā lāvavā kāja.. jaya..5
vāli māryo te vātani vātamāṅ, devarāvyuṅ re sugrivane rāja.. jaya..6
dhanya dhanya te aṅjani mātane, suta jāyo re sarve vidhi sujāṉa.. jaya..7
brahmānaṅda kahe eni vāratā, nitya gāve re koi veda purāṉa.. jaya..8

title: prite hanumaṅta devane pujie, sāri peṭhe re lai tela siṅdura.. hanuṅ..1
content:
137. pada-2
prite hanumaṅta devane pujie, sāri peṭhe re lai tela siṅdura.. hanuṅ..1
duḥkha dāyaka daitya vidāriyā, sādhu jananā re baṅdhu ati sura.. hanuṅ..2
tapa kidhuṅ bahuṅ mātā aṅjani, tyāre āpyuṅ re shivaji varadāna.. hanuṅ..3
avatariyā te rudra agiyāra mā, hāthāḏā re baḏiyā hanumāna.. hanuṅ..4
shodha levā gayā jyāre sitāni, tyāre veṭhyā re kaṣṭa apāra.. hanuṅ..5
sarva valakhā thayā bijā vāṅnarā, āpyo sahune re pote ādhāra.. hanuṅ..6
jyāre udadhini upara uḍiyā, tyāre poruṣya re tanamāṅ nahi māya.. hanuṅ..7
brahmānaṅda kahe kapirājano, kāṅi mahimā re varṉavyo na jāya.. hanuṅ..8

title: eni dhanya dhanya mātā aṅjani, dhanya dhanya re kāṅi kesari tāta.. dhanya..1
content:
138. pada-3
eni dhanya dhanya mātā aṅjani, dhanya dhanya re kāṅi kesari tāta.. dhanya..1
daitya māravā kapinā vaṅshamāṅ, pote pragaṭyā re shaṅkara sākṣāta.. dhanya..2
sakhā thaine kapi sugrivanuṅ, kāṅi kidhuṅ re ati uttama kāja.. dhanya..3
jai sitāni shodha lāviyā, rāji kidhā re suṅdara shri rāma.. dhanya...4
eka palakamāṅ siṅdhu ullaṅdhiyo, mahāyoddhāmāṅ re yoddho hanumaṅta.. dhanya..5
chālyā shodha levā sitātaṉi, jaya bolo re sidhdhi chāraṉa saṅga.. dhanya..6
samudra kudi paḍyo pāra laṅkāmāṅ, jai kidho re kuḏa daityano nāsha.. dhanya..7
brahmānaṅda kahe mahāvirano, tana lāgyo re dashaskaṅdha ne trāsa.. dhanya..8

title: gāie suṅdara guṉa kapirājanā, vāyunaṅdana re baḏiyo mahāvira.. suṅdara..1
content:
139. pada-4
gāie suṅdara guṉa kapirājanā, vāyunaṅdana re baḏiyo mahāvira.. suṅdara..1
nija bhakta ayodhyā nāthanā, urdhvaretā re aṅtara mahāvira.. suṅdara..2
kṣaṉa māṅhi prajāḏi laṅkāne, kuḏa daityanuṅ re ati kidhuṅ herāna.. suṅdara..3
didhi vadhāi shri rāmani, didhuṅ sitāne re jivana keruṅ dāna.. suṅdara..4
sitā ājñā thaki phaḏa khādhalāṅ, ukhāḍyo re rāvaṉa kero bāga.. suṅdara..5
su akṣaya kuṅvara ādi asura ne, māri ne re raṉamāṅ kidho yāga.. suṅdara..6
māri rāvaṉa lāvyā sitāne, thayo jagamāṅ re ati jayajayakāra.. suṅdara..7
brahmānaṅda kahe hanumaṅtane, riʝi raghupati re maḏyā vāraṅvāra.. suṅdara..8

title: ḍhāḏa : jaḏa kamaḏa ch̄āṅḍi jāne bāḏā...
content:
140. rāga : māligāḍo pada-1
ḍhāḏa : jaḏa kamaḏa ch̄āṅḍi jāne bāḏā...
utsava āja pavanasutako shubha, gāie kari ati pyāra ho
paṅcha shabda vājiṅtra vajāḍo, gāvo maṅgaḏa ucchāra ho. utsava. 1
āso māsa aṅdhāri chaudasha, pujie pavanakumāra ho
āpe sukha saṅpatta manavāṅch̄ita, kāpe kaṣṭa hajāra ho. utsava. ra
tela siṅdura subhaga tana charachie, paherāvo ura hāra ho
kari pakavāna jamāḍo pavanasuta, karashe jejekāra ho. utsava. 3
dhupa dipa kari subhaga ārati, māgiye vāramavāra ho
premānaṅda kahe rāmaduta āpo, prabhupada prita apāra ho. utsava. 4

title: kesarikuṅvara kr̥pāno sāgara, nāgara chatura sujāṉa ho
content:
141. pada-ra
kesarikuṅvara kr̥pāno sāgara, nāgara chatura sujāṉa ho
āgama nigamamāṅ kushaḏa mahābaḏa, bole vachana pramāṉa ho. kesari. 1
shri raghunāthanā maṅtrimāṅ moṭā, nitipraviṉa gaṅbhira ho
mahānaiṣṭhika mana vachana karma kari, dharmadhira mahāvira ho. kesari. ra
shrirāmapakṣa dr̥ḍha rāmaduta vara, ekāṅtika rāmadāsa ho
pujya pratiṣṭhita chauda lokamāṅ, rāmacharaṉa nivāsa ho. kesari. 3
vajratanu shatrumadamaṅjana, suphaḏa shastra jaya kāri ho
shuravira mahā subhaṭa juddhamāṅ, premānaṅda balihāri ho. kesari. 4

title: aṅjaniputra mahābaḏavaṅtā, tribhuvanamāṅ vikhyāta ho
content:
142. pada-3
aṅjaniputra mahābaḏavaṅtā, tribhuvanamāṅ vikhyāta ho
vinatāsuta sama vega parākrama, kahi nava jāye vāta ho. aṅjani. 1
sitā shodha same mahāsiṅdhu, ṭheki gayā tatkāḏa ho
bāḏi jāi rāvaṉani laṅkā, māryā dānava vikarāḏa ho. aṅjani. 2
vāgi sāṅga lakṣmaṉajine raṉamāṅ, murach̄ā āvi gai bhāri ho
saṅjivani muḏa sāru lāvyā, droṉāchaḏa shira dhāri ho. aṅjani. 3
shokasiṅdhumeṅ bharata buḍi rahyā, kapie āvi chiṅtā nivāri ho
āvyā rāma rāvaṉane māri, premānaṅda sukhakāri ho. aṅjani. 4

title: shri hanumānani hāṅka suṉine, nāse ashubha bhayakāri ho
content:
143. pada-4
shri hanumānani hāṅka suṉine, nāse ashubha bhayakāri ho
ghora pishācha bhuta brahmarākṣasa, kr̥tyā ādika bhāri ho. shri ha. 1
vira vetāḏa chuḍela ne ḍākaṉa, graha ādika je ghora ho
hanumāna evuṅ nāma saṅbhāratāṅ, nāse te pāḍi bakora ho. shri ha. ra
āpe putra vitta sukha vāṅch̄ita, jape je maṅtrano jāpa ho
kāpe roga ne duḥkha daridratā, aneka janamanāṅ pāpa ho. shri ha. 3
dharmavaṅshi je naranāri sahu, pujie ati shuddha bhāve ho
dharmakuḏanā pujya deva ch̄e, premānaṅda prite gāve ho. shri ha. 4

title: namo gaṉeshadeva, namo hanumaṅtā; ...namo gaṉesha...
content:
144. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
namo gaṉeshadeva, namo hanumaṅtā; ...namo gaṉesha...
e be yodhdhāmāṅ, koṉa baḏavaṅtā ?...namo gaṉesha...
gaṉapatiji kahe ch̄e māre, gulābanā goṭā; ...namo gaṉesha...
hanumānaji kahe ch̄e māre, āṅkaḍāni māḏā...namo gaṉesha...
gaṉatiji kahe ch̄e māre, lachapachatā lāḍu; ...namo gaṉesha...
hanumānaji kahe ch̄e mane, tela chaḍe tājuṅ...namo gaṉesha...
gaṉapatiji kahe ch̄e meṅ to, suryaratha vāḏyo; ...namo gaṉesha...
hanumānaji kahe ch̄e meṅ to, laṅkā gaḍha bāḏyo...namo gaṉesha...
shri gaṉapatiji utsava
gaṉesha chaturthi : bhādaravā suda-4
dohā
laṅbodara gajavadana shubha, sadā te bāḏasvarupa
sarve pahelā pujie, gauriputra anupa. 1
eka daṅta trilochana, chaturbāhu shashibhāla
vighanarāja varadāyaka, gaṉapati gauribāla. ra

title: jaya gaṉapati pyārā, jaya gaṉapati pyārā
content:
145. shri gaṉapatijini ārati
jaya gaṉapati pyārā, jaya gaṉapati pyārā
vighnavināyaka murti, sukhadāyaka sārā. jaya 1
jaya jaya shaṅbhukumāra, shoka sadā haratā
deva visheṣa vichakṣaṉa, rakṣaṉanāṅ kartāṅ. jaya 2
gauri putra gaṉesha, vaṅdu kara joḍi
smaraṉa kare ch̄e tenā, duḥkha nākho toḍi. jaya 3
lachapachatā lāḍunuṅ, bhojana bahu bhāve
āpa birojo ch̄o tyāṅ, saṅkaṭa nava āve. jaya 4
siddhi buddhi beu, shubha patni saṅge
shubha kāme vicharo ch̄o, atishaya uch̄araṅge . jaya 5
suranara munivara sarva, seve ch̄e tamane
maṅgaḏakāri murti, āpo sukha amane. jaya 6
jaya saṅkaṭa hara sukhakara, araji ura dharajo
sharaṉāgata sevakano, abhyudaya karajo. jaya 7

title: ḍhāḏa : shri vāsudeva vimalāmr̥ta...
content:
146. shri gaṉapatistotraṁ
ḍhāḏa : shri vāsudeva vimalāmr̥ta...
vighnesha ! vighnachayakhaṅḍananāmadheya !, shri shaṅkarātmaja ! surādhipavandyapāda !; 0 1
durgā mahāvrataphalākhilamaṅgalātmaṅ !;
vighnaṅ mamāpahara siddhivināyaka ! tvaṁ. 1
satpadmarāgamaṉivarṉasharirakāntiḥ, shri siddhibuddhi paricharchitakuṅkumashriḥ; 0 1
dakṣastane valayitātimanojñashuṉḍo, vighnaṅ mamāpahara 2
pāshāṅkushābjaparashuṅshcha dadhacchaturbhi-rdorbhishcha shoṉakusumasragumāṅgajātaḥ; 0 1
sindurashobhitalalāṭa vidhu prakāsho, vighnaṅ mamāpahara 3
kāryeṣu vighnachayabhitaviraṅchimukhyaiḥ; saṅpujitaḥ suravarairapi modakādyaḥ; 0 1
sarveṣu cha prathamameva sureṣu pujyo, vighnaṅ mamāpahara 4
shighrāṅchanaskhalanachuṅchuravordhvakaṉṭha-,sthulondurudravaṉahāsitadevasaṅghaḥ; 0 1
shurpashrutishcha pr̥thuvartulatuṅgatundo, vighnaṅ mamāpahara 5
yajñopavitapadalaṅbhitanāgarājo, māsādipuṉyaddaddhr̥shikr̥tar̥r̥kṣarājaḥ; 0 1
bhaktābhayaprada ! dayālaya ! vighnarājo, vighnaṅ mamāpahara 6
sadratnasāratatirājitasatkiriṭaḥ;kausuṅbhachāruvasanadvaya urjitashriḥ; 0 1
sarvatra maṅgalakarasmaraṉapratāpo, vighnaṅ mamāpahara 7
devāntakādyasurabhitasurārtihartā, vijñānabodhanavareṉa tamopahartāḥ 0 1
ānaṅditatribhuvanesha ! kumārabandho !, vighnaṅ mamāpahara 8

title: ḍhāḏa : (1) kuṅdanapura vivāha rachyo...
content:
147. rāga : garabi
ḍhāḏa : (1) kuṅdanapura vivāha rachyo...
(2) sakhi haiḍe te harakha na māṅya, āja...
sakhi gaurino putra gaṉesha, gaṉapati gāie re;
jenāṅ darshanathi tatakāḏa, sukhiyāṅ thāie re. gaṉapati 1
bhādaravā sudi chothane re, divase gaṉapati deva
sthāpana kari shubha sthānamāṅ, sāri ritethi karavi seva. gaṉapati 2
puṣpa vividha prakāranāṅ re, phaḏa daḏano nahipāra
dhupa dipa yuta ārati, pujā karavi vividha prakāra. gaṉapati 3
mana vāṅcch̄ita sukha manamāṅ re, āpashe ānaṅda kaṅda
duṅdāḏo duḥkha bhaṅjaṉo, kavi ke avināshānaṅda. gaṉapati 4

title: ḍhāḏa : āja māruṅ bhāgya alaukika sajani...
content:
148. rāga : garabi
ḍhāḏa : āja māruṅ bhāgya alaukika sajani...
gaṉapatine jovā chālo sakhi, gaṉapatine jovā. 1
suṅdara rupa dharyuṅ girijāsuta, tribhuvanane moḫvā. chālo. 1
gaura varaṉa gajavadana trilochana, dekhine duḥkha khovā. chālo. ra
duḥkhabhaṅjana duṅdālā kuṅvarane, charaṉe chitta provā. chālo. 3
premānaṅda kahe pujie prite, vighnane vagovā. chālo. 4
ārati
jaya gaṉesha jaya gaṉesha jaya gaṉesha devā ॥
mātā jāki pārvati pitā mahādevā ॥
ekadanta dayāvanta chāra bhujādhāri ॥
mastaka para sindura sohe muse ki savāri ॥
andhana ko āṅkha deta koḍhina ko kāyā ॥
bāʝana ko putra deta nirdhana ko māyā ॥
pāna chaḍhe phula chaḍhe aura chaḍhe mevā ॥
laḍuana kā bhoga lāge santa kareṅ sevā ॥
dinana ki lāja rākho shambhu-suta vāri ॥
kāmanā ko puri karo jaga balihāri ॥
ai ai
stotra ane aṣṭaka saṅgraha
stotra ane aṣṭaka saṅgraha

title: avatirya nijākṣarātparādiha murtyāṅ badarivanesthitaḥ ॥1॥
content:
149. shri naranārāyaṉadeva aṣṭaka
avatirya nijākṣarātparādiha murtyāṅ badarivanesthitaḥ ॥1॥
bhuvibhārata jivasharmaṉe naranārāyaṉa deva pāhi māṁ ॥1॥
yaduparya bhavatkr̥pātava sa naro dr̥ṣṭu mahārhatikṣaṉaṁ ॥1॥
na paraḥ surasattamo'nyathā naranārāyaṉa ॥2॥
prathitaṅ cha br̥haḋ vrataṅ tvayā janatāyā nijadhāmalabdhaye ॥1॥
avabodhanaṁ uttamaṅ bhuvi naranārāyaṉa ॥3॥
jagato jananaṅ hi pālanaṅ pralayaṅ chāpi karoṣi nityadā ॥1॥
rajasā tamasā cha sattvato naranārāyaṉa ॥4॥
r̥ṣi rupadharaṅ tapashvaraṅ hyavamanyeta kadāpi kashchana ॥
।1॥
sa bhavetsatataṅ cha nāraki naranārāyaṉa ॥5॥
tava murtiriyaṅ sukhāptaye janatāyā; kalitāpa shāntaye ॥
।1॥
maraṉasya jayāya nityadā naranārāyaṉa ॥6॥
jagadanyatanustathāvituṅ dharasi tvaṅ cha yugeyuge'dyavai ॥1॥
harikr̥ṣṉa tanu stvayādhr̥tā naranārāyaṉa ॥7॥
vidhi shaṅbhumukhāmara vrajashcharaṉaute satataṅ samaryati ॥1॥
paramādaratashcha chiṅtati naranārāyaṉa deva pāhi māṁ ॥8॥

title: bhavasaṅbhavabhitibhedanaṅ, sukhasaṅpatkaruṉāniketanaṁ ॥1॥
content:
150. ॥ guru bhajanastotraṁ ॥
bhavasaṅbhavabhitibhedanaṅ, sukhasaṅpatkaruṉāniketanaṁ ॥1॥
vratadānatapaḥkriyāphalaṅ, sahajānandaguruṅ bhaje sadā ॥1॥
karuṉāmayachārulochanaṅ, sharaṉāyātajanārtimochanaṁ ॥1॥
patitoddharaṉāya tatparaṅ, sahajānandaguruṅ bhaje sadā ॥2॥
nijatattvapathāvabodhanaṅ, janatāyāḥ svata eva durgamaṁ ॥1॥
iti chintya gr̥hitavigrahaṅ, sahajānandaguruṅ bhaje sadā ॥3॥
vidhishaṅbhumukhairanigrahaṅ, bhavapāthodhiparibhramākulaṁ ॥1॥
apidhārya mano naraprabhaṅ, sahajānandaguruṅ bhaje sadā ॥4॥
nijapādapayojakirtanaṅ, satataṅ syāḋbhavajivagocharaṁ ॥
।1॥
iti yaḥ kurute kratutsavaṅ, sahajānandaguruṅ bhaje sadā ॥5॥
bahirikṣaṉalokamānuṣaṅ, nijadattāmbakadarshināṅ hariṅ ॥1॥
bhajaniyapadaṅ jagaḋguruṅ, sahajānandaguruṅ bhaje sadā ॥6॥
sharaṉāgatapāpaparvataṅ, gaṉayitvā na tadiyasaḋguṉaṁ ॥1॥
aṉumapyatulaṅ hi manyate, sahajānandaguruṅ bhaje sadā ॥7॥
bhavavāridhimokṣasādhanaṅ, gururājaprakaṭasvasaṅgamaṁ ॥1॥
prakaṭikr̥tavāṅ kr̥pāvashaḥ, sahajānandaguruṅ bhaje sadā ॥8॥
bhagavaṅ kr̥payā tvayā kr̥taṅ, janatāyāmupakāramidr̥shaṁ ॥
।1॥
kṣamate pratikartumatra kaḥ, kurute dinajanastatoṅjaliṁ ॥9॥

title: hara hara gopinātha mama kaṣṭaṁ ॥ hara ॥
content:
151. ॥ ṭhumarirāgeḏa giyate ॥
hara hara gopinātha mama kaṣṭaṁ ॥ hara ॥
suranaramunivara jaladharasuṅdara । māramahāmadamāra ॥ mama ॥
rājivalochana pāpavimochana । durgapurisuvihāra ॥ mama ॥
hāṭakabhuṣaṉa hatajanaduṣaṉa । divyaguṉālayasāra ॥ mama ॥
vr̥ṣakulanāyaka surasukhadāyaka । kundakusumashubhahāra ॥ mama ॥
maṅgalakāraṉa gatijitavāraṉa । premavatisukumāra ॥ mama ॥
mānasamodana ditisutarodana । bhuminivāritabhāra ॥ mama ॥
vishvavibhāvana durmatipāvana । kāladavānalahāra ॥ mama ॥
surakularaṅjana nityaniraṅjana । bhānusutāvitavitanāra ॥ mama ॥
brahmapurāsana janahitashāsana । niṣkāmānandanidhāna ॥ mama ॥

title: sa.ji. : pra.-5, a.-66
content:
152. dhārmika stotraṁ (vasantatilakā vr̥ttama)
sa.ji. : pra.-5, a.-66
shrivāsudeva ! vimalāmr̥ta dhāma vāsaṅ, nārāyaṉaṅ naraka tāraṉa nāmadheyaṁ ॥1॥
shyāmaṅ sitaṅ dvibhujameva chaturbhujaṅ cha, tvāṅ bhakti dharma tanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye ॥1॥
shikṣārthamatra nijabhaktimatāṅ narāṉāmekāntadharmamakhilaṅ parishilayantaṁ॥2॥
aṣṭāṅṅgayogakalānāshva mahāvratāni, tvāṅ bhakti dharma tanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye॥2॥
shvāsena sākamanuloma viloma vr̥ttyā, svāntarbahishva bhagavatyurudhā nijasya॥
।2॥॥
pure gatāgatajalāmbudhinopameyaṅ, tvāṅ bhaktidharmatanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye॥3॥
bāhyāntarindriyagaṉashvasanādhidaiva, vr̥ttyuḋbhavasthitilayānapi jāyamānāṅ॥
।2॥॥
sthitvā tataḥ svamahasā pr̥thagikṣamāṉaṅ, tvāṅ bhaktidharmatanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye॥4॥
māyāmayākr̥ti tamo shubha vāsanānāṅ, kartuṅ niṣedhamurudhā bhagavatsvarupe॥
।2॥॥
nirbijasāṅḍkhyamatayogagayuktibhājaṅ, tvāṅ bhaktidharmatanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye ॥5॥
divyākr̥titvasumahastvasuvāsanānāṅ, samyagvidhiṅ prathayituṅ cha patau ramāyāḥ॥
।2॥॥
sālambasāṅkhyapathayoga suyukti bhājaṅ, tvāṅ bhaktidharmatanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye॥6॥
kāmārtataskaranaṭavyasanidviṣantaḥ, svasvārtha siddhimiva chetasi nityameva॥2॥॥
nārāyaṉaṅ paramayaiva mudā smarantaṅ, tvāṅ bhakti dharma tanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye॥7॥
sādhvichakorashalabhāstimi kālakaṅṭha, kokā nijeṣṭa viṣayeṣu yathaiva lagnāḥ॥2॥॥
murtau tathā bhagavatotra mudātilagnaṅ, tvāṅ bhakti dharma tanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadyai॥8॥
snehāturastvatha bhayātura āmayāvi, yaḋvata kṣudhāturajanashcha vihāya mānaṁ॥2॥॥
dainyaṅ bhajeyuriha satsu tathā charantaṅ, tvāṅ bhakti dharma tanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye॥9॥
dharmasthitairupagatai rbr̥hatā nijaikyaṅ, sevyo hariḥ sitamahaḥ sthita divyamurtiḥ॥
।10॥
shabdādyarāgibhiriti svamataṅ vadantaṅ, tvāṅ bhaktidharmatanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye॥10॥
saḋgranthanityapaṭhanashravaṉādisaktaṅ, brāhmiṅ cha satsadasi shāsatamaṅtra vidyāṁ॥11॥॥
saṅsārajālapatitākhila jiva bandho, tvāṅ bhakti dharma tanayaṅ sharaṉaṅ prapadye ॥11॥

title: adharaṅ madhuraṅ, vadanaṅ madhuraṅ, nayanaṅ madhuraṅ, hasitaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 1 ॥
content:
153. adharaṅ madhuraṅ (madhurāṣṭaka)
adharaṅ madhuraṅ, vadanaṅ madhuraṅ, nayanaṅ madhuraṅ, hasitaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 1 ॥
hr̥dayaṅ madhuraṅ, gamanaṅ madhuraṅ, madhurādhipate rakhilaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 1 ॥
vachanaṅ madhuraṅ, charitaṅ madhuraṅ, vasanaṅ madhuraṅ, valitaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 1 ॥
chalitaṅ madhuraṅ, bhramitaṅ madhuraṅ, madhurādhipaterakhilaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 2 ॥
veṉu madhuro, reṉu madhuro, pāṉi madhuraḥ pādau madhuro ॥ 1 ॥
nr̥tyaṅ madhuraṅ, sakhyaṅ madhuraṅ, madhurādhipaterakhilaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 3 ॥
gitaṅ madhuraṅ, pritaṅ madhuraṅ, bhuktaṅ madhuraṅ suptaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 1 ॥
rupaṅ madhuraṅ, tilakaṅ madhuraṅ, madhurādhipaterakhilaṅ madhurama ॥ 4 ॥
karaṉaṅ madhuraṅ, taraṉaṅ madhuraṅ, haraṉaṅ madhuraṅ ramaṉaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 1 ॥
vamitaṅ madhuraṅ, shamitaṅ madhuraṅ, madhurādhipaterakhilaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 5 ॥
gujjā madhurā, mālā madhurā, yamunā madhurā, vichi rmadhurā ॥
। 1 ॥
salilaṅ madhuraṅ, kamalaṅ madhuraṅ, madhurādhipaterakhilaṅ madhurama ॥ 6 ॥
gopi madhurā, lilā madhurā, yuktaṅ madhuraṅ, muktaṅ madhuraṁ ॥
। 1 ॥
drr̥ṣṭaṅ madhuraṅ, shiṣṭaṅ madhuraṅ, madhurādhipaterakhilaṅ madhuraṁ ॥ 7 ॥
gopā madhurā, gāvo madhurā, yaṣṭi rmadhurā, sr̥ṣṭi rmadhurā ॥ 1 ॥
dalitaṅ madhuraṅ, phalitaṅ madhuraṅ, madhurādhipaterakhilaṅ madhurama ॥ 8 ॥
(shrivallabhāchārya)

title: shri harililāmr̥ta : kaḏasha-1, vishrāma-1
content:
154. ch̄aṅda : pramāṉikāvr̥tta
shri harililāmr̥ta : kaḏasha-1, vishrāma-1
namo mahāmunishvaraṅ ! adhishvarādhiishvaraṁ !
aneka aṅḍakāraṉaṅ ! sudharmadhurvidhāraṉaṁ !
sadā subodha dāyakaṅ ! namo munindranāyakaṁ !
kupātratānikaṅdanaṅ ! bhajāmibhaktinaṅdanaṁ !
adharmatā ucch̄edanaṅ ! bhavābdhibhitibhedanaṁ !
sushāstraritishodhanaṅ ! yathārtha bodha bodhanaṁ !
sumokṣamārgamaṅḍanaṅ ! khalatvapaṅthakhaṅḍanaṁ !
vr̥ttālaye virājitaṅ ! bhajāmi purṉabhrājitaṁ !
subhaktasaṅgha pujitaṅ ! khageshakirtikujitaṁ !
sadāsvadāsapālakaṅ ! bhajāmidharmabālakaṁ !
anaṅtasaṅtaarchitaṅ ! suchaṅdanādicharchitaṁ !
supuṣpahāra shobhitaṅ ! sugaṅdhabhr̥ṅgalobhitaṁ !
shiraḥ kiriṭa dhāriṉaṅ ! namāmi kaṣṭa hāriṉaṁ !
manogirākriyā mudā ! namāmi svāminaṅ sadā !
aho prabhu stuti karuṅ ! su eṭali icch̄ā dharuṅ !
tavāṅghrini smr̥ti rahe ! vihārilālaji kahe !
pilurāgeṉa giyate
mānasa chintaya chārucharitraṁ ॥ mānasa. 1
premavati - vr̥ṣaputraṅ pavitraṁ ॥ mānasa. 1
nutanamudira-dayita-maṅjukāye ॥ mānasa. 1
chandravishada-vasanāni dharantaṁ ॥ mānasa. 1
kesaratilaka-lalita-nijabhāle ॥ mānasa. 1
kuṅkuma - chandraka - dharamabhirāmaṁ ॥ mānasa. 2
bindupariṣkr̥ta-shubhashruti-yugme ॥ mānasa. 1
ratna - sushobhita - kuṅḍaladhāraṁ ॥ mānasa. 3
ambaka-madhupa-lasita-lapanābje ॥ mānasa. 1
kunda - mukulasama - hāsaṅ dadhānaṁ ॥ mānasa. 4
rekhā - virājita - varakambukaṅṭhe ॥ mānasa. 1
puruvidha-puṣpa-kanakamaṉihāraṁ ॥ mānasa. 5
viṣadhara-vigraha-kalpa-karadvaye ॥ mānasa. 1
puṣpa - rachita - valayāṅgadadhāraṁ ॥ mānasa. 6
harimadaharatanu - maṅjula - kaṭyāṁ ॥ mānasa. 1
naṅgakhachita chāmikara-rashanāḍhyaṁ ॥ mānasa. 7
karikara-kadali-karabhasama-sakthiṁ ॥ mānasa. 1
suṣama - suvr̥tta - mukurarupa - jānuṁ ॥ mānasa. 8
nupura - nādita - charaṉamudāraṁ ॥ mānasa. 1
niṣkāmānaṅda - nikhilatāpahāraṁ ॥ mānasa. 9

title: namonamaḥ shri haraye, buddhidāya dayāvate ॥1॥
content:
janamaṅgala stotraṁ
namonamaḥ shri haraye, buddhidāya dayāvate ॥1॥
bhaktidharmāṅgajātāya, bhaktakalpadrumāyacha ॥1॥
sugaṅdhapuṣpahārādyai, rvividhairupahārakaiḥ ॥1॥
saṅpujitāya bhaktaudhaiḥ, sitāmbaradharāya cha ॥2॥
nāmnāmaṣṭottarashataṅ, chaturvargamabhipsitāṁ ॥1॥
sadyaḥ phalapradaṅnr̥ṉāṅ, tasyavakṣyāmisatpateḥ ॥3॥
asya shri janamaṅgalākhyasya, shri haryaṣṭottarashata,
nāmastotramantrasya, shatānandar̥ṣiḥ anuṣṭupach̄aṅdaḥ । dharmanaṅdanaḥ shriharirdevatā । dhārmika
iti bijaṁ । br̥haḋvratadhara iti shaktiḥ। bhaktinandana iti kilakaṁ ॥
chaturvargasiddhayarthe jape viniyogaḥ ॥
॥ atha dhyānaṁ ॥
varṉiveṣaramaṉiyadarshanaṅ, mandahāsaruchirānanāmbujaṁ ॥
।4॥
pujitaṅsuranarottamairmudā, dharmanaṅdanamahaṅ vichintaye ॥4॥
shri kr̥ṣṉaḥ shri vāsudevo, naranārāyaṉaḥ prabhuḥ ॥4॥
bhaktidharmātmajojanmā, kr̥ṣṉo nārāyaṉo hariḥ ॥5॥
harikr̥ṣṉo ghanashyāmo dhārmiko bhaktinandanaḥ ॥4॥
br̥haḋvratadharaḥ shuddho rādhākr̥ṣṉeṣṭadaivataḥ ॥6॥
marutsutapriyaḥ kāli, bhairavādyatibhiṣaṉaḥ ॥4॥
jitendriyo jitāhāra, stivravairāgya āstikaḥ ॥7॥
yogeshvaro yogakalā, pravr̥ttiratidhairyavāṅ ॥4॥
jñāni paramahaṅsashcha, tirthakr̥ttairthikārchitaḥ ॥8॥
kṣamānidhiḥ sadonnidro, dhyānaniṣṭhastapaḥ priyaḥ ॥4॥
siddheshvaraḥ svataṅtrashcha brahmavidyāpravartakaḥ ॥9॥
pāṣaṉḍocch̄edanapaṭuḥ svasvarupāchalasthitiḥ ॥10॥
prashāntamurtirnidoṣo' suragurvādimohanaḥ ॥10॥
atikāruṉyanayana, udhdhavādhvapravartakaḥ ॥10॥
mahāvrataḥ sādhushilaḥ sādhuvipraprapujakaḥ ॥11॥
ahiṅsayajñaprastotā, sākārabrahmavarṉanaḥ ॥
।10॥
svāminārāyaṉaḥ svāmi kāladoṣa nivārakaḥ ॥12॥
sacch̄āstravyasanaḥ sadyaḥ samādhisthitikārakaḥ ॥10॥
kr̥ṣṉārchāsthāpanakaraḥ kauladviṭ kalitārakaḥ ॥13॥
prakāsharupo nirdambhaḥ sarjivahitāvahaḥ ॥
।10॥
bhaktisampoṣako vāgmi, chaturvarga phalapradaḥ ॥14॥
nirmatsaro bhaktavarmā, buddhidātātipāvanaḥ ॥
।10॥
abuddhihr̥ḋbrahmadhāma darshakashchāparājitaḥ ॥15॥
āsamudrāntasatkirtiḥ, shritasaṅsr̥timochanaḥ ॥10॥
udāraḥ sahajānaṅdaḥ, sādhvidharmapravartakaḥ ॥16॥
kandarpadarpadalano, vaiṣṉavakratukārakaḥ ॥
।10॥
paṅchāyatana sanmāno, naiṣṭikavratapoṣakaḥ ॥17॥
pragalbho niḥspr̥ha satya, pratijño bhaktavatsalaḥ ॥10॥
aroṣaṉo dirdhadarshi, ṣaḍurmivijayakṣamaḥ ॥18॥
nirahaṅkr̥tiradrohoḥ r̥juḥ sarvopakārakaḥ ॥10॥
niyāmakashchopashama, sthitirvinayavāṅ guruḥ ॥19॥
ajātavairi nirlobho, mahāpuruṣa ātmadaḥ ॥10॥
akhaṅḍitārṣamaryādo, vyāsasiddhāntabodhakaḥ ॥20॥
manonigrahayuktijño, yamadutavimochakaḥ ॥10॥
purṉakāma satyavādi, guṉagrāhi gatasmayaḥ ॥21॥
sadāchāra priyataraḥ puṉyashravaṉakirtanaḥ ॥10॥
sarvamaṅgalasadrupa, nānāguṉavicheṣṭitaḥ ॥22॥
ityetatparamaṅstotraṅ, janamaṅgalasaṅjñitaṁ ॥10॥
yaḥ paṭhetteṅ paṭhitaṅ bhavedvai sarvamaṅgalaṁ ॥23॥
janamaṅgala stotraṁ
yaḥ paṭhecch̄r̥ṉuyāḋbhakatyā, trikālaṅshrāvayeccha vā ॥10॥
etattasya tu pāpāni nasyeyuḥ kila sarvashaḥ ॥24॥
etatsaṅsevamānānāṅ, puruṣārthachatuṣṭaye ॥10॥
durlabhaṅ nāsti kimapi, harikr̥ṣṉa prasādataḥ ॥25॥
bhutapretapishāchānāṅ, ḍākini brahmarakṣasāṁ ॥10॥
yoginināṅ tathā bāla, grahādināmupadravaḥ ॥26॥
abhichāro ripukr̥to, rogashchānyoḍapyupadravaḥ ॥10॥
ayutāvartanādasya, nashyatyeva na saṅshayaḥ ॥27॥
dashāvr̥tyā pratidina, masyābhiṣṭaṅ sukhaṅbhavet ॥
।10॥
gr̥hibhistyāgibhishchāpi, paṭhaniyamidaṅ tataḥ ॥28॥
iti shri shatānaṅdamuni virachitaṅ, shri janamaṅgalākhyaṅ

title: ekādashi ājano dina sāro re, gāie naṭavara naṅdadulāro ..ekā
ekādashi utsavano dina ruḍo re, koḍe nirakhie ch̄ela kānuḍo..ekā
ekādashi utsavano ch̄e dahāḍo re, khuba ramie te raṅgaakhāḍo ...ekā
ekādashi pragaṭa prabhujine pyāri re, sarve harijanane sukhakāri..ekā
koḍe koḍe ekādashi kijie re, evuṅ vrata jāvā nava dijie re. koḍe 1
content:
159. rāga : garabi pada-1
koḍe koḍe ekādashi kijie re, evuṅ vrata jāvā nava dijie re. koḍe 1
e vrata kare te dhanya mānavi re, te to nāhyo koṭika vāra jāḣnavi re. koḍe 2
jeṉe vachana pramāṉe vrata ādaryuṅ re, teṉe kāraja potānuṅ sarve karyuṅ re. koḍe 3
eno mahimā munivara gāya ch̄e re, avināshi maḏyāṅno upāya ch̄e re. koḍe 4
brahmānaṅda kahe emāṅ hari rahyāṅ vasi re, kidhi uddhava pramāṉe ekādashi re. koḍe 5

title: harijana hoya te harine bhaje re, vrata ekādashi te kadi nava taje re. hari 1
content:
160. pada-2
harijana hoya te harine bhaje re, vrata ekādashi te kadi nava taje re. hari 1
jāṉe māta samāna paranārane re, gaṉe tucch̄a sarikho saṅsārane re. hari 2
madya māṅsa harāma jene nava khape re, jibhe rāta divasa prabhune jape re. hari 3
māyā jiva ishvaranā jāṉe marmane re, raṭe brahma thaine parabrahmane re. hari 4
brahmānaṅdanā vahālāni ch̄abi ura dhare re, matavālo thaine jagamāṅ phare re. hari 5

title: bhale āvi anupama ekādashi re, māre vahāle muja sāmuṅ joyuṅ hasi re. bhale 1
content:
161. pada-3
bhale āvi anupama ekādashi re, māre vahāle muja sāmuṅ joyuṅ hasi re. bhale 1
āja vādhi ānaṅda keri velaḍi re, thai rasiyā saṅgāthe raṅga relaḍi re. bhale 2
laṭakāḏā kuṅvara naṅdalālani re, chittaḍāmāṅ khuṅti ch̄e ch̄abi chālani re. bhale 3
raṅgabhino rame rasa raṅgamāṅ re, ati ānaṅda thayo ch̄e mārāṅ aṅgamāṅ re. bhale 4
priti jāṉi rasilo vachane paḏyā re, brahmānaṅdano vahālo mujane maḏyāṅ re. bhale 5

title: dhanya dhanya ekādashi ājani re, ruḍi nirakhi ch̄abi vrajarājani re. dhanya 1
content:
162. pada-4
dhanya dhanya ekādashi ājani re, ruḍi nirakhi ch̄abi vrajarājani re. dhanya 1
phulaḍānāṅ ch̄ogāṅ te shira para dharyāṅ re, te joine mārāṅ neṉāṅ ṭharyāṅ re. dhanya 2
bhāḏi kesara tilaka ruḍuṅ bhālamāṅ re, māri lagani lāgi ch̄e naṅdalālamāṅ re. dhanya 3
vāṅki bhrukuṭimāṅ mana māruṅ bhame re, have bijuṅ diṭhuṅ te mane nava game re. dhanya 4
brahmānaṅda kahe rupāḏi eni āṅkhaḍi re,pyāri lāla kamaḏa keri pāṅkhaḍi re. dhanya 5

title: utsavani pyāri keshavani, āja ekādashi utsavani; ...āja
content:
163. rāga : garabi pada-1
utsavani pyāri keshavani, āja ekādashi utsavani; ...āja
koṭika gau kerā dāna kare paṉa, nāḫve tole enā lavani...āja .. 1
maṅgaḏa rupa sadā sukhakāri, vahāli nidhi jana vaiṣṉavani...āja .. 2
vachana pramāṉe kare vrata tene, trāsa maṭe re mr̥tyu bhavani...āja .. 3
brahmānaṅda kahe e vrata karavuṅ, ema ājñā svāmi uddhavani...āja .. 4

title: harakha ati bheṭyā kr̥ṣṉapati, āja ekādashi harakha ati; ...āja
content:
164. pada-ra
harakha ati bheṭyā kr̥ṣṉapati, āja ekādashi harakha ati; ...āja
manamohana māre maṅdira āvyāṅ, adhika thai huṅ to puṉyavati...āja .. 1
pitāṅbara ābhuṣaṉa paheri, chālaṅtā vahālo haṅsa gati...āja .. 2
puruṣottama puraṉavara pāmi, rahi nahi khāmi have eka rati...āja .. 3
brahmānaṅda kahe harivara varatāṅ, chauda bhuvanamāṅ huṅ thai re ch̄ati...āja .. 4

title: māva maḏyāṅ traya tāpa ṭaḏyāṅ, āja ekādashi māva maḏyāṅ; ...āja
content:
165. pada-3
māva maḏyāṅ traya tāpa ṭaḏyāṅ, āja ekādashi māva maḏyāṅ; ...āja
purva bhavani prita jāṉine, āvine ama para aḍhaḏa ḍhaḏyāṅ...āja .. 1
munivara dhyāna dhari dhari thākyāṅ, koithi vahālo nava jāya kaḏyāṅ...āja .. 2
māruṅ maṅdiriyuṅ potānuṅ re jāṉi, bhudhara sukhaduḥkha māṅhi bhaḏyāṅ...āja .. 3
brahmānaṅda kahe harivara pāmi, ānaṅda kerā ogha vaḏyāṅ...āja .. 4

title: suphaḏa phaḏi huṅ to harine maḏi, āja ekādashi suphaḏa phaḏi; ...āja
content:
166. pada-4
suphaḏa phaḏi huṅ to harine maḏi, āja ekādashi suphaḏa phaḏi; ...āja
choṅpe kari naṭanāgara sāru, seja saji kāju kusuma kaḏi...āja .. 1
rasabasa hoya rahi rasiyā saṅga, jyuṅ misari payamāṅhi bhaḏi...āja .. 2
nitya nitya prema rahuṅ ura dharati, haricharaṉe mana vr̥tti haḏi...āja .. 3
brahmānaṅda kahe hari ura dhariyāṅ, janmamaraṉa keri shaṅkā ṭaḏi...āja .. 4

title: ḍhāḏa : māri huṅḍi svikāro....
content:
167. rāga : sāmeri pada-1
ḍhāḏa : māri huṅḍi svikāro....
ekādashi thai e vāta, sarve jāṉo re; sarve 2
enā vrata keri ritabhāta, uramāṅ āṉo re. ṭeka
sutā joine shyāmane re, laḍavāni karihāma; sarve 2
nāḍijaṅghano dikaro re, āvyo muradānava enuṅ nāma. sarve 1
indriya ekādasha shyāmanāṅ re, tenuṅ je kāṅi teja; sarve 2
temāṅthi pragaṭi pramadā re, dekhi varavāṅ icch̄ayo eja. sarve 2
te saṅge boli suṅdari re, yuddha kari mune jita; sarve 2
tyāre varuṅ huṅ tujane re, ema kahi dekhāḍi rita. sarve 3
kanyāne saṅga laḍavā re, āvyo e asura; sarve 2
bhumānaṅda kahe khaḍage re, enuṅ shira ch̄edi nākhyuṅ dura. sarve 4

title: pach̄e bolyā suṅdarashyāma, suṅdari saṅge re
content:
168. pada-2
pach̄e bolyā suṅdarashyāma, suṅdari saṅge re
māgo vara āpuṅ ināma, ati umaṅge re. ṭeka suṅdara
māgyo vara mānaniye re, joḍi jivanane hātha
mārā vratane divase re, anna na jame pive pātha. suṅdari 1
indriya agiyāramāṅ upani re, māṭe ekādashi nāma
tapasvi uuṅ te kāraṉe re, māru vrata kare niṣkāma. suṅdari 2
manasahita indriyuṅ re, kahāve je agyāra
mārāvratane divase re, ene karavāṅ na devo āhāra. suṅdari 3
paṅchaviṣayane parahari rahe, taji krodha ne kāma
vrata kare teni upare re, riʝe bhumānaṅdano shyāma. suṅdari 4

title: vrata ekādashine tulya, koi na kahāve re; oya 1
content:
169. pada-3
vrata ekādashine tulya, koi na kahāve re; oya 1
karo koṭika gāyonuṅ dāna, barobara nāve re, ṭeka
ekādashe indriyuṅ re, rākhine niyamamāṅi
pragaṭa prabhu vinā mukhathi re, vr̥thā vāṉi na bole koi. koya 1
aḍasaṭha tiratha karave re, āvuṅ na sare kāja
ekādashine divase re, mune maḏyāṅ pragaṭa mahārāja. koya 2
pyāri kari prabodhani re, vhāle āpyuṅ varadāna
ā vrata kere divase re, karavuṅ kevaḏa jaḏanuṅ pāna. koya 3
harijanane nava mukavi re, ekādashi kahe shyāma
bhumānaṅda kahe pāmasho re, tame jarura vaikuṅṭhadhāma. koya 4

title: ati uttama divasa āja, ekādashi āvi re
content:
170. pada-4
ati uttama divasa āja, ekādashi āvi re
harijananā haiyāmāṅ harakha, ghaṉero lāvi re. ṭeka
kusaṅgi hoya te na kare re, ekādashi vratasāra
satsaṅgi ch̄oḍe nahi re, jene prabhu saṅgāthe pyāra. ekādashi 1
mohananā manamāṅ game re, ā vratano upavāsa
brahmacharya yukta je kare re, tene rākhe potāne pāsa. ekādashi 2
ā vrata karavuṅ sahune re, aṅtara lāvi uch̄āva
kāmadika piḍe nahi re, jene pragaṭa maḏe māva, ekādashi 3
ekādashi adhanāshini re, kahe harinā jana
bhumānaṅdanāṅ nāthamāṅ re, sadā rākhi potānāṅ mana. ekādashi 4
pavitrā ekādashināṅ pada, shrāvaṉa suda-11

title: ḍhāḏa : hati mārā vhālā hati mārā vhālā, kema kaho ch̄o gāya nahoti re..
content:
171. rāga : māligāḍo pada-1
ḍhāḏa : hati mārā vhālā hati mārā vhālā, kema kaho ch̄o gāya nahoti re..
shrāvaṉa sudi ekādashi suṅdara, nātha pavitrāṅ pahero re
āṅgaṉamāṅ ubhā rahine, hete sāmuṅ hero re. shrā 1
bahu muli moḏiḍuṅ bāṅdho, shira torā maramāḏā re
alabelāji darashana āpo, vahālama moralivāḏā re. shrā 2
naṭavaraji murati nirakhyāni, āsha ghaṉi ch̄e amane re;
eka ghaḍi āṅkhyuṅ āgethi, melyā na jāya tamane re. shrā 3
rasika piyā tamane riʝāvā, gita manohara gāvuṅ re
brahmānaṅdanāṅ nāthaji tamane, pavitrāṅ peherāvuṅ re.shrā 4

title: paheryāṅ nātha pavitrāṅ suṅdara, pavitra triyā paherāvyāṅ re
content:
172. pada-2
paheryāṅ nātha pavitrāṅ suṅdara, pavitra triyā paherāvyāṅ re
naṅdataṉe āṅgaṉa vrajavāsi, darashana karavā āvyāṅ re. pe 1
mohanajine shobhe mastaka, pāghaḍali pechāḏi re
gopijana gulatāna thai gayāṅ, bhudharanuṅ mukha bhāḏi re. pe 2
laṭakāḏānāṅ laṭakāṅ joine, magana thai vrajanāri re
āṅgaṉiye āvine ubhā, vahālo kuṅjavihāri re. pe 3
naṅdataṉā nānaḍiyāne upara, saravasa vāri nākhuṅ re
brahmānaṅdanā vahālāne joine, āja ṭhare māri āṅkhyuṅ re. pe 4

title: naṭavara nātha pavitrāṅ nautama, paheryāṅ prita karine re;
content:
173. pada-3
naṭavara nātha pavitrāṅ nautama, paheryāṅ prita karine re;
sarve pahelāṅ jāine joie, hete sahita harine re. na 1
ekādashi anopama āvi, shrāvaṉani ajavāḏi re
pitāṅbara ābhuṣaṉa paheri, ubhā ch̄e vanamāḏi re. na 2
ghara gharathi govāḏā āvyā, harinuṅ mukhaḍu jovā re
vahāleji suṅdara vesha banāvyo, mānunināṅ mana movā re.na 3
pāghaḍali nautama pechāḏi, āṅṭāḏi uparaṉi re
brahmānaṅdanā vahālāne nirakhyā, dhanya dhanya teni karaṉi re.na 4

title: ekādashi anupa ājani, koḍe och̄ava kariye re
content:
174. pada-4
ekādashi anupa ājani, koḍe och̄ava kariye re
sahita pavitrāṅ suṅdaravarani, murati aṅtara dhariye re. e 1
prāṉajivananā torā upara, prite bhamara bhame ch̄e re;
laṭakāḏā mohananāṅ laṭakāṅ, mana māre adhika game ch̄e re. e 2
suṅdara vana shyāmaḏiyā keruṅ, rupa alaukika joyuṅ re
bhudharajini murti bhāḏi, sarave, gokuḏa moyuṅ re. e 3
ch̄ela chaturavara ch̄ogāḏāni, lāvana pyāri lāge re
brahmānaṅdanā vahālāne rākhuṅ, ākhaṅḍalini āge re. e 4
oraḍānāṅ pado

title: āja māre oraḍe re, āvyāṅ avināshi alabela;
sajani sāṅbhaḏo re, shobhā varṉavuṅ teni teha;
bolyā shrihari re, sāṅbhaḏo naranāri harijana;
vaḏi sahu sāṅbhaḏo re, māri vārtā parama anupa;
sarayu jaḏamāṅ keshara ghoḏi, snāna karāvuṅ ghanashyāmane; ..1
content:
179. sarayu jaḏamāṅ keshara ghoḏi
sarayu jaḏamāṅ keshara ghoḏi, snāna karāvuṅ ghanashyāmane; ..1
haḏave hāthe aṅgo choḏi, lāḍa laḍāvuṅ ghanashyāmane..1
aṅgo luch̄i āpuṅ vastro, piḏu pitāṅbara pyāramāṅ; ..1
tela sugaṅdhi nākhi āpuṅ, vāṅkaḍiyā tuja vāḏamāṅ...2
kumakuma keruṅ tilaka sajāvuṅ, trikama tārā bhālamāṅ; ..1
alabeli āṅkhomāṅ āṅju, aṅjana mārā vālamāṅ..3
hasati jāuṅ vāṭe ghāṭe, nāchi uṭhuṅ tālamāṅ; ..1
najara na lāge ghanashyāmane, ṭapakāṅ kari dauṅ gālamāṅ..4
pagamāṅ ʝāṅʝara rumaʝuma vāge, karamāṅ kaṅkaṉa vālamāṅ; ..1
kaṅṭhe māḏā kāne kuṅḍaḏa, chore chittaḍuṅ chālamāṅ..5
mora mukuṭa māthe paherāvuṅ, morali āpuṅ hāthamāṅ; ..1
harikr̥ṣṉa kr̥pāḏu nirakhi, vāri jāuṅ mārā vālamāṅ..6
dudha kaṭori bharine āpuṅ, pione ghanashyāmaji; ..1
bhaktamaṅḍaḏani nirakhi shobhā, rākho charaṉe ghanashyāmaji..7

title: ḍhāḏa : mahārāja āja vaḍatālathi āvashe...
ḍhāḏa : huṅ to jāisha giridhara jovā re...
content:
181. rāga : garabi pada-4
ḍhāḏa : huṅ to jāisha giridhara jovā re...
sakhi nāḫvāṅ padhāre mahārāja re, jivana jamunā meṅ;
sāthe lidho ch̄e sarave samāja re, vrajane visāme...ṭeka
haḏavāṅ re haḏavāṅ vahālo hāle bajāre,
hāṅ re ubhā nagaravāsi prāṉa vāre re...jivana 1
ch̄atra chamara shira upara rāje,
hāṅ re āge agaṉita vājāṅ vāje re...jivana ra
utaryāṅ goviṅda jamunā meṅ nhāvāṅ,
hāṅ re āvyāṅ suramuni puṣpe vadhāvāṅ re...jivana 3
giridhara nahāya ne gopio gāya,
hāṅ re joi premānaṅda vāri jāya re...jivana 4

title: ḍhāḏa : padhārone sahajānaṅdaji ho gunā karine...
content:
182. rāga : māṅḍa pada-1
ḍhāḏa : padhārone sahajānaṅdaji ho gunā karine...
mārā kesarabhinā kahāna re, ubhā gaṅgājine tira-ṭeka
unmatta gaṅgā sohāmaṉi re, unmatta unaro nira
ghaṉuṅ nāyā ghanashyāmaji re, jaḏamāṅya baḏavira re. ubhā 1
khaḏakhaḏiyāo khaḏake ghaṉuṅ re, ghelo guṉa gaṅbhira
jeni upamā nava jaḍe re, kyāṅthi mati rahe sthira re. ubhā 2
purvadishāmāṅ pāṉi vahe ch̄e, suvarṉa keri rela
pāpa puṅja dekhi ḍare re, dāʝe duṣṭa hydiyānā hira re. ubhā 3
sahajānaṅdaji snāna karine, peheryā vastra amulya
premasakhi kahe nyāla kari, nāve teni tulya re. ubhā 4

title: bājoṭha kanaka taṉe āvi beṭhā, nira garama hari nāhavāne
content:
183. rāga : bhairava pada-3
bājoṭha kanaka taṉe āvi beṭhā, nira garama hari nāhavāne
shveta vastra paheryuṅ eka suṅdara, bhudharaji bhiṅjāvāne. bājoṭha 1
attara tela phulela anupama, mardana karavā māvāne
aṅga choḏe ḍhoḏe jaḏa upara, rasiyoji riʝāvāne. bājoṭha 2
snāna kari uṭhyāṅ shāmaḏiyo, premijana lalachāvāne
lalita navina taiyāra kari lāvyāṅ, pitāṅbara paherāvāne. bājoṭha 3
ratnajaḍita shubha pāṭa manohara, gādi navala bich̄āvāne
brahmānaṅdanā nāthane āvyāṅ, bhojana kāja bolāvāne. bājoṭha 4

title: ḍhāḏa : (1) tame mahera kari mahārāja, sāmu...
content:
184. rāga : sāmeri
ḍhāḏa : (1) tame mahera kari mahārāja, sāmu...
(2) bāvā naṅda taṉe darabāra....
abhiṣekano utsava āja, dina ati sāro re
tame nahāvone mārā nātha, jāuṅ balihāri re. ....1
jaḏa jamunānā āṉiyā re, choḏo tela phulela re
beso bājoṭha upare, tame rasiyāji raṅgarela re. ....2
harivara mukhaḍuṅ heravā re, mili āvi vrajanāra re
shyāma manohara shyāmaḏā, sajo navala piyā shaṉagāra re. ....3
indrādika sura āviyāṅ re, darshana karavāṅ kāja re
(brahmānaṅdanāṅ) vahālamāṅ, ruḍo utsavano dina āja re. ....4
chaṅdana shr̥ṅgāranāṅ pado

title: ḍhāḏa : dharmataṉāṅ kumāra shobhe dharmataṉāṅ kumāra...
content:
185. rāga : goḍi pada-1
ḍhāḏa : dharmataṉāṅ kumāra shobhe dharmataṉāṅ kumāra...
chaṅdana se ghanashyāma virājata, chaṅdana se ghanashyāma
chaṅdanakhora kini saba tana meṅ, sohata shobhādhāma. virājata. 1
shveta chaṅdana ko jāmo pahiryo, ura vaijyaṅti māla
bhāla tilaka kesara ko sohe, aṅbuja nayana vishāla. virājata. ra
akṣayatr̥tiyā ke dina ehi vidhi, saba aṅga chaṅdana dhāri
muktānaṅda ko shyāma chaturavara, ati sohata sukhakāri. virājata. 3

title: kini he chaṅdanakhora manohara, kini he chaṅdanakhora
content:
186. pada-ra
kini he chaṅdanakhora manohara, kini he chaṅdanakhora
shri ghanashyāma sadā ati suṅdara, vrajavanitā chittachora. manohara. 1
kesara ko lepana saba tana meṅ, kino he kuṅjavihāri
mr̥gamada tilaka bhāla bicha rājata, bhai shobhā ati bhāri. manohara. ra
dharehai gucch̄a kānana para, pāgha meṅ tore virāje
muktānaṅda ko nātha vilokata, koṭi kāma ch̄abi lāje. manohara. 3

title: kesara tilaka kare, āvata hari, kesara tilaka kare hari āvata. ṭeka
content:
187. rāga : kalyāṉa pada-1
kesara tilaka kare, āvata hari, kesara tilaka kare hari āvata. ṭeka
dharata shveta ʝine tana aṅbara, amr̥ta ʝarata najare - ā 1
donuṅ bhujā sakhā gaḏe nakhiyā, akhiyāṅ prema bhare - ā 2
phulana ke bhuja baṅdha manohara, phulana ke gajare - ā 3
brahmānaṅda ghanashyāma ki murati, nirakhi najara ṭhare - ā 4

title: chaṅdanakhora kiye āvata hari, chaṅdanakhora kiye āvata hari. ṭeka.
content:
188. pada-2
chaṅdanakhora kiye āvata hari, chaṅdanakhora kiye āvata hari. ṭeka.
sātha sakhā maṅḍaḏa ati shobhita, morali hātha liye. ā. 1
vāmashravana tila shyāma manohara, nenana seṅ lakhiye. ā. ra
suṅdara vaṅki bhr̥ṅha alaukika, suṅdara hāra hiye . ā. 3
nirakhi ch̄abi ghanashyāma piyā ki, brahmānaṅda jiye. ā. 4
mānasi pujānuṅ kirtana

title: pujā prabhujini mānasi re, karavāni kahuṅ ritya; ...1
content:
189. ḍhāḏa : dhyāna dhara dhyāna dhara dharmanā putranuṅ...
pujā prabhujini mānasi re, karavāni kahuṅ ritya; ...1
brahma rupe bhakta thaine re, karajo nitya nitya...1
sutāṅ uṭhine saṅbhāravuṅ re, hr̥diye harinuṅ rupa; ...1
ene uṭhāḍi karāvavi re, shauchavidhi anupa...2
pāluṅ kaṅchana keruṅ melavuṅ re, dātaṉa karavāṅ kāja; ...1
kahevuṅ karo āmāṅ kogaḏā re, mukha dhuvo mahārāja..3
nhāvā padhārone nāthaji re, bhari melyāṅ nira; ...1
beso bājoṭha upare re, choḏuṅ shyāma sharira.. 4
paheri pitāṅbara pāmari re, khaṅbhe nāṅkho nātha; ...1
āvo jivana jamavāṅ re, lai sakhā saṅghātha..5
kari meli tama kāraṉe re, rasoi rasāḏa; ...1
beso bājoṭha upare re, ṭhākora jamo thāḏa.. 6
gaḏyāṅ sāṭā ghebaragāṅṭhiyā re, jalebi payapāka; ...1
biraṅja motiyāṅ mālapuṅvā re, shirāpuri shāka..7
jivana jamo rasa roṭali re, dudha sākaramāṅ bhāta; ...1
chaḏu karo tr̥pta thaine re, jaḏa pivo jagatāta.. 8
ṭhākora āpo thāḏa mujane re, prasādi mahārāja; ...1
sarve saṅtane jamāḍiye re, vaḏi sakhāno samāja..9
laviṅga sopārine elachi re, mukhavāsa mahārāja; ...1
kātho chuno biḍi pānani re, banāvi tama kāja..10
karuṅ khora chaṅdanani re, kesara tilaka bhāla; ...1
kari kapurani ārati re, utāruṅ tatkāḏa..11
pyārā pahero ʝiṉu dhotiyuṅ re, kamare reṅṭo lāla; ...1
jāmo kasuṅbi jariyāno re, khaṅbhe suṅdara shāla..12
torā gajarā bāju sāṅkaḏāṅ re, poṅchi kaḍāṅ hāra; ...1
mugaṭa dharo jaḍyo motiye re, kuṅḍaḏa minākāra..13
vālā bheṭo bhumānaṅdano re, pyārā puraṉakāma; ...1
āvo ḍhāḏi āpuṅ ḍholiyo re, thāo sukhāḏuṅ shyāma..14
vachanāmr̥ta mahimānāṅ pado
prāgaṭya divasa : māgashara suda-4

title: vāḫlā nā vadana taṉā vachanāmr̥ta mujane, pyārā lāge ch̄e. ṭeka.
content:
190. ḍhāḏa : māvānā mugaṭaḍānā moti
vāḫlā nā vadana taṉā vachanāmr̥ta mujane, pyārā lāge ch̄e. ṭeka.
he pyārā lāge ch̄e bhagatani, bhramaṉā bhāge ch̄e.. vāḫlā. 1
kalpataru chiṅtāmaṉi pārasa, kāmadudhā je gāya
shrihari nāṅ vachanāmr̥ta ne te, upamā na devāya..vāḫlā. 2
pārasane chiṅtāmaṉi paththara, jaḍavastuni joḍa
vachanāmr̥ta haridhāma pamāḍi, pure manuṣyanā koḍa.. vāḫlā. 3
kalpatarune kāmadudhā te, kalpita vastu denāra
shrimukhanā vachanāmr̥ta lāve, bhavasāgarano pāra.. vāḫlā. 4
aṣṭasidhdhi navanidhi teto, gaṉatrimāṅ na gaṉāya
shuddha bhāve vachanāmr̥ta seve, jaḍachiḋ vastu jaṉāya.. vāḫlā. 5
chāra veda ṣaṭshāstra purāṉo, bhārata ne itihāsa
vāṉi chaturvidha ādi sarvano, vachanāmr̥tamāṅ sāra.. vāḫlā. 6
mukti chaturvidha maḏavāthi paṉa, bane nahi puraṉa kāma
vachanāmr̥tanuṅ jñāna thavāthi, pāme ch̄e akṣaradhāma.. vāḫlā. 7
kr̥ṣṉasvarupa goloka birāje, vaikuṅṭhamāṅ shrirāma
shvetadvipa vāsudeva birāje, ane akṣaramāṅ ghanashyāma..vāḫlā. 8
bhāgigaṉine aṅtara dhāro, vachanāmr̥tano bhāva
shāstra sarve hastāmala thāshe, lailo durlabha lābha.. vāḫlā. 9
yogi jatine r̥ṣi tapasvi, dhyāna dhare vanamāṅya
vachanāmr̥tanuṅ dhyāna dharyāthi, brahmarupa bani jāya.. vāḫlā. 10
prita karine hr̥daye vichāro, vachanāmr̥ta no sāra
shriharinā vachanāmr̥ta upara, naṅdakishora balihāra..vāḫlā. 10

title: ḍhāḏa : kuṅdanapura vivāha rachyo...
tame māṉakie chaḍhine vahelāṅ āvajo;
māṉakini upara āja, nirakhyā hari
content:
193. ḍhāḏa : janama saṅgāthi visāryā jagadishane...
māṉakini upara āja, nirakhyā hari
alabelāne joine, māri āṅkhaḍi ṭhari.. māṉaki ṭeka.
māṉakini chāla joi, lāja pāmiyo
indrataṉo ucchaishravā, svargamāṅ gayo.. māṉaki 1
suraja sātha saptamukhi, nitya saṅchare
māṉakine joine nakki, nāsato phare.. māṉaki 2
vāyu vega manano vega, je pramāṉie
paṉa māṉakino vega, ethi adhika jāṉie.. māṉaki 3
ākāshamāṅthi akasmāta, tāro jema khare
ashvini ā harine laine, ema saṅchare.. māṉaki 4
chapaḏa ch̄e haraṉi jevi, phāḏa to bhare
dharaṉidhara dharaṉi shira, dhāratāṅ ḍare.. māṉaki 5
akṣarapati avani upara, āvyā jāṉine
garuḍa banyā ghoḍi rupe, prema āṉine.. māṉaki 6
jaḍitra ch̄e palāya pāye, ʝāṅʝara ʝaṉaʝaṉe
harivara jyāre hātha pherave, tyāre haṉahaṉe.. māṉaki 7
liṅba vr̥kṣa samipa, hari ghoḍi pherave
jananāṅ jutha jivana taṉi, murati jue.. māṉaki 8
hāthamāṅ grahi lagāma, harie hirani
maramāḏi kāṅi dise murati, shyāma sharirani.. māṉaki 9
chatura chalave chāla chapaḏa, ruḍi revāḏamāṅ
kesarani arachā shobhe, bhāla vishāḏamāṅ.. māṉaki 10
sheṣane sureshadeva, mahesha āviyā
rasiyāne riʝāvavā, bhali bheṭa lāviyā.. māṉaki 11
vishvavihārilālajinuṅ, nirakhine svarupa
ārati utāre āvi, devatā anupa.. māṉaki 12

title: māṉaki re ghoḍi pritamane pyāri, akṣara pati karatā asavāri. mā 1
content:
194. ḍhāḏa : āja sakhi ānaṅdani heli
māṉaki re ghoḍi pritamane pyāri, akṣara pati karatā asavāri. mā 1
keshara varṉi manavegi chāle, vakhāṉi ch̄e vishvapati vahāle. mā 2
enā re tapa ja māṅ nathi khāmi, birāje ch̄e aṅgapara bahunāmi. mā 3
sevā saji lābha ghaṉo lidho, harirasa prema dhari pidho. mā 4
akṣaya sukha āpyuṅ avatāri, nāraṉadāsa balihāri mā 5

title: māṉaki re tuṅ āvati raheje māre mole re, māṉaki..1
content:
195. ḍhāḏa : paṅkhiḍā tuṅ uḍi jāje māre mohale re...
māṉaki re tuṅ āvati raheje māre mole re, māṉaki..1
shriji prabhuni savāri tuṅ lāvati raheje re.. māṉaki..1
elyā gāmanā māḏiḍā virā veḫlāṅ āvo re, māṉaki..1
mārā shriji prabhunā ruḍā hāralā lāvo re
sārā lāvo, suṅdara lāvo, veḫlāṅ āvo re, māṉaki..1
shriji prabhuni savāri tuṅ lāvati raheje re..māṉaki..2
olā lālaji suthāra virā veḫlāṅ āvo re, māṉaki..1
mārā shriji prabhunā ruḍā bājoṭha lāvo re
sārā lāvo suṅdara lāvo veḫlā āvo re, māṉaki..1
shriji prabhuni savāri tuṅ lāvati raheje re..māṉaki..3
olyā nāgadāna soni virā veḫlāṅ āvo re, māṉaki..1
mārā shriji prabhunā ruḍā kaḍalā lāvo re
sārā lāvo suṅdara lāvo veḫlāṅ āvo re, māṉaki..1
shriji prabhuni savāri tuṅ lāvati raheje re..māṉaki..4
māṉakināṅ kirtano
shri svāminārāyaṉa mahāmaṅtra mahimānāṅ kirtano
prāgaṭya divasa : māgashara vada-11

title: shri harililāmr̥taṁ : kaḏasha-5, vishrāma-3
content:
196. ch̄aṅda : upajātivr̥ta pada-1
shri harililāmr̥taṁ : kaḏasha-5, vishrāma-3
je svāminārāyaṉa nāma leshe, tenāṅ badhāṅ pātaka bāḏi deshe; ..1
ch̄e nāma mārā shrutimāṅ aneka, sarvopari āja gaṉāya eka..1
je svāminānārāyaṉa eka vāra, raṭe bijā nāma raṭyāṅ hajāra; ..1
japyā thaki je phaḏa thāya enuṅ, kari shake varṉana koṉa tenuṅ..2
ṣaḍakṣaro maṅtra mahā samartha, jethi thashe siddha samasta artha; ..1
sukhi kare saṅkaṭa sarva kāpe, aṅte vaḏi akṣaradhāma āpe..3
gāyatrithi lakṣa gaṉo visheṣa, jāṉeja jeno mahimā mahesha; ..1
jyāṅ jyāṅ mahāmuktajano vasāya, ā kāḏamāṅ to japa e ja thāya..4
jo aṅtakāḏe shravaṉe suṉāya, pāpi taṉo te paṉa mokṣa thāya; ..1
te maṅtrathi bhuta pishācha bhāge, te maṅtrathi to saḋbuddhi jāge..5
te maṅtra jenā mukhathi japāya, tenā thaki to jama nāsi jāya; ..1
shri svāminārāyaṉa je kaheshe, bhāve kubhāve paṉa mukti leshe.. 6
ṣaḍakṣaro ch̄e ṣaṭashāstra sāra, te to utāre bhavasiṅdhu pāra; ..1
ch̄aye r̥tumāṅ divase nishāye, sarva kriyāmāṅ samaro sadāye..7
pavitra dehe apavitra dehe, te nāma nitye smaravuṅ snehe; ..1
jaḏe karine tana mela jāya, ā nāmathi aṅtara shuddha thāya..8
jeṉe mahā pāpa karyā anaṅta, jeṉe piḍyā brāhmaṉa dhenuṅ saṅta; ..1
te svāminārāyaṉa nāma letāṅ, lāji mare ch̄e mukhathi kahetāṅ..9
shri svāminārāyaṉa nāma sāra, ch̄e pāpane te prajaḏāvanāra; ..10
pāpi ghaṉuṅ aṅtara hoya jenuṅ, baḏyā vinā kema rahe ja tenuṅ..10

title: ḍhāḏa : janama saṅgāthi visāryā jagadishane...
content:
197. rāga : dhoḏa
ḍhāḏa : janama saṅgāthi visāryā jagadishane...
svāminārāyaṉa āja pragaṭa mahāmaṅtra ch̄e,
shravaṉe sāṅbhaḏatāṅ kaṅpe dinakaraduta jo;
bhavanāṅ baṅdhana sadya kāpi sukhiyāṅ kare,
shuṅ kahi dākhuṅ mahimā ati adabhuta jo..svā . 1
aneka patita odharyā purave ā maṅtra thaki,
ajāmela ganikā ādika apārajo;
te maṅtra āja mahārāje pragaṭa karyo,
kalimāṅ karavā aneka patita bhava pārajo..svā . 2
sakāmi jana sumari pāme trivargane,
niṣkāmi jana pāme pada nirvāṉa jo;
nāmataṉā nāmi svāmi pragaṭa maḏyāṅ,
te jananā shuṅ karuṅ mukhe vakhāṉajo..svā . 3
bhava brahmā muni mukta jape ā maṅtrane,
te sahu pāmyā mana vāṅch̄ita sukha sāja jo;
premānaṅda kahe kara joḍi sahu janane,
bhulasho māṅ avasara āvyo ch̄e āja jo..svā
. 4

title: svāminārāyaṉa mahāmaṅtragame, aho rātadivasa mārāṅ dilamāṅ rame. ṭeka.
content:
198. rāga : bhimapalāsi
svāminārāyaṉa mahāmaṅtragame, aho rātadivasa mārāṅ dilamāṅ rame. ṭeka.
vhāle ch̄apaiyā dhāmamāṅ janmadhari, varṉi veṣe himāchaḏe tapa kari
harie lākho munioni mukti kari. . svāmi 1
vhāle gururāmānaṅdathi dikṣā lidhi, kacch̄a gujarāta saurāṣṭre lilā kidhi;
prabhue bhaktoni bhrāṅti miṭāvi didhi. . svāmi 2
vhāle vachanāmr̥tamāṅ rahasya bharyuṅ, dharma jñāna vairāgyanuṅ pātra ṭharyuṅ
parā bhakti batāvi kalyāṉa karyuṅ. . svāmi 3
vhāle kr̥pā kari shikṣāpatri didhi, emāṅ chāre puruṣārthani siddhi chiṅdhi
e ch̄e sarve satsaṅgini nautama nidhi. . svāmi 4
vhālā pratyakṣa satsaṅgamāṅ vicharo, mādhavatirthani prārthanā uramāṅ dharo
shriji darshana daine pāvana karo. . svāmi 5

title: ruḍuṅ svāminārāyaṉa nāma, nitya saṅbhārie re;
content:
199. rāga : garabi
ruḍuṅ svāminārāyaṉa nāma, nitya saṅbhārie re;
... ṭeka..1
vaḏi karatāṅ gharanuṅ kāma, ghaḍi na visārie re... ṭeka .. 1
dharmasutanuṅ dhyāna ja dharatāṅ, vāra nahiṅ bhavasāgara taratāṅ; ... ṭeka..1
haratāṅ pharatāṅ harine, haiye dhārie re... ruḍuṅ .. 2
duḥkha paḍe dilagira na thāvuṅ, sukha maḏe harakhāi na jāvuṅ; ... ṭeka..1
sadāya hiṅmata haiyethi, nava hārie re... ruḍuṅ .. 3
saṅsāra ch̄e sukhaduḥkhano dariyo, temāṅ tari shake koika ja tariyo;
... ṭeka..1
saṅta-samāgama karine, manane mārie re... ruḍuṅ .. 4
smaraṉa karatāṅ sukha ja thāshe, phogaṭano phero ṭaḏi jāshe; ... ṭeka..1
muḏaji kahe mahārāja, mujane tārie re... ruḍuṅ .. 5

title: svāminārāyaṉa svāminārāyaṉa, kaho re mana merā
content:
200. rāga : bhairava pada-1
svāminārāyaṉa svāminārāyaṉa, kaho re mana merā
yehi he mahāmaṅtrasāra, miṭe bhavapherā. svāmi 1
raṭahuṅ nāma aṣṭa jāma, ṭaḏe tāpa terā;
māyā mohādi miṭe, nāve jama terā. svāmi 2
ajāmila ādi adhama, odhare ghaṉerā;
mahimā trai lokameṅ, prasidhdha nāma kerā. svāmi 3
shrimukha shrihari āpa, ehi jāpa prerā
muktānaṅda maṅtrarāja, meṭata aṅdherā. svāmi 4

title: svāminārāyaṉa svāminārāyaṉa, svāminārāyaṉa japanā;
content:
201. pada-2
svāminārāyaṉa svāminārāyaṉa, svāminārāyaṉa japanā;
manavā ehi maṅtrarāja, iṣṭadeva apanā. svāmi 1
harata pharata karata kāma, svāminārāyaṉa kahiye
mohādika shatru miṭe, paramānaṅda pāiye. svāmi 2
urameṅ harirupa dhāri, rasanā guna gāve
tāpara hari adhika adhika, karuṉā varasāve. svāmi 3
nishadina harināma jape, lokalāja tyāgi
muktānaṅda te samo nahi, dujo baḍabhāgi. svāmi 4

title: ‘svāmiḫ nārāyaṉa nāma he bhāri, liyo saba premase dhāri; ...nārā 1
content:
202. ḍhāḏa : nārāyaṉa nāma he bhāri (gaʝala)
‘svāmiḫ nārāyaṉa nāma he bhāri, liyo saba premase dhāri; ...nārā 1
mahimā nāmako bhāri, adhama koṭi liye tāri...nārā 1
ajāmila karma kyā kinā, nahi kach̄u dānabhi dinā; ...nārā 1
kevala hari nāmako linā, diyā yamapāshase ṭāri...nārā 2
rahi shabari adhama jāti, raṭana hari nāmakuṅ bhāri;
...nārā 1
jaṅgalase bora bini āti, hr̥dayameṅ rāmako dhāri...nārā 3
ḍube gajarāja jaba jalameṅ, paḍe vaha ʝuḍake ch̄alameṅ; ...nārā 1
pukāre nāmako dilameṅ, hari goviṅda giridhāri...nārā 4

title: ḍhāḏa : svāminārāyaṉa nāma, vāluṅ lāge...
content:
203. rāga : yamana kalyāṉa
ḍhāḏa : svāminārāyaṉa nāma, vāluṅ lāge...
svāminārāyaṉa nāma, sarvopari svāminārāyaṉa nāma;
saṅbhārie āṭhu jāma, sarvopari svāminārāyaṉa nāma... ṭeka.
svāminārāyaṉa maṅtra japatāṅ, pāmie akṣaradhāma.. sarvo 1
mahāmaṅtra japa yajña karatāṅ, prabhu maḏyāṅ ghanashyāma.. sarvo 2
svāmi sahajānaṅda harikr̥ṣṉa, nilakaṅṭha shriji sukhadhāma.. sarvo 3
nāmanāṅ nāmi dhāmanāṅ dhāmi, avatāri puraṉakāma... sarvo 4
ānaṅdasuta kahe shriji prabhu, ṭharavānuṅ ch̄e eka ja ṭhāma.. sarvo 5

title: svāminārāyaṉa deva re, bhaja mana svāminārāyaṉa deva re; ṭeka.
content:
204. rāga : paraja pada-1
svāminārāyaṉa deva re, bhaja mana svāminārāyaṉa deva re; ṭeka.
shiva sanakādika nārada sarakhā, nitya kare ch̄e jeni seva re. bhaja 1
vishālāvāsi saba sukharāshi, joga abhyāsi abheva re. bhaja 2
jene bhajatāṅ bhavaduḥkha nāse, trāse tāpa tatakheva re. bhaja 3
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe nātha bhajyāni, pāḍi aṅtaramāṅ ṭeva re. bhaja 4

title: svāminārāyaṉa nāma re, vhāluṅ lāge svāminārāyaṉa nāma re... ṭeka
content:
205. pada-2
svāminārāyaṉa nāma re, vhāluṅ lāge svāminārāyaṉa nāma re... ṭeka
rāta divasa mārā rudiyāni bhiṅtara, japisha āṭhuṅ jāma re... vhāluṅ 1
bhavajaḏa taravā pāra utaravā, ṭharavānuṅ ch̄e māre ṭhāma re... vhāluṅ 2
sarvopari shyāma ch̄e naravira nāma, suṅdara sukhaḍānuṅ dhāma re... vhāluṅ 3
niṣkuḏānaṅdanā nāthane bhajatāṅ, vāre tenuṅ nahi kāma re... vhāluṅ 4

title: svāminārāyaṉa nātha re, māre shira svāminārāyaṉa nātha re...ṭeka.
content:
206. pada-3
svāminārāyaṉa nātha re, māre shira svāminārāyaṉa nātha re...ṭeka.
avara devane huṅ svapne na icch̄uṅ, mana māniyuṅ māruṅ e sātha re. māre 1
bharatakhaṅḍanā bhupane bhāḏi, have shidane rahuṅ anātha re. māre 2
sarvenā svāmi aṅtarajāmi, evā jāṉi soṅpyo ene hātha re. māre 3
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe niḥshaṅka thaine, gāisha enā guṉagātha re. māre 4

title: svāminārāyaṉa vira re, vasyā hr̥de svāminārāyaṉa vira re... ṭeka
content:
207. pada-4
svāminārāyaṉa vira re, vasyā hr̥de svāminārāyaṉa vira re... ṭeka
asthira mana sthira thayuṅ ch̄e, gayuṅ aṅtaranuṅ adhira re... vasyā 1
shamyo saṅshaya ne shoka sarve, thai shāṅti sukha sharira re... vasyā 2
nirbhaya thayā gayā duḥkha dilanāṅ, thai chittani vr̥tti sthira re... vasyā 3
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe ānaṅda āvyo, have dile nahi dilagira re... vasyā 4

title: svāminārāyaṉa svāminārāyaṉa, jñāni sarve gāya ch̄e re;
vālo sr̥ṣṭino sarjanahāra, ene tame oḏakhi lyo;
content:
209. vālo, sr̥ṣṭino sarjanahāra
vālo sr̥ṣṭino sarjanahāra, ene tame oḏakhi lyo;
vālo bhakta taṉo rakhevāḏa, ene tame oḏakhi lyo...ṭeka
juo janmyā pahelā sāvadhāna koṉe karyā ? vālo1
hāḍa rudhira vacche dudha koṉe puryā ? vālo1
e mānā udaramāṅ besi ghaḍanāra, ene tame oḏakhi lyo. vālo 1
juo ākāshe vādaḏa kevā chaḍyā ? vālo1
emā amr̥ta samā nira koṉe bharyā ? vālo1
evi varṣāno varasāvanāra, ene tame oḏakhi lyo. vālo 2
juo nāḏiyeranā ʝāḍa ghaṉā uṅchā dekhāya, vālo1
tenā phaḏo māṅ traṉa traṉa paḍadā jaṉāya; vālo1
emāṅ pāṉino puranāra, ene tame oḏakhi lyo . vālo 3
juo moranā pich̄āmāṅ raṅga koṉe puryā ? vālo1
evā kiḍinā ātaraḍā koṉe ghaḍyā ? vālo1
evi ʝiṉi kaḏāno jāṉakāra, ene tame oḏakhi lyo. vālo 4
eni ruḍi kaḏānuṅ ame varṉana karyuṅ, vālo1
ruḍuṅ varṉana kari enā darshana karuṅ; vālo1
harinā darshanathi bhava duḥkha jāya, ene tame oḏakhi lyo.. vālo 5

title: ḍhāḏa : prāchina paraja
content:
210. rāga : lāvaṉi
ḍhāḏa : prāchina paraja
sahajānaṅda ke darshana kara ke, magana bhaye saba gurujñāni; ...ṭeka.
aḋbhutarupa vichārata manameṅ, nahi āve mukha se bāni...ṭeka.
anaṅtakoṭi jā ke charana parata hai, brahma mahola ke sukhadāni; ...saha 1
so hari ko hama pragaṭa batāve, bheda vinā bhaṭakata prāni...saha 1
koṭi viṣṉu brahmā kara joḍi, shaṅkara koṭi surata āni; ...saha 1
shārada sheṣa nārada yuṅ praṉave, nahi mānata nara abhimāni...saha 2
niḥsvādi niḥspr̥hi nirlobhi, niṣkāmi jana nirmāni; ...saha 1
pāyo bhaktipadāratha moṭo, tana mana kino kurabāni...saha 3
parabrahma puraṉa puruṣottama, svāminārāyaṉa sumarāni; ...saha 1
sukhānaṅda sharaṉe sukha pāyo, bhajana bharusā ura āni ...saha 4

title: ḍhāḏa : saḋguru sāchā re, sevo shuddha bhāvathi
content:
211. rāga : garabi pada-1
ḍhāḏa : saḋguru sāchā re, sevo shuddha bhāvathi
sahajānaṅda svāmi re, na pragaṭata ā same re; prāṉi koi pāmata nahi bhavapāra re; -saha 1
matiyā ne pākhaṅḍi re, shabdani jāḏamāṅ re; bāṅdhi bāṅdhi boḏata jiva apāra re-saha 1
kāmi krodhi lobhi re, guru thai besatā re; jati sati jaḍata nahi jagamāṅya re; -saha 1
jñāna ne vairāgya re, bhakti ʝurine re; mari jari jāta na lādhata kyāṅya re-saha ra
kāḏiṅgāni phoju re, karata ati jorane re; kari guru paṅḍitamāṅ pravesha re; -saha 1
māṅsa ne madirā re, paratriyā saṅgathi re; dharmano re rahata nahi lavalesha re-saha 3
vadhata vaṭāḏa re, ghaṉo ā saṅsāramāṅ re; varṉa aḍhāre thai eka tāra re; -saha 1
saṅta ne asaṅtamāṅ re, koi samajata nahi re; bhavajaḏa buḍata sahu saṅsāra re-saha 4
narakanā paṅthathi re, koi na nivāratā re; koi na karata bhavasetu uddhāra re; -saha 1
muktānaṅda kahe ch̄e re, tenā duḥkha ṭāḏiyā re; jāuṅ ene vāraṉe vāraṅvāra re-saha pa

title: sahajānaṅda svāmi re, pote parabrahma ch̄e re; svāminārāyaṉa jenuṅ nāma re; -saha 1
content:
212. pada-ra
sahajānaṅda svāmi re, pote parabrahma ch̄e re; svāminārāyaṉa jenuṅ nāma re; -saha 1
satya dharma sthāpi re, adharma ṭāḏiyo re; kidhā vhāle nijajana ati niṣkāma re-saha 1
potānā āshramani re, riti pragaṭa kari re; kaḏi madhye kāmani lidhi lāja re; -saha 1
samaju ne shāṉā re, jāṉi e pratāpane re; nishche kari jāṉyā shrimahārāja re-saha ra
jama ne pākhaṅḍi re, kuṭe ch̄e peṭane re; jāṉe gayo āpaṉo sarve garāsa re; -saha 1
satsaṅga phelāyo re, sarve saṅsāramāṅ re; kene gaḏe nākhashuṅ jai have pāsha re-saha 3
ekāṅtika dharma re, pragaṭa kari āpiyo re; kidhā vhāle brahmarupa nija dāsa re; -saha 1
muktānaṅda kahe ch̄e re, jāuṅ ene vāraṉe re; jeṉe mune āpyo ch̄e behada vāsa re-saha 4

title: sahajānaṅda siṅdhu re āja māre ulaṭyā re, bhāṅgi māri bhavo bhavani re bhukha; -saha 1
content:
213. rāga : sāmeri pada-1
sahajānaṅda siṅdhu re āja māre ulaṭyā re, bhāṅgi māri bhavo bhavani re bhukha; -saha 1
kaṅgālapaṉuṅ re bāi māruṅ kāḍhiyuṅ re, dura kidhuṅ dāridara ne duḥkha...saha 1
ānaṅdani leruṅ re emāṅ ati ghaṉi re, marajivā kare ch̄e māṅye moja; -saha 1
muṭhaḍine bhari re jeṉe muktāphaḏani re, bhāṅgi beṭhāṅ janma-maraṉa bhoja...saha 2
nava nidhini re nathi māre vaṅch̄anā re, siddhi te sāmuṅ shida have joya; -saha 1
sarvenuṅ kāraṉa re maḏiyā chiṅtāmaṉi re, have je je chiṅtaviye te hoya...saha 3
anātha abhāgi re bāi jo ame nahi re, ame ch̄aiye sabhāgiyā shāhukāra; -saha 1
raṅka ṭāḏine re kidhāṅ amane rājavi re, dina ṭāḏi kidhāṅ ch̄e jo dātāra...saha 4
māla atola re bāi ama pāsaḏe re, teṉe huṅ to magana rahi manamāṅye; -saha 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda re ānaṅda ati ghaṉo re, sai kaye sukhataṉi jo simāye...saha 5

title: sahajānaṅda siṅdhu re dayāḏu dayā taṉā re, ulaṭiyā āja na rākhi och̄a; -saha 1
content:
214. pada-2
sahajānaṅda siṅdhu re dayāḏu dayā taṉā re, ulaṭiyā āja na rākhi och̄a; -saha 1
nihāla jo kidhāṅ re kaṅika kaṅgāḏane re, āpi āpi adhama janane jo moch̄a...saha 1
jehi nara pāse re noti eka nāsari re, jema tema karine bharatā jo peṭa; -saha 1
bhukha teni bhāṅgi re lāgi huṅḍi hālavā re, thayā thayā sukhi sabhāgiyā sheṭha...saha 2
kaṉa kaṉa kāje re je jaṉa jaṉa jāchatā re, retā retā āṭhe pora je ādhena; -saha 1
tene lai soṅpi re sadāvrata sukhaḍi re, bhāṅgi bhāṅgi bhukha thayuṅ sukhachena...saha 3
parishrama vinā re pārasamaṉi maḏi re, raḏi raḏi vaḏi na maḏe je mulya; -saha 1
ḍhaḏi ḍhaḏi vaḏi re lerya sukha vārani re, ṭaḏi ṭaḏi bhikha buddhini je bhulya...saha 4
udadhi ulaṭe re nidhi nava māṅya ch̄e re, thāye ch̄e sevatā ghaṉuṅ jo sukha; -saha 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda re ānaṅda ati ghaṉo re, mahimā te moṭo na kahevāye mukha...saha 5

title: sahajānaṅda siṅdhu re sakhi sadā seviye re, jo sukha icch̄iye manamāṅye; -saha 1
content:
215. pada-3
sahajānaṅda siṅdhu re sakhi sadā seviye re, jo sukha icch̄iye manamāṅye; -saha 1
ḍagamaga kari re dala na ḍolāviye re, jeṉe kari jityo avasara jāye...saha 1
avasara āvo re avara āve nahi re, jemāṅ kāṅye maḏiyā suṅdara shāma; -saha 1
evāne mukine re anya na ārādhiye re, jeṉe kari jivita thāye harāma...saha 2
sapanā sarikhā re sukha ā saṅsāranā re, pashu vinā bijo na kare paratita ; -saha 1
vaṉasine jātā re vāra jo lāge nahiṅ re, deha geha dārādika suta vitta...saha 3
te ich̄yuṅ navya āve re hāthya ch̄e hari taṉe re, āpyā vinā levāya nahiṅ te lesha; -saha 1
parishrama kari re jāye koye pāmavā re, kare upajāvi ulaṭo kalesha...saha 4
anya jo bharoso re aṅtarathi uvekhiye re, dekhiye kāṅi dalamāṅ kari vichāra; -saha 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda re sakhi te sabhāgaṉi re, jene upara prasanna prāṉa ādhāra...saha 5

title: sahajānaṅda siṅdhu re sakhi jo sabhara bharyo re, ekarasa akhaṅḍa ne avināsha; -saha 1
content:
216. pada-4
sahajānaṅda siṅdhu re sakhi jo sabhara bharyo re, ekarasa akhaṅḍa ne avināsha; -saha 1
aṅtarani āṅkhethi re je joshe te jāṉashe re, āve na jāye jema ākāsha...saha 1
lerya taraṅga re budabudāṅ bahu thayāṅ re, deva duni muni nara ne jo nārya; -saha 1
sthāvara jaṅgama re dishe jotāṅ jujavāṅ re, ādye aṅtye madhye vilase vārya...saha 2
hima karā ne re luṉa bahu lekhatāṅ re, jotāṅ dise jujavi tehani jātya; -saha 1
uttama madhya re ethi aḏaguṅ nahiṅ re, pota eka pāḍi bhinna bhinna bhāta...saha 3
bhāṅḍuṅ bhariye re jema koye jaḏanuṅ re, rākhiye te ratanākara ne māṅye; -saha 1
bhitara bāhara re bharyuṅ jaḏa bhāḏiye re, bhājana bhāṅgate toya rahyuṅ tyāṅye...saha 4
āve na jāye re akhaṅḍa e ātmā re, jeha sthira asthira te navya thāya; -saha 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda re lerya ānaṅdani re, upani te sāyara māṅye samāya...saha 5

title: pāmyāṅ pāmyāṅ re bhavajaḏa pāra, shri hari saṅta maḏi;
content:
217. rāga : dhoḏa
pāmyāṅ pāmyāṅ re bhavajaḏa pāra, shri hari saṅta maḏi;
vāmyāṅ vāmyāṅ re duḥkha apāra, shri hari saṅta maḏi.
nāmyāṅ nāmyāṅ re shira prabhu pāya, shri jāmyāṅ jāmyāṅ re sukha uramāṅya. shri 1
saryāṅ saryāṅ re sarave kāja, shri karyāṅ karyāṅ re puraṉakāma. shri 2
lidho lidho re puraṉa lāva, shri didho didho re jama shira pāva. shri 3
joyuṅ joyuṅ re jagamāṅ jarura, shri khoyuṅ khoyuṅ re duḥkhaḍuṅ dura. shri 4
vaḏi vaḏi re raṅgaḍāni relya, shri phaḏi phaḏi re suphaḏa velya . shri 5
maḏi maḏi re mahāsukha moja, shri daḏi daḏi re jamaduta phoja. shri 6
huvo huvo re jaya jayakāra, shri juvo juvo re sukha apāra. shri 7
sahe sahe re koṉa duḥkhadvandva, shri kahe kahe re niṣkuḏānaṅda. shri 8

title: akṣaranā vāsi vhālo, āvyā avani para;
dharmane lāle mune, hete bolāvi;
adhama uddhāraṉa evuṅ, potānuṅ nāma;
shidane bhaṭako ch̄o tame, chatura sujāṉa;
sahajānaṅda sukhakāri, sahajānaṅda sukhakāri re;
sukhadāyaka re svāmi sahajānaṅda, pragaṭa puruṣottama shrihari...ṭeka.
content:
223. rāga : dhoḏa pada-1
sukhadāyaka re svāmi sahajānaṅda, pragaṭa puruṣottama shrihari...ṭeka.
jenuṅ svāminārāyaṉa nāma ch̄e, jene bhajane re pāme bhavajaḏa pāra...pra-1
jenāṅ darshana icch̄e mahāmuni, karuṉānidhi re prabhu parama udāra...pra-2
vahāle kaḏi madhye ati karuṉā kari, dhāryo dvijakula re guṉanidhi avatāra...pra-3
vahāle satajuga sama dharma sthāpiyo, ṭāḏyā nijajananā manathi mada māra ...pra-4
eno je jane kidho āsharo, te to tari gayā re kuḏa sahita saṅsāra...pra-5
muktānaṅda kahe mahimā apāra ch̄e, kare nishadina re neti nigama pokāra...pra-6

title: preme pragaṭyā re suraja sahajānaṅda, adharma aṅdhāruṅ ṭāḏiyuṅ...ṭeka.
content:
224. pada-2
preme pragaṭyā re suraja sahajānaṅda, adharma aṅdhāruṅ ṭāḏiyuṅ...ṭeka.
māyā-rāta mumukṣuni ṭaḏi, thayuṅ hari maḏatāṅ puraṉa parabhāta...a-1
saṅshaya shoka haryāṅ sarve jivanā, jeṉe māni re preme vahālāni vāta...a-2
juṭhā jñāni uluka jagamāṅ hatā, te saṅtāṉā re pāpi parvatamāṅya...a-3
kāma krodha ne lobha je chora te, ḍari bhāgyā re rahevā ṭhora na kyāṅya...a-4
dekhi saṅta-kamaḏa vana phuliyāṅ, duḥkha pāmyā re pāpi kumuda apāra...a-5
muktānaṅda kahe mahāsukha āpiyuṅ, ene vāraṉe re jāuṅ vāraṅvāra...a-6

title: kari karuṉā re svāmi sahajānaṅda, padhāryāṅ akhaṅḍa sukha āpavā...ṭeka.
content:
225. pada-3
kari karuṉā re svāmi sahajānaṅda, padhāryāṅ akhaṅḍa sukha āpavā...ṭeka.
jenāṅ darshanathi duṣkrita ṭaḏe, jene sparshe re pāme pātaka nāsha...padhā-1
jenuṅ sharaṉuṅ grahe sukha pāmie, vege nāse re moha-māyānāṅ pāsha ...padhā-2
jeno mahimā anaṅta apāra ch̄e, shuka shārada re muni nārada gāya...padhā-3
matimaṅda na jāṉe e marmane, jema ulukane re ravi nava dekhāya...padhā-4
vahālo nārada nigamanāṅ veṉane, satya karavā re pote lai muni sātha...padhā-5
muktānaṅda kahe adharma uthāpiyo, bhakti jñāna vairāgya sthāpyā grahi hātha...padhā-6

title: pote parabrahma re svāmi sahajānaṅda, nārāyaṉa prabaḏa pratāpa ch̄e...ṭeka.
content:
226. pada-4
pote parabrahma re svāmi sahajānaṅda, nārāyaṉa prabaḏa pratāpa ch̄e...ṭeka.
vāḫlo bharatakhaṅḍanā naranārine, pote tapa kari re āpe phaḏa soya...nā-1
harināṅ tapa kerāṅ puṉya pratāpathi, thayā shuddha mana re harijana sarva koya...nā-2
svāminārāyaṉa mukhe ucchare, tene janma-maraṉa jamano bhaya jāya...nā-3
sarave narakanā kuṅḍa khāli thayā, bhukhyā jamagaṉa re kara ghasi pastāya...nā-4
pāmyā anaṅta jiva haridhāmane, teni gaṉanā re keḫtāṅ sheṣa lajāya...nā-5
muktānaṅda kahe mahimā ati ghaṉo, tene eka mukhe re kavi keṭaloka gāya...nā-6

title: āja sakhi ānaṅdani heli, harimukha joine huṅ thai ch̄uṅ re gheli-1
content:
227. rāga : garabi pada-1
āja sakhi ānaṅdani heli, harimukha joine huṅ thai ch̄uṅ re gheli-1
mahā re munināṅ dhyānamāṅ nāḫve, te re shāmaḏiyoji mujane bolāve-2
je sukhane bhava brahmā re, icch̄e te re shāmaḏiyoji mujane re prich̄e -3
na gai gaṅgā godāvari kāshi, ghera beṭhāṅ maḏyāṅ akṣaravāsi-4
tapa re tirathamāṅ huṅ kāṅi nava jāṉuṅ, saheje saheje huṅ to sukhaḍāṅ re māṉuṅ-5
jerāma kahe svāmi saheje re maḏiyā, vātani vāte vhālo aḍhaḏaka ḍhaḏiyā-6

title: mahera kari māre maṅdire āvyāṅ, thāḏa bharine motiḍe vadhāvyāṅ-1
content:
228. pada-2
mahera kari māre maṅdire āvyāṅ, thāḏa bharine motiḍe vadhāvyāṅ-1
ānaṅda aṅge na māya māri beni, harivara bheṭatāṅ lajjā re sheni-2
durijana mana re māne tema kahejo, svāmiji mārā rudiyāmāṅ rahejo-3
je re joie te māgajo māvā, trikama tamane huṅ nahi dauṅ jāvā-4
mukhathi te ʝāʝuṅ shuṅ kahi dākhuṅ, harivara mārā rudiyāmāṅ rākhuṅ-5
koṉa re puṉye huṅ(to) harivara pāmi, bhale maḏyāṅ jerāmanā svāmi-6

title: purvanuṅ puṉya pragaṭa thayuṅ jyāre, svāminārāyaṉa maḏiyā re tyāre-1
content:
229. pada-3
purvanuṅ puṉya pragaṭa thayuṅ jyāre, svāminārāyaṉa maḏiyā re tyāre-1
neṉe mohanavara nirakhyā jyāre, puraṉa kāma thayuṅ māruṅ tyāre-2
preme kari maṅdira padharāvyāṅ, shyāma suṅdaravara manaḍe re bhāvyā-3
nirakhi nārāyaṉa murati jyāre, trividha tāpa ṭaḏyā mārā tyāre-4
kesara chaṅdana charachyuṅ ch̄e bhāle, hasatāṅ suṅdara khāḍā paḍe ch̄e gāle-5
kānumāṅ kuṅḍaḏa makarākāra shobhe, jerāma kahe mana joi joi lobhe-6

title: shira para kesha shobhe ati sārā, mohanavara māri āṅkhyonāṅ tārā-1
content:
230. pada-4
shira para kesha shobhe ati sārā, mohanavara māri āṅkhyonāṅ tārā-1
bhrukuṭi kuṭila shobhi rahi sāri, joi joi mohi sarve vrajanāri-2
hāra haiyāmāṅ paheryāṅ vanamāḏi, bhramara āve tiyāṅ sugaṅdha bhāḏi-3
be stana shyāma shobhe ati sārā, jāṉe ugyā ākāshamāṅ tārā-4
nābhi nautama uṅḍi ch̄e bhāri, brahmā bese tyāṅ āsana vāḏi-5
jānu jugala shobhe ati sārā, jerāma kahe dekhe dāsa tamārā-6

title: puruṣotama prakāsha, prakāra-55
content:
231. rāga : dhoḏa (vadhāmaṉānuṅ)
puruṣotama prakāsha, prakāra-55
ānaṅda āpyo ati ghaṉo re,
ā samāmāṅ alabela puruṣottama pragaṭi re...ṭeka.
amr̥tanā siṅdhu ulaṭyāṅ re, raṅgaḍāni vāḏi ch̄e rela ...pu 1
nirbhayani nobatyuṅ vāgiyuṅ re, maḏiyā mohanarāya...pu 2
vidhavidha thayāṅ vadhāmaṉāṅ re, kasara na rahi kāṅya...pu 3
khoṭa gai ch̄e khovāine re, jityānā jāṅgi ḍhola ...pu 4
duḥkha gayuṅ bahu dinanuṅ re, āviyuṅ sukha atola...pu 5
kaḏasha chaḍhāvyo kalyāṉano re, sahunā mastaka para moḍa ...pu 6
dhanya dhanya ā avatārane re, jovā rākhi nahi joḍa...pu 7
sahuni pāre sahu upare re, evi chalāvi ch̄e rita...pu 8
noḫti diṭhi noḫti sāṅbhaḏi re, pragaṭāvi evi punita ...pu 9
sarvenā svāmi shrihari re, sarvenā kahāviyā shyāma...pu 10
sarvenā niyaṅtā nāthaji re, sarvenāṅ kariyāṅ kāma...pu 11
svāminārāyaṉa nāmano re, sikko besāriyo āpa ...pu 12
e nāmane je āsharyāṅ re, tenā te ṭāḏiyāṅ tāpa...pu 13
dhāmi je akṣara dhāmanā re, teṉe āpyo ch̄e ānaṅda...pu 14
akhaṅḍa ānaṅda āpi jivane re, kāpyāṅ bhāre bhavaphaṅda ...pu 15
khātāṅ vaḏāvyāṅ ch̄e khoṭanāṅ re, khari karāvi ch̄e khāṭya ...pu 16
baṅdha kidhāṅ bijāṅ bāraṉāṅ re, vaheti kidhi akṣara vāṭa ...pu 17
tama ṭāḏyuṅ trilokanuṅ re, prakāshi puraṉa brahma...pu 18
aṅdhāruṅ rahyuṅḫtuṅ āvari re, te gayuṅ thayuṅ sugama...pu 19
suraja sahajānaṅdaji re, āpe thayā ch̄e udyota ...pu 20
purvani dishāe pragaṭyā re, khoṭā te karyāṅ khadyota ...pu 21
aṣāḍhi meghe āvi karyāṅ re, ʝāʝāṅ bijāṅ ʝākaḏa...pu 22
pura chālyāṅ pr̥thvi upare re, dhoyāṅ dharatinā maḏa...pu 23
gāja vija ne varasavuṅ re, agama sugama karyuṅ soya ...pu 24
sahu janane sukha āpiyuṅ re, duḥkhi rahyuṅ nahi koi...pu 25
dharmano ḍhola suṉāviyo re, devā lāgyā pote dāta ...pu 26
durbaḏanāṅ duḥkha kāpiyāṅ re, na joi jāta kujāta...pu 27
dhanya dhanya mārā nāthaji re, dhanya uddhāriyā jana...pu 28
dhanya dhanya ā avatārane re, bhale maḏyā bhagavāna...pu 29
vāri vāri jāuṅ vāraṉe re, karyāṅ amārāṅ kāja...pu 30
ghaṉe hete ghanashyāmaji re, maḏyā alabelo āja...pu 31
kahie mukhethi keṭaluṅ re, āpiyo ch̄e je ānaṅda...pu 32
niṣkuḏānaṅda jāya vāraṉe re, saheje maḏyāṅ sahajānaṅda...pu 33

title: sakhi gokuḏa gāmanuṅ bhāgya, nava jāye kaḏiyuṅ re; ...ṭeka
content:
232. rāga : garabi dhoḏa
sakhi gokuḏa gāmanuṅ bhāgya, nava jāye kaḏiyuṅ re; ...ṭeka
vhāle sarve lokathi sarasa, karyuṅ naṅda phaḏiyuṅ re...ṭeka
sakhi nitya nitya naṅdane dvāra, utsava thāya re; ...sakhi-1
uṭhe ānaṅda keri ch̄oḏa, gopio gāya re...sakhi-1
sakhi dhanya ā bhuminā bhāgya, jyāṅ hari nāche re; ...sakhi-1
tene nirakhi gopi govāḏa, raṅgamāṅ rāche re...sakhi-2
sakhi snehani najare nātha, sahune bhāḏe re; ...sakhi-1
ghaṉuṅ magana karyāṅ mastāna, kāḫnaḍa kāḏe re...sakhi-3
sakhi nitya nitya ānaṅda keḏya, kare avināshi re; ...sakhi-1
jenāṅ darshana kāraṉa deha, dame vanavāsi re...sakhi-4
sakhi shāradā nārada sheṣa, vrajaraja vaṅde re; ...sakhi-1
ji hāṅ mukatānaṅdano nātha, rame ānaṅde re...sakhi-5

title: ājani ghaḍi re dhanya ājani ghaḍi;
janama sudhāryo re ho māro, maḏiyāṅ naṭavara naṅda dulāro.
content:
234. rāga : garabi pada-1
janama sudhāryo re ho māro, maḏiyāṅ naṭavara naṅda dulāro.
karuṉā atishe re ho kidhi, bhavajaḏa buḍatāṅ bāṅya grahi lidhi...1
muja para aḍhaḏaka re ho ḍhaḏiyā, karuṉā kari ghera beṭhā maḏiyā...2
mana dr̥ḍha kariyuṅ re ho murāri, have huṅ thai rahi jagathi nyāri...3
ānaṅda uramāṅ re ho bhāri, shira para gāje girivaradhāri...4
nirabhe nobata re ho vāgi, kahe muktānaṅda bhramaṉā bhāṅgi...5

title: bhramaṉā bhāṅgi re ho haiyāni, nathi e keḫne vāta kahyāni.
content:
235. pada-ra
bhramaṉā bhāṅgi re ho haiyāni, nathi e keḫne vāta kahyāni.
viti hoya te re ho jāṉe, aṉa samajyā mara irṣyā āṉe...1
je rasa munivara re ho māṉe, vāḫle māre sugama karyo ā ṭāṉe...ra
premijanano re ho pyāro, mujane maḏiyā naṅda dulāro ...3
mahārasa mujane re ho āpyo, saṅshaya bhrama samuḏo kāpyo...4
have huṅ mahāsukha re ho pāmi, maḏiyā muktānaṅdanā svāmi...pa

title: mahāsukha mujane re ho āpyuṅ, saṅkaṭa janma maraṉanuṅ kāpyuṅ.
content:
236. pada-3
mahāsukha mujane re ho āpyuṅ, saṅkaṭa janma maraṉanuṅ kāpyuṅ.
puṉya puravanā re ho maḏiyā, maḏatā tāpa hr̥dayanā ṭaḏiyā...1
darshana durlabha re ho pāmi, have māri sakaḏa vedanā vāmi ...2
ānaṅda uramāṅ re ho bhāri, have huṅ na rahuṅ koini vāri ...3
harisaṅga hete re ho baṅdhāṉi, have mane na game biji vāṉi...4
akhaṅḍa evātana re ho didhuṅ, kahe muktānaṅda kāraja sidhuṅ...5

title: bāṅya grahi ch̄e re ho vāḫle, karuṉā kari naṭavara naṅdalāle.
content:
237. pada-4
bāṅya grahi ch̄e re ho vāḫle, karuṉā kari naṭavara naṅdalāle.
have nahi koini re oshiyāḏi, shira para viṭhṭhalavara vanamāḏi ...1
bhava brahmānā re ho svāmi, mujane maḏiyā aṅtarajāmi...ra
ghera ghera lokaḍāṅ re ho kahe ch̄e, meṉuṅ mune naṅdanā naṅdananuṅ de ch̄e...3
lāja na manamāṅ re ho āṉuṅ , atishe bhāgya bhaluṅ kari jāṉuṅ...4
koi vidhi na rahi re ho khāmi, maḏiyā muktānaṅdanā svāmi...pa

title: mārāṅ puṉya udaya thayāṅ pāch̄alāṅ re,
content:
238. rāga : garabi
mārāṅ puṉya udaya thayāṅ pāch̄alāṅ re,
mune pragaṭa maḏyāṅ mahārāja re; suṅdaravara mārā shrihari re...ṭeka -1
jenāṅ darshana durlabha devane re, moṭā munivara dhare nitya dhyāna re...suṅdara-1
jenā shiva brahmā puje pāvalā re, sheṣa shārada nigama guṉa gāya re...suṅdara-2
evā akhila bhuvananā adhipati re, puruṣottama parabrahma rāya re...suṅdara-3
māyā kāḏa karamanā preraka pote re, kṣara akṣaranā ātamārāma re...suṅdara-4
kr̥pā karine bhutaḏamāṅ padhāriyā re, karavā patitone puraṉa kāma re...suṅdara-5
āvyā pragaṭa pratāpa dekhāḍavā re, utāravā bhumino evo bhāra re...suṅdara-6
ruḍā dharama dharā para sthāpavā re, devā premānaṅdane sukha apāra re...suṅdara-7

title: hari bhajatāṅ sahu moṭapa pāme, janma maraṉa duḥkha jāye re
content:
239. rāga : sāmeri pada-1
hari bhajatāṅ sahu moṭapa pāme, janma maraṉa duḥkha jāye re
pārasa parasi loha kaṅchana thai, moṅghe mule vechāye re. hari 1
muni nāradani jātane jotāṅ, dāsi putra jaga jāṉe re
harine bhaji harinuṅ mana keḫvāṉā, veda purāṉa vakhāṉe re. hari ra
rādhāji ati prema magana thai, ura dhāryāṅ giradhāri re
harivara vari haritulya thayāṅ, jenuṅ bhajana kare naranāri re. hari 3
shāmaḏiyāne sharaṉe je āve, tenāṅ te bhavaduḥkha vāme re
muktānaṅdanā nāthane maḏatāṅ, akhaṅḍa evātaṉa pāme re. hari 4

title: premi janane vasha pātaḏiyo, shyāma suṅdara sukhakāri re
content:
240. pada-ra
premi janane vasha pātaḏiyo, shyāma suṅdara sukhakāri re
jāti varaṉane rupe na riʝe, prabhujine bhakti pyāri re. premi 1
prema na nipaje desha videshe, prema na hāṭe vechāya re
premanā pāsaṅgamāṅ je shira soṅpe, te jana premi thāya re. premi 2
premani vāta suṉi parikṣita, savaḏi samajaṉa nava lidhi re
samajine shukajie rasane chakhāḍyo, mokṣani rita kahi didhi re. premi 3
vrajavanitānā premani āge, uḍyā koṭi kabirā re
muktānaṅda e premano māraga, samaje te saṅta sudhirā re. premi 4

title: prema bhakti jene ghaṭa āve, tehane raṅga hari rāche re
content:
241. pada-3
prema bhakti jene ghaṭa āve, tehane raṅga hari rāche re
vrajavanitā karatāḏi bajāve, naṭavara thei thei nāche re; prema 1
moṭā munivara deha damine, ātmadarshana icch̄e re
piṅḍa brahmāṅḍathi prita taje paṉa, premano rāha na prich̄e re, prema ra
premano māraga shukaji prich̄e, kāṅ prich̄e vrajanāri re
muni nārada rahe magana prema vasha, kāṅ vr̥ṣabhānakumāri re. prema 3
premani āgaḏa sādhana sarve, ravi āgaḏa jema tārā re
muktānaṅda kahe premano māraga, prich̄e te prabhujine pyārā re. prema 4

title: ḍhāḏa : jene joie te āvo mokṣa māgavā re lola
prabhu pragaṭa thayā ch̄e ā same re lola;
āja kaḏiyugamāṅ parachā pure prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e; ...ṭeka.
content:
244. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
āja kaḏiyugamāṅ parachā pure prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e; ...ṭeka.
premi bhaktoni hāmuṅ pure prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e...ṭeka.
jāmanagara jātarānuṅ dhāma ch̄e, svāmi maṅdiramāṅ shri ghanashyāma ch̄e; -1
didho paracho poṣa sudi ekādashi prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e-1
vipra kanyā ʝaverabāi nāma ch̄e, kacch̄a piyarane sāsaruṅ ā gāma ch̄e; -1
bhāve bhajati ekalaḍi nitya prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e-2
purva karma maṭe kema bhāvi, thayo ʝāmara ne āṅkhe khoṭa āvi; -1
thāya piḍā aṅgoaṅga sahāya karajo prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e-3
vaidya ḍokṭarone āṅkhaḍi batāvi, sahue opareshana karavā samajāvi; -1
ch̄eḍāvrata āja ch̄uṭe lāja rākho prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e-4
darshana ekādashine dina didhuṅ, vahāle vanitānuṅ rupa dhari lidhuṅ; -1
pharyāṅ pradakṣiṉā premi bhakta sāthe prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e-5
harie nākhyuṅ ṭipuṅ nija hāthe, mahā amr̥tamaya hātha muki māthe; -1
duḥkha kāpyuṅ sukha āpyuṅ dinānāthe prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e-6
premadāni piḍā sarve ṭāḏi, thayā vanitā rupe vanamāḏi; -1
thayā bhechaka vaidyo āṅkha bhāḏi prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e-7
murkha loko ā vāta nahi māne, juo āṅkhe jai sāṅbhaḏo shuṅ kāne; -1
khari khātri kari ch̄e māvadāne prabhuji, svāminārāyaṉa satya ch̄e-8

title: jitanā diyā sarakāra ne muja ko, itani meri okāta nahiṅ; ...1
content:
245. rāga : bhupāli
jitanā diyā sarakāra ne muja ko, itani meri okāta nahiṅ; ...1
ye to karama hai unakā varanā, muja meṅ aisi bāta nahiṅ...1
jākara unako darape dekho, saba ki bigaḍi banati hai
teri bigaḍi bāta banānā, unake liye koi bāta nahiṅ hai...2
jaba mauja pe āi vo lahere, katare ko samaṅdara kara ḍālā; ...1
ye unaki rita purāni hai jise, khāli dekhā bhara ḍālā...3
mere kāli kamali vāle ne kyā kyā, jahāṅ pe kara ḍālā; ...1
ye bena mere ākā ki, maṅgato ko tavaṅgara kara ḍālā...4

title: kaḏā aparaṅpāra vāḫlā emāṅ, pahoṅche nahi re vichāra;
dhanya dhanya darabāra dādāno, saṅtono utāro re
content:
247. rāga : bhairavi
dhanya dhanya darabāra dādāno, saṅtono utāro re
ramyā jamyā ne bhamyā jiyāṅ, puruṣottama pyāro re. dha 1
uttara dakṣiṉa dvāra suṅdara, purva pashchima dvāra shobhe re
liṅba taruni shiḏi ch̄āyā, nirakhatāṅ mana lobhe re. dha 2
dhanya oraḍā ne dhanya oṅsari, jyāṅ sabhā saji nāthe re, dha 1
vachanāmr̥ta rasapāna karāvyuṅ, saṅtajana rākhi sāthe re. dha 3
ubhi oṅsarie saṅta paṅkti ope, hari pirase hāthe re
nānā pāḍe ṭhāma saṅtāḍe, tene to reḍe māthe re. dha 4
dhanya dhanya e akṣara oraḍi, jyāṅ shriji nivāsa karatāṅ re
dhanya e kupa gaṅgājaḏiyo, jyāṅ snānavidhi anusaratāṅ re. dha 5
gopinātha rupe shriji shobhe, baṅsi lidhi hāthe re
āṅṭi pagani vāḏi ubhā, rādhāji ne sāthe re. dha 6
ā tirthasthānanāṅ darshana karine, chitte je chitavana karashe re
nārāyaṉa dāsa kahe tenā, saṅtāpa shriji harashe re. dha 7

title: ḍhāḏa : āja māruṅ bhāgya alaukika sajani....
content:
248. rāga : garabi
ḍhāḏa : āja māruṅ bhāgya alaukika sajani....
dhanya dhanya e gaḍhapuravāsi, goviṅdane mana gamatā re
prabhu parāyaṉa jivana jenāṅ, muki manani mamatā re. dhanya 1
gaḍhapuravāsi premanā pyāsi, jagasukhathi e udāsi re
bhitara bhaktibhāva tapāsi, ahiṅ rahyā avināshi re. dhanya 2
tana mana dhana prabhune soṅpi, hari ājñā kadi na lopi re
aṅtarani icch̄ā lidhi āṭopi, anuvr̥tti eni opi re. dhanya 3
premanā to e puraṉa dariyā, vishuddha bhāve bhariyā re;
mahārāja maḏye aṅtara ṭhariyāṅ, saṅsāra siṅdhu tariyā re. dhanya 4
ā premijananā padani raja, moṭā munivara icch̄e re
lakṣminārāyaṉadāsa kahe ch̄e, premi ene prich̄e re. dhanya 5

title: puruṣottama pote pragaṭyā, svayaṅ murti sākṣāt;
content:
249. rāga : garabi
puruṣottama pote pragaṭyā, svayaṅ murti sākṣāt;
puru.. 1
soḏe kaḏā saṅpuraṉa, kahyāmāṅ nāḫve vāta...puru .. 1
māri peḫliveḫli āvine, mata paṅtha māthe mekha; puru.. 1
melāvyā māna mahaṅtanā, asada bhekha guru ṭeka...puru .. 2
dharma ekāṅtika thāpiyo, dharā upara dharma lāla; puru.. 1
ukheḍyā muḏa adharmanā, kāmane kidho behāla...puru .. 3
kāma krodha lobha moha māna, vāṅkā mevāsi asura; puru.. 1
jiti brahmā bhava indrane, mānamāṅ phare magarura...puru .. 4
evā asura āja māriyā, shuṅ jāṉe matimaṅda; puru.. 1
prabaḏa pratāpa dekhāḍiyo, svāmi sahajānaṅda...puru .. 5
anaṅda jivane odhāriyā, sharaṉe āvyā joḍi hātha; puru.. 1
mahā sukha didhāṅ nija janane, premānaṅdane nātha...puru .. 6

title: harini hāṭaḍie māre rojanuṅ haṭāṉuṅ;
content:
250. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
harini hāṭaḍie māre rojanuṅ haṭāṉuṅ;
puru.. 1
joyuṅ ke na joyuṅ meṅ to, ṭāṉuṅ ke kaṭāṉuṅ...ṭeka.
pr̥thvi pavanane pāṉi āpe, saune ulaṭa āṉi; ...harini...1
koya di na māgyuṅ enuṅ, nārāyaṉe nāṉuṅ...harini...1
bāḏāvayamāṅ moḍhuṅ bokhuṅ, āpyuṅ mānuṅ dhāvaṉa chokhkhuṅ; ...harini...1
dāṅtani saṅgāte didhuṅ, chāvavā chavāṉuṅ...harini...2
game tyāṅthi goti goti, haṅsalāne āpe moti; ...harini...1
kiḍione kaṉaki kaṉaki, hāthione māṉuṅ...harini...3
dhaṉi meṅ dhāryo ch̄e nāmi, vyādhi didhi saghaḏi vāmi; ...harini...1
maḏiyuṅ piṅgaḏane moṭi, peḍhinuṅ ṭhekāṉuṅ...harini...4
shri naranārāyaṉadeva mahātmyanāṅ kirtano
prāgaṭya divasa : chaitra vada-9

title: ḍhāḏa : joyā shri dharmakumāra chaturavara...
content:
251. rāga : dhanāshri pada-1
ḍhāḏa : joyā shri dharmakumāra chaturavara...
pragaṭa bhaya do vira, badripati pragaṭa bhaye do vira; ...badri 1
nara nārāyaṉa rupa alaukika, suṅdara gaura sharira...badri 1
chaitra shukala navamiki nishi, saba jaga hāri pira; ...badri 1
brāhmaṉamuhurta joga siddhi ravi shubha, janmeu shyāma sudhira.. badri 2
dharma ahiṅsā karata nuch̄āvara, bhai devanaki bhira; ...badri 1
bājāṅ bhera sharanāi nobata, bājata mr̥ṅdaga gaṅbhira.. badri 3
gāvata suratriya gita manohara, uḍata gulāla abira; ...badri 1
brahmānaṅda kahe hari pragaṭe, agaṉita bhuvana amira.. badri 4

title: bhayeu pragaṭa dou bhrāta, dharmaghara bhayeu pragaṭa dou bhrāta; ..dharma 1
content:
252. pada-2
bhayeu pragaṭa dou bhrāta, dharmaghara bhayeu pragaṭa dou bhrāta; ..dharma 1
nara nārāyaṉa putra nirakhake, harakhe ahiṅsā māta..dharma 1
prauḍha pratāpa praphullita kāṅti, ch̄abi barani nahiṅ jāta; ..dharma 1
sheṣa suresha maheshvara shāradā, nārada muni guna gāta..dharma 2
dharmar̥ṣi dhara hota kutuhala, deva sumana varaṣāta; ..dharma 1
nautama raṅga apsarā nāchata, aṅtara ati harakhāta..dharma 3
ahiṅsā māta mana mudita bhai jyuṅ, dekhata dagana aghāta; ..dharma 1
brahmānaṅda kahe jāke sutako, pāra nigama nahi pāta..dharma 4

title: nara nārāyaṉa shyāma, pragaṭa bhaye nara nārāyaṉa shyāma; ...pragaṭa 1
content:
253. pada-3
nara nārāyaṉa shyāma, pragaṭa bhaye nara nārāyaṉa shyāma; ...pragaṭa 1
bājata bājāṅ adhika badhāi, dharma r̥ṣike dhāma...pragaṭa 1
shri naranārāyaṉadeva mahātmyanāṅ kirtano
