muktānaṅda mohananā duḥkhathi re, kema kari gokuḏa rahie....saiyara. 04

title: kānuḍo keḍa na ch̄oḍe, saiyara māro kānuḍo keḍa na ch̄oḍe;
content:
699. pada-7
kānuḍo keḍa na ch̄oḍe, saiyara māro kānuḍo keḍa na ch̄oḍe;
neṉuṅ sathe neṉa joḍe...saiyara.
ch̄āṅnā te ch̄āṅnā kari ch̄amakalaḍāṅ re, ʝāline bāṅhya maroḍe....saiyara. 01
aṉa toḍyo vāṅse āvine re, baṅsi bajāvi tāna toḍe....saiyara. 02
āvo eno to aḏavilo re, have chaḍyo ch̄e moha ghoḍe....saiyara. 03
muktānaṅda maṭuki mahini re, bhuja bhari bhiḍatāṅ phoḍe....saiyara. 04

title: ḍhāḏa : jaḏakamaḏa ch̄āṅḍi jāne...
content:
700. rāga : bhairava pada-1
ḍhāḏa : jaḏakamaḏa ch̄āṅḍi jāne...
naṅdanā naṅdana sāthe, pritaḍi baṅdhāṉi re;
miṭhuṅ miṭhuṅ boli māruṅ, mana lidhuṅ tāṉi re. naṅda ṭeka.
raṅganā raṅgilā keri, baṅsi vanamāṅ vāgi re
dhiraja rahi na huṅ to, ʝabakine jāgi re. naṅda 1
moralimāṅ maṅtra bhaṉi, kāṅi mune kidhuṅ re
laṭakāḏe mana māruṅ, laṭakāmāṅ lidhuṅ re, naṅda 2
tanaḍuṅ veṅdhāṉuṅ māruṅ, ghāyala thai ch̄uṅ re
koḍilā kahānāne dekhi, mohine rahi ch̄uṅ re. naṅda 3
guṅge jema guḍa khādho, te to shuṅ vakhāṉe re
brahmānaṅda kero vahālo, aṅtarani jāṉe re. naṅda 4

title: manaḍuṅ mohyuṅ ch̄e māruṅ, naṅdane dulāre re;
content:
701. pada-2
manaḍuṅ mohyuṅ ch̄e māruṅ, naṅdane dulāre re;
dekhi ne lobhāṉi huṅ to, neṉune najāre re. mana ṭe
chaṭaka raṅgilo pheṅṭo, pāghaḍali pechāḏi re
chakita thai ch̄uṅ huṅ to, rasiyo nihāḏi re. mana 1
gharaḍāṅno dhaṅdho bhuli, moraline tāne re
lagani lāgi ch̄e māri, vahālājine vāne re. mana 2
raṅgano raṅgilo ch̄elo, aṅgane maroḍe re
neṉuṅ sāthe neṉāṅ āvi, jore jore joḍe re. mana 3
chittaḍuṅ choryāṅne arthe, dekhe dahāḍi daḍāhi re
brahmānaṅda kere vahāle, mohini lagāḍi re. mana 4

title: maṅdira padhāryāṅ māre, shyāmalo sohāgi re;
content:
702. pada-3
maṅdira padhāryāṅ māre, shyāmalo sohāgi re;
bhudharane bheṭi huṅ to, thai baḍa bhāgi re. maṅdira ṭeka.
muja para aḍhaḏaka, ḍhaḏiyā dina jāṉi re
raṅgane raṅgile rākhyuṅ, mukhaḍānuṅ pāṉi re. maṅdira 1
mehera karine mune, potāni ṭherāṅvi re
bāṅhi grahine vahāle, hasine bolāvi re. maṅdira 2
kahānajine kāje meṅ to, sejaḍi sudhāri re
pritaḍi karine sarve, puri āshā māri re. maṅdira 3
rasiyāne raṅge meṅ to, jagata visāryo re
brahmānaṅda kere vahāle, janama sudhāryo re. maṅdira 4

title: jivuṅ ch̄uṅ rasilā tārā, mukhaḍāne joti re;
content:
703. pada-4
jivuṅ ch̄uṅ rasilā tārā, mukhaḍāne joti re;
haiḍānā hāra pyārā, nathaḍināṅ moti re. jivuṅ ṭeka
mukhaḍuṅ joine tāruṅ, mohyuṅ mana māruṅ re
piyara sāsariyuṅ sarve, thayuṅ mune khāruṅ re. jivuṅ 1
adhara-amr̥ta pine, thai huṅ to gheli re
niḥshaṅka thai ch̄uṅ lajjā, loka keri meli re. jivuṅ 2
naṭavara nirakhi tuṅne, ataṅra ṭhare ch̄e re
durijana loka dhoḏyāṅ, dāʝine mare ch̄e re. jivuṅ 3
mana-karma vachane huṅ, thai rahi tāri re
mukhaḍāṅ upara jāye, brahmānaṅda vāri re. jivuṅ 4

title: orā āvone suṅdarashyāma, ekāṅte maḏie re; ... 1
content:
704. rāga : garabi pada-1
orā āvone suṅdarashyāma, ekāṅte maḏie re; ... 1
vālā dina jāṉine dayāḏa, aḍhaḏaka ḍhaḏie re... 1
vāri murati tamāri māva, vasi dila more re; ... 1
huṅ to joine thai gulatāna, phulakere tore re... 2
kahānā tamane maḏyānā ch̄e koḍa, karine vātuṅ re;
... 1
vahālā tama vinā paḏa eka, nathi reḫvātuṅ re... 3
tame dilaḍānā dariyāva ke, ch̄ela ch̄ogāḏā re; ... 1
mārā manamānyā morāra, ch̄o maramāḏā re... 4
āvi tama sāthe alabela, prita baṅdhāṉi re; ... 1
mukha lāvaṉyatā joi māva, huṅ lobhāṉi re... 5
tame moṭā thai mahārāja, shuṅ lalachāvo re; ... 1
vālā brahmānaṅdanā nātha, hasi bolāvo re... 6

title: tārāṅ mukhaḍāni morāra, māyā lāgi re; ... 1
content:
705. pada-2
tārāṅ mukhaḍāni morāra, māyā lāgi re; ... 1
meṅ to lokaḍiyāṅni lāja, sarave tyāgi re... 1
have ch̄eḍo nāṅkhyo shisha, thai divāni re; ... 1
tāri ch̄abi alaukika ch̄ela, manaḍe māni re... 2
meṅ to tamathi bāṅdhi prita, bijethi toḍi re;
... 1
have shyāmaḏiyā tama sātha, bani ch̄e joḍi re... 3
vālā gāvo ch̄o suṅdara gita, alaukika laṭake re;
... 1
tārāṅ ch̄ogaliyāmāṅ ch̄ela, mana māruṅ aṭake re... 4
ch̄abi joine suṅdara shyāma, lobhāṉā ch̄e neṉāṅ re; ... 1
ruḍāṅ lāge ch̄e raṅgarela, vālā tārā veṉāṅ re... 5
alabelā prāṉa ādhāra, padhārone prite re; ... 1
vālā brahmānaṅdanā nātha, ramo rasa rite... 6

title: tāri āṅkhaḍali alabela, ati aṉiyāḏi re; ... 1
content:
706. pada-3
tāri āṅkhaḍali alabela, ati aṉiyāḏi re; ... 1
huṅ to garaka thai gulatāna, ke bhudhara bhāḏi re... 1
māthe lāla kasuṅbi pādha, torā laṭake re; ... 1
ch̄abi joine suṅdara shyāma, mana māruṅ aṭake re... 2
ruḍi keshara keri āḍa, ke bhāla birāje re; ... 1
joi mukhani shobhā māva, puraṉa shashi lāje re... 3
shobhe ghugharaḍino ghera, keḍe kaṅdore re; ... 1
gaḏe motiḍāṅni māḏa, chittaḍuṅ chore re... 4
shobhe suṅthaṉali soraṅga, rupāḏo reṅṭo re; ... 1
vahālā perine prāṉaādhāra, bhāveshuṅ bheṭo re... 5
vahālā brahmānaṅdanāṅ nātha, āvi sukha āpo re; ... 1
mane mera kari morāra, potāni thāpo re... 6

title: chālo chālo saiyarano sātha, vr̥ṅdāvana jaie re;
content:
707. pada-4
chālo chālo saiyarano sātha, vr̥ṅdāvana jaie re;
... 1
sakhi ch̄ela ch̄abilāne saṅga, haḏi maḏi gāie re... 1
vahālo juve ch̄e āpaṉi vāṭa, ubhā ch̄e vanamāṅ re; ... 1
sakhi āpaṉe sātha ekāṅta, maḏyānuṅ ch̄e manamāṅ re... 2
vahāle morali lidhi ch̄e hātha, vajāḍe ch̄e gheri re; ... 1
āvi ubhā ch̄e jamunāne tira, pitāṅbara peri re... 3
vahāle peryā ch̄e phulaḍānā hāra, bāṅdhyā ch̄e bāju re; ... 1
ene laḏake ch̄e kānamāṅhi, kuṅḍaḏiyāṅ kāju re... 4
vahāle mr̥galāṅ pamāḍyāṅ moha, baṅshine nāde re; ... 1
hari gāve ch̄e suṅdara gita, madhure sāde re... 5
harine heta karine hātha, ʝālyāno ch̄e hevā re; ... 1
sakhi brahmānaṅdano nātha, kahe ramavā jevā re... 6

title: kānuḍā keḍe pharavuṅ re, koithi na ḍaravuṅ...kānu.
content:
708. rāga : kāphi pada-1
kānuḍā keḍe pharavuṅ re, koithi na ḍaravuṅ...kānu.
durijana loka durbhāṣaṉa bole, te haiḍe nava dharavuṅ re...koi 1
sagāṅ kuṭuṅbi sarave saṅgāthe, hetalaḍuṅ paraharavuṅ re...koi 2
saṅsārithi sagapaṉa troḍi, kānakuṅvarathi karavuṅ re...koi 3
brahmānaṅda keḫ mana karma vachane, vraja jivanane varavuṅ re...koi 4

title: kānuḍā keḍe jāvuṅ re, samaji ch̄uṅ āvuṅ...kānu.
content:
709. pada-ra
kānuḍā keḍe jāvuṅ re, samaji ch̄uṅ āvuṅ...kānu.
mohananuṅ meṉuṅ māre māthe, koi diḫ bijāni nahi kāḫvuṅ re...sama 1
chauda lokamāṅ sarave abaḏā, tene varine khoṭi thāvuṅ re...sama 2
varie to naṭanāgara varie, akhaṅḍa evātana chāḫvuṅ re...sama 3
brahmānaṅda kahe avara puruṣane, varavāthi ruḍuṅ vikha khāvuṅ re...sama 4

title: kānuḍā keḍe chāli re, thai matavāli...kānu.
content:
710. pada-3
kānuḍā keḍe chāli re, thai matavāli...kānu.
huṅ jāṉuṅ lokaḍiyāṅ kālāṅ, loka kahe ch̄e mune kāli re...thai 1
je chāle kānuḍāni keḍe, teni khepa na jāya keḫdi khāli re...thai 2
shira jātāṅ naṭavara nahi ch̄oḍuṅ, ṭeka achaḏa ura ʝāli re...thai 3
brahmānaṅdanā nātha saṅgāthe, lāgi ch̄e raṅgaḍāni tāli re...thai 4

title: kānuḍā keḍe jāie re, shidane lajāie...kānu.
content:
711. pada-4
kānuḍā keḍe jāie re, shidane lajāie...kānu.
lāja vinā lokaḍiyā tethi, durbaḏa thai na dabāie re...shida 1
vrajajivanane bhajatāṅ vāre to, nāma tenuṅ lai nāhie re...shida 2
kahone sāruṅ shuṅ thavānuṅ, loka taṉi moṭāie re...shida 3
brahmānaṅda kahe niḥshaṅka thaine, goviṅdanāṅ guṉa gāie re...shida 4

title: odhāji ame shyāmane shuṅ kahi melyuṅ re...ṭeka
content:
712. rāga : mevāḍo pada-1
odhāji ame shyāmane shuṅ kahi melyuṅ re...ṭeka
āvuṅ karavuṅḫtuṅ jyāre, māravāḫtāṅ muḍha māre; piyuḍe na kidhuṅ paheluṅ re...odhāji 1
neṉāṅ kere bāṉe māri, vasha kidhi vrajanāri; gokuḏiyuṅ kari gayā gheluṅ re...odhāji 2
jādavomāṅ jai kari, sabaḏa shobhe ch̄e hari; kubajā shuṅ bāṅdhyuṅ beluṅ re...odhāji 3
muktānaṅda vrajanāri, bole ch̄e risani māri, sabaḏa sudhāryuṅ ch̄elluṅ re...odhāji 4

title: odhāji amane shyāma vinā sukha nāḫve...ṭeka
content:
713. pada-2
odhāji amane shyāma vinā sukha nāḫve...ṭeka
sagāṅ na diṭhāṅ sohāye, maṅdiriyuṅ khāvāne dhāye; bhojaniyuṅ te nava bhāve re...odhāji 1
rajanimāṅ niṅda tyāgi, lagani e sāthe lāgi; kāna na saṅdesho kāḫve re...odhāji 2
divāni thaine ḍoluṅ, bapaiyāni pere boluṅ; mohani lagāḍi māve re...odhāji 3
muktānaṅda māva pāse, amane koi rākhe vāse; kānane koi teḍi lāve re...odhāji 4

title: odhāji ame vāḫlāne vishvāse rahyāṅ re...ṭeka
content:
714. pada-3
odhāji ame vāḫlāne vishvāse rahyāṅ re...ṭeka
āvyāni avadhi didha, chittavr̥tti chori lidhi; kuḍāṅ kuḍāṅ veṉa kahyāṅ re...odhāji 1
lokaḍiyāṅni lāja ch̄oḍi, pritama shuṅ prita joḍi; māva sāru meṉāṅ sahyāṅ re...odhāji 2
rādhā jevi rāṉi tyāgi, kubajā shuṅ prita lāgi; te duḥkhe bharāya haiyāṅ re...odhāji 3
muktānaṅda vrajanāri, jāṉe ene brahmachāri; joga aṅga bhalā grahyā re...odhāji 4

title: odhāji evuṅ kubajāe shuṅ tapa kidhuṅ re...ṭeka
content:
715. pada-4
odhāji evuṅ kubajāe shuṅ tapa kidhuṅ re...ṭeka
evi buddhi ene āvi, mohanane mana bhāvi; shyāmane chaṅdana kidhuṅ re...odhāji 1
japa tapa joge kari, pragaṭa na pāme hari; seḫjamāṅ kāraja sidhuṅ re...odhāji 2
kamaḏānuṅ pada pāmi, bhogavyā sureshvara svāmi; adhara amr̥ta pidhuṅ re...odhāji 3
muktānaṅda sukha ch̄elluṅ, māvashuṅ baṅdhāya beluṅ; te to eṉe māgi lidhuṅ re...odhāji 4

title: naṅdabābāne mātā jashodāji sāṅbhare, mamatāni murati māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...1
content:
716. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
naṅdabābāne mātā jashodāji sāṅbhare, mamatāni murati māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...1
sonā rupānā ahiṅ vāsaṉa majānā, kāṅsāni thāḏi māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...2
ch̄appanabhoga ahiṅ svādanā bharelā, mākhaṉa ne misari māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...3
hirā motinā hāra majānā, guṅjāni māḏā māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...4
hirā māṉeka mukuṭa majānā, morapiṅch̄a pāgha māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...5
hāthi ne ghoḍā ahiṅ ʝule aṅbāḍie, gori gori gāvaḍi māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...6
sāraṅginā sura kevā majānā, vhāli vāṅsaḏi māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...7
rādhājine eṭaluṅ kahejo odhavaji, ami bhari āṅkha māri rahi gai gokuḏamāṅ...8

title: dura nagari baḍi dura nagari,
content:
717. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
dura nagari baḍi dura nagari,
kaise āvuṅ re kanaiyā teri gokula nagari, baḍi dura nagari....kaise...1
kināre chaluto kānā, pāyala mori bhiṅje (2); ....kaise
bichameṅ chalu to (2) baheṅ jāuṅ sagari, baḍi dura nagari....kaise...2
dhire se chalu to kānā, kamara mori lachake (2); ....kaise
ʝapaṭa chalu to (2) bhiga jāuṅ saghari, baḍi dura nagari....kaise...3
teri nagari meṅ kānā, chora basata hai (2); ....kaise
luṅṭa na le mori (2) natha dulari, baḍi dura nagari....kaise...4
rāta ko āvuṅ to kānā, ḍara mohe lāge (2);
....kaise
dinako āvuṅ to (2) dekhe sāri nagari, baḍi dura nagari....kaise...5
sakhi saṅga āvu kānā, sharama mohe lāge (2); ....kaise
akeli āvuṅ to (2) bhula jāuṅ nagari, baḍi dura nagari....kaise...6
bāi mirā kahe prabhu, giridhara nā guṉa (2); ....kaise
tumare darshana binā maiṅ (2) ho gai bāvari, baḍi dura nagari....kaise...7

title: he mane lāge ch̄e vhālo, jashodāno lālo; ......mādhava
content:
718. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
he mane lāge ch̄e vhālo, jashodāno lālo; ......mādhava
mādhava matavālo matavālo......mādhava
janama jelamāṅ thayo, toe khilato rahyo (2); ......mādhava
pach̄i pidho nirāshāno pyālo (2)......mādhava...1
choryā gopionā chitta, enā luṅṭyā navanita (2); ......mādhava
toye lāgyo saune e vhālo (2)......mādhava...2
dharyo govardhana hātha, bhari indra sāthe bātha (2); ......mādhava
ch̄atāṅ nāno gāyono govāḏo (2)......mādhava...3
kidho kurukṣetra jaṅga, rahyo pāṅḍavoni saṅga (2);
......mādhava
banyo pārtha bani sārathi nihāḏo (2)......mādhava...4
dharyuṅ sudarshana hātha, karyā kaṅika ne mahāta (2);
......mādhava
toye yashodāni pāse banyo kālo (2)......mādhava...5
virahanāṅ kirtano
shrihari svadhāmagamana : jeṭha suda-10

title: ḍhāḏa : jeṭhe jivana chāliyā....
eka dina sabhā kari shri hari, bolyā vāṉi pote balavira;
content:
720. rāga : dhoḏa pada-1
eka dina sabhā kari shri hari, bolyā vāṉi pote balavira;
thai dilagira..shriji kahe saṅtane 1
sarve saṅta harijana sāṅbhaḏo; māre keḫvāni ch̄e eka vāta, sāchi sākṣāta..shri 2
sarve karavānuṅ kāma kari rahyo; nathi bāki rahyuṅ lavalesha, suṉo upadesha..shri 3
dhyāna dhāraṉā jogani jugati; saune shikhavi meṅ kari prita, parama punita..shri 4
moṭā moṭā mahārudra ghaṉā karyāṅ; didhāṅ brāhmaṉane ghaṉāṅ dāna, kari sanmāna..shri 5
naranārāyaṉādika devanāṅ; kidhāṅ maṅdira moṭāṅ apāra, kari ati pyāra..shri 6
desho deshamāṅ ḍaṅko vagāḍiyo; svāminārāyaṉa raṭe nāma, jana āṭho jāma..shri 7
matapaṅthi moṭā moṭā jitiyā; lidhā ch̄oḍi tenā shiṣya jana, mumukṣu pāvana..shri 8
āpyāṅ parachā ghaṉāne meṅ ā same; noḫtā diṭhā noḫtā suṉyā kāna, dhare muni dhyāna..shri 9
sarve adharma bhumino ṭāḏiyo; thāpyo dharma dharā para shuddha, vakhāṉe vibuddha..shri 10
sauaiaine mokṣano paṅtha dekhāḍiyoe; āṅkhyuṅ miṅchi sahu jāya, sukhi ati thāya..shri 11
māri murtio meṅ sthāpana kari; temāṅ akhaṅḍa rahuṅ kari vāsa, ṭāḏuṅ jamatrāsa..shri 12
vaḏi dharmanuṅ kuḏa teḍāviyuṅ; moṭā bāṅdhava rāmapratāpa, icch̄ārāma āpa..shri 13
beu bhrātanā putrane laine; kidhā dattaputra kari pyāra, nishchaya niradhāra..shri 14
moṭā bhrātanā avadhaprasādaji; nānā bhrātanā shri raghuvira, mahā dr̥ḍha dhira..shri 15
te banne suputrane laine; sthāpyā gādie kari pyāra, adhika udāra..shri 16
desha saṅta sahu vaheṅchi āpiyā; mārā tulya jāṉi tatakheva, karoe sahu seva..shri 17
rahejo vachana pramāṉe sahu maḏi; jema keḫ tema karajo jarura, kari māna dura..shri 18
shikṣāpatri jāṉo māri murati; vāṅchi vartajo sahu naranāra, lopo mā lagāra ..shri 19
moṭā moṭā gayā taji dehane; rāma-kr̥ṣṉādika avatāra, anaṅta apāra..shri 20
tema huṅ paṉa ā tana tyāgine; jāṉo jāisha akṣaradhāma, tajine ā ṭhāma ..shri 21
lesha klesha vāṅse karasho nahiṅ; rahuṅ satsaṅga māṅhi sadāya, karine ucch̄āva...shri 22
koi snehe kari tana tyāgashe; to te pāmashe kaṣṭa apāra, vachana lopanāra..shri 23
sau saṅpa rākhi satsaṅgamāṅ; karo karāvo sau satsaṅga, karine umaṅga..shri 24
muki satsaṅga dura jāuṅ nahiṅ; rahuṅ pāsa kari nita vāsa, jāṉi mārā dāsa..shri 25
thoḍā dina pach̄i vaḏi tamane; teḍi rākhisha huṅ māri pāsa, thāsho na udāsa..shri 26
ema avināshānaṅdano nāthaji; bolyāṅ vāṉi te vajra samāna, bhulyā suṉi bhāna..shri 27

title: suṉi vāṉi te shri ghanashyāmani, sau saṅta thaine udāsa keḫch̄e;
content:
721. pada-2
suṉi vāṉi te shri ghanashyāmani, sau saṅta thaine udāsa keḫch̄e;
lai lai shvāsa.. shriji tame sāṅbhaḏo 1
tame jivanā jivana jagapati; sharaṉāgata pālaka shyāma, sadā sukhadhāma..shri 2
peḫluṅ amr̥ta pāine pritathi; have ʝera na pāsho jarura, dayā kari dura..shri 3
tama vinā je jagatamāṅ jivavuṅ; tethi maravuṅ bhaluṅ mārā nātha, kahie joḍi hātha..shri 4
vāḫlā hasavuṅ tamāruṅ je heravuṅ; te to visare nahiṅ paḏa eka, karine viveka..shri 5
joi tamane divasa vāḫlā jāya ch̄e; dile thāya ch̄e sukha apāra, prāṉanā ādhāra..shri 6
jeha vāta kari tame vālamā; tene suṉi tape ghaṉuṅ tana, muṅʝāya ch̄e mana..shri 7
nishche meline jāsho jo nāthaji; ʝuri ʝuri paḍashe tana, vinā darashana..shri 8
jaḏa vinā nokhi paḍi māch̄ali; tene dudhamāṅ sukha na thāya, jarura jiva jāya..shri 9
vāḫlā pati vinā sati vanitā; tene duḥkhanā divasa jāya, shāṅti nava thāya..shri 10
jema chaṅdra vijogi chakorane; jāṉo chogaṉi chiṅtā te chitta, kahie kari prita..shri 11
jema kara vinā kari duḥkhiyo; vaḏi pāṅkha vinā paṅkhi dina, manamāṅ malina..shri 12
jema āṅkha vinā jana āṅdhaḏo; tene sukha nahi lavalesha, kāyā pāme kalesha..shri 13
jema chakravarti bhupālane; eka putra hoya mari jāya, tene kevuṅ thāya..shri 14
jema saritā nira vinā vaḏi; jana dekhi pāme mana trāsa, hoya ati pyāsa..shri 15
jema veli daʝāṉi dāhamāṅ; pāch̄i lili keḫdi nava thāya, joi nava jāya..shri 16
jema chaṅda vinā jāṉo jāmani; vaḏi dipaka vinānuṅ ghara, dekhi lāge ḍara..shri 17
jema ravi vinā dina jāṉie; tema tama vinā ame nātha, duḥkhi sahu sātha..shri 18
tama vinānuṅ sukha trilokamāṅ; thāya ʝera te shyāma sujāṉa, pyārā jana prāṉa..shri 19
tame mukine jāo jo dhāmamāṅ; tajie ame tarata prāṉa, dharamakula bhāṉa ..shri 20
paṉa ājñā adri ullaṅghatāṅ; bahu lāge ch̄e manamāṅ bika, kahie ṭhikāṭhika..shri 21
āvuṅ nā ghaṭe tamane ā same; sharaṉāgata mukine shyāma, jāvuṅ nija dhāma..shri 22
vāḫlā viraha ame kema veṭhie; kyāre lesho āvine saṅbhāḏa, dinanā dayāḏa..shri 23
tame taraṉa tāraṉa tribhuvana taṉāṅ; sarve sukhanā sāgara shyāma, ati abhirāma..shri 24
tame kartā-akartā ch̄o nāthaji; nathi tamārā upara koi, kahie chitta proi..shri 25
jema sukha thāya sau sāthane; tema karajoe veḫlo upāya, kahie lāgi pāya..shri 26
ghaṉuṅ shuṅ kahie tamane nāthaji; tame aṅtarajāmi anupa, sadā sukharupa..shri 27
suṉi araji te nirmohi saṅtani; pach̄i avināshānaṅdano nātha, muki saṅta sātha, ..shri28
shriji gayā dhāmamāṅ..shri 28

title: pātaḏiye haryāṅ prāṉa re, beni mārā... pāta ṭeka.
content:
722. rāga : paraja pada-1
pātaḏiye haryāṅ prāṉa re, beni mārā... pāta ṭeka.
muja sāmuṅ vāḫle joine māryāṅ, āṅkhalaḍināṅ bāṉa re...beni 1
laṭakāḏe re mune chaṭaki lagāḍi, ch̄ele chatura sujāṉa re...beni 2
shāmaḏiyāne jovā sāru, tanaḍāmāṅ thāye ch̄e tāṉa re...beni 3
brahmānaṅda kahe aṅtara viṅdhyuṅ, ḍolariye divāna re...beni 4

title: dilaḍānā dariyāva re, giridhara...dila ṭeka.
content:
723. pada-2
dilaḍānā dariyāva re, giridhara...dila ṭeka.
jagajivana ruḍi shobhā joine, aṅtara thāye ch̄e uch̄āva re...gira 1
rupa rahyuṅ ch̄e māre rudiye tāruṅ, rupāḏā vrajarāva re...gira 2
prāṉa jātāṅ re pātaḏiyā pyārā, meluṅ nahi keḫdi māva re...gira 3
brahmānaṅda kahe shirane sāṭe, ṭhika kidhela ṭherāva re...gira 4

title: rupāḏo raṅgarela re, vhālo lāge...rupāḏo ṭeka.
content:
724. pada-3
rupāḏo raṅgarela re, vhālo lāge...rupāḏo ṭeka.
āvi varasyo ch̄e aṅtara māre, khāṅtilāno khela re...vhālo 1
soneri shira pheṅṭo bāṅdhi, ubho ch̄e alabela re...vhālo 2
viṭhṭhalane vrajanārie gheryo, jema kaḏāyela ḍhela re...vhālo 3
brahmānaṅda kahe suṉatā baṅsi, adhara ḍole ch̄e māri hela re...vhālo 4

title: shyāmaḏiyo saradāra re, ch̄e jo māre...shyāma ṭeka.
content:
725. pada-4
shyāmaḏiyo saradāra re, ch̄e jo māre...shyāma ṭeka.
shyāmaḏiyā shuṅ meṅ to sagapaṉa kidhuṅ, bijāno sho have bhāra re...ch̄e...jo 1
maramāḏo re māre manaḍe mānyo, kahāno naṅdakumāra re...ch̄e...jo 2
prāṉajivana pātaḏiyo pyāro, nyāro na karuṅ lagāra re...ch̄e...jo 3
brahmānaṅda kahe vāri nākhuṅ, e māthe gharabāra re...ch̄e...jo 4

title: sakhi kārataka māse kaṅtha, piyu gayāṅ parahari; ...1
content:
726. ḍhāḏa : virahano pada-1
sakhi kārataka māse kaṅtha, piyu gayāṅ parahari; ...1
sakhi upanyuṅ duḥkha atyaṅta, kaṅgāla mune kari...1
sakhi piyu gayā paradesha, saṅdesho na meliyo; ...1
sakhi haiḍe duḥkhano haṅmesha, reṉāvara reliyo...2
sakhi nayaṉe vahe ch̄e nira, udāsi aṅtare; ...1
sakhi shāma vinānuṅ sharira, paḍyuṅ parataṅtare...3
sakhi have saluṉā sātha, bhāve kyāre bheṭashuṅ; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano nātha, maḏye duḥkha meṭashuṅ...4

title: sakhi māgashare manamāṅya, chiṅtavaṉi chittamāṅ; ...1
content:
727. pada-2
sakhi māgashare manamāṅya, chiṅtavaṉi chittamāṅ; ...1
sakhi dilamāṅ lāgyo dāya, prajaḏuṅ huṅ pritamāṅ...1
sakhi aṅtara lāgi āga, viyoganā vrehani; ...1
sakhi nathi ugaravā jāga, āja āvi bani...2
sakhi vaṉamāgye vaḏi mota, āja māre āviyuṅ; ...1
sakhi marashuṅ dāʝe sota, kene na jāye kayuṅ...3
sakhi haiḍuṅ rahe kema hātha, vipata keṭali veṭhashuṅ; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano nātha, maḏye duḥkha meṭashu...4

title: sakhi poṣe piḍāye paṅḍa, dila daradi thayuṅ; ...1
content:
728. pada-3
sakhi poṣe piḍāye paṅḍa, dila daradi thayuṅ; ...1
sakhi piyu dai gayā daṅḍa, koḫ kema jāye sahyuṅ...1
sakhi bhitara māri bhāla, ghāyala kari gayā; ...1
sakhi amane āpi ā hāla, lāla aḏagā rahyā...2
sakhi kuvāmāṅ ghāli varata, vāḫliḍe vāḍhiyo; ...1
sakhi ā jivāḍyāthi tarata, kāṅ prāṉa na kāḍhiyo...3
sakhi prita kari ama sātha, pecha rākhi peṭashuṅ; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano nātha, maḏye duḥkha meṭashuṅ...4

title: sakhi māha māse mahā duḥkha, upanyuṅ aṅgamāṅ; ...1
content:
729. pada-4
sakhi māha māse mahā duḥkha, upanyuṅ aṅgamāṅ; ...1
sakhi shyāma shuṅ letāṅ sukha, ramatāṅ je raṅgamāṅ...1
sakhi saṅbhāratāṅ e sukha, phāṭe māri ch̄ātaḍi; ...1
sakhi kyāre besi sanmukha, karashuṅ jo vātaḍi...2
sakhi āṉi āṅkhe alabela, joshuṅ jo jivanane; ...1
sakhi ch̄ogalāvāḏo ch̄ela, maḏye sukha manane...3
sakhi maḏashuṅ bhari jyāre bātha, shoka to sameṭashuṅ; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano nātha, maḏye duḥkha meṭashuṅ...4

title: sakhi phāgaṉa māsanāṅ phula, dekhi dila ḍoliyuṅ; ...1
content:
730. pada-5
sakhi phāgaṉa māsanāṅ phula, dekhi dila ḍoliyuṅ; ...1
sakhi shiyāṅ karuṅ have shula, na jāya boliyuṅ...1
sakhi aṅtarani vāto āja, kahetāṅ āve lājaḍi; ...1
sakhi māri jāṉe ch̄e mahārāja, dilani je dāʝaḍi...2
sakhi nathi re rahevātuṅ jo neka, amathi eke ghaḍi; ...1
sakhi vāḫle na karyo viveka, roi khoi āṅkhaḍi...3
sakhi gharaghara gavāye gātha, vasaṅta varati rahyāṅ; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano nātha, haji kema nāḫviyā...4

title: sakhi chaitare chiṅtā thāya, kaho kema karie; ...1
content:
731. pada-6
sakhi chaitare chiṅtā thāya, kaho kema karie; ...1
sakhi dina upara dina jāya, dhiraja kema dharie...1
sakhi piyu viyoge paḏa, jāya juga jevaḍi; ...1
sakhi dāʝine uṭhe ch̄e dala, ghaṉuṅ ghaḍi ghaḍi...2
sakhi phaḍaki uṭhuṅ paḍe phāḏa, piyu paradeshaḍe; ...1
sakhi aṅtara uṭhe ch̄e ʝāḏa, sukha nahi saṅdeshaḍa...3
sakhi evaḍaluṅ ama sātha, karine kema gayā; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano nātha, haji kema nāḫviyā...4

title: sakhi vaishākha māse vāṭa, joine ʝāṅkhi thai; ...1
content:
732. pada-7
sakhi vaishākha māse vāṭa, joine ʝāṅkhi thai; ...1
sakhi alabelā vinā uchāṭa, ghāṭa shame nahiṅ...1
sakhi chāle prachaṅḍa pavana, udāsi āpavā; ...1
sakhi vāḫlā viyoganā dana, kaṭhaṉa thayā kāpavā...2
sakhi āvyā unāḏānā dana, lāgi lu ʝaravā; ...1
sakhi vāḫlā vinā tape tana, ṭhāma nahiṅ ṭharavā...3
sakhi ā re veḏā ama sātha, mohana mana bhāviyā; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano nātha, haji kema nāḫviyā...4

title: sakhi jeṭha māse jo jarura, na maḏuṅ huṅ nātha shuṅ; ...1
content:
733. pada-8
sakhi jeṭha māse jo jarura, na maḏuṅ huṅ nātha shuṅ; ...1
sakhi ema upaje ch̄e ura, maruṅ mārā hāthashuṅ...1
sakhi chaḍi uṅche āvāsa, paṅḍa meluṅ paḍatuṅ; ...1
sakhi prāṉa jāya piyu pāsa, deha rahe naḍatuṅ...2
sakhi ema āve ati roṣa, kaho kema karie; ...1
paṉa vāḫlā upara dai doṣa, ema kema marie...3
sakhi amane kari anātha, sāthe kene rahyāṅ; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano nātha, haji kema nāḫviyā...4

title: sakhi aṣāḍhe āviyo megha, mora lāgyā bolavā; ...1
content:
734. pada-9
sakhi aṣāḍhe āviyo megha, mora lāgyā bolavā; ...1
suṉi vrehinā shabdano vedha, dala lāgyuṅ ḍolavā...1
sakhi bapaiyā kare bakora, piyu piyu jape; ...1
sakhi sāṅbhaḏi teno shora, kāḏaja māruṅ kaṅpe...2
sakhi gājavije varasāda, āvyo ati umaṅgi; ...1
sakhi maḏi meghali rāta, nāḫvyo māro saṅgi...3
sakhi āvi bani māre āja, piyu nahi sāthaji; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano rāja, nāḫve kāṅ re nāthaji...4

title: sakhi shrāvaṉe sahu veli vana, tr̥ṉa lilāṅ thayāṅ; ...1
content:
735. pada-10
sakhi shrāvaṉe sahu veli vana, tr̥ṉa lilāṅ thayāṅ; ...1
sakhi ame sukāṉāṅ tana, vāḫlā vināṅ rahyāṅ...1
sakhi nadie chālyāṅ pura, sarovara sau ch̄alyāṅ; ...1
paṉa jeno piyu gayo dura, duḥkha tene bahu maḏyāṅ...2
sakhi sho karie upāya, auṣadha enuṅ nahiṅ maḏe; ...1
sakhi piyu gayā lagāḍi dāya, paṅḍa teṉe parajaḏe...3
sakhi karatā na suje kāja, na rahyuṅ haiyuṅ hāthaji; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano rāja, nāḫve kāṅ re nāthaji...4

title: sakhi bhādarave bhāgyuṅ baḏa, rahyāṅ roi roine; ...1
content:
736. pada-11
sakhi bhādarave bhāgyuṅ baḏa, rahyāṅ roi roine; ...1
sakhi vāḫle na mukyo vaḏa, kaiḫye shuṅ koine...1
sakhi vilasi vilakhi vāḫlā kāja, ʝurine ʝāṅkhi thai; ...1
jema nāḫviyā mārā rāja, te paṅḍa paḍyuṅ nahiṅ...2
sakhi vajrathi thai visheṣa, phāṭe nahi ch̄ātaḍi; ...1
sakhi kaṭhaṉa karamani rekha, te āja āvi naḍi...3
sakhi valavali āviyāṅ vāja, ame anāthaji; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano rāja, nāḫvyā kema nāthaji...4

title: sakhi āsoe ānaṅdakaṅda, maḏi jo vadhāmaṉi; ...1
content:
737. pada-12
sakhi āsoe ānaṅdakaṅda, maḏi jo vadhāmaṉi; ...1
teṉe āviyo māre ānaṅda, manamāṅ phuli ghaṉi...1
sakhi toraṉa baṅdhāvuṅ bāra, ajavāḏuṅ oraḍā; ...1
māre maṅdira padhāryāṅ morāra, khoshi phula toraḍā...2
sakhi laṭakaṅto āviyo lāla, hoṅshilo hete hasi; ...1
ene nirakhine thai ch̄uṅ nihāla, haiḍe rahi hulasi...3
sakhi sarave saryāṅ mārāṅ kāja, bheṭi bhari bāthaji; ...1
sakhi niṣkuḏānaṅdano rāja, maḏyā muṅne nāthaji...4

title: jeṭhe jivana chāliyā, nirmohi mārā nātha;
aṣāḍhe alabelaḍā, pavana chāle ati jora;
shrāvaṉa varase saravaḍe, nadie nira na māya;
bhādaravāmāṅ bhudharā, nadie chālyāṅ nira;
sharada r̥tu sohāmaṉi, āvyo āso māsa;
kārataka māse kānaji, vāṭa jue vrajanāra;
māgashara mahino āviyo, beṭhi rata hemaṅta;
poṣa mahine premadā, here vāṭa haṅmesha;
māha mahināmāṅ māvaji, bole saṅta vasaṅta;
phāgaṉe phāga ramāḍavā, āvone prāṉa ādhāra;
chaitara mahine shyāmaḏā, āvyāṅ nahiṅ avināsha;
vaishākhe vrajavanitā, paṅtha jue kari prita;
bāre māsa purā thayā, āvyo māsa adhika;
aṅtakāḏe āvi re saṅbhāḏi lejo shāmaḏā re, josho mā amārā avaguṉa shyāma; ...aṅta 1
content:
751. rāga : mevāḍo pada-1
aṅtakāḏe āvi re saṅbhāḏi lejo shāmaḏā re, josho mā amārā avaguṉa shyāma; ...aṅta 1
paṉa ch̄e potānuṅ re prabhuji tame pāḏajo re, adhama udhāraṉa karuṉānā dhāma...aṅta 1
gajane ch̄oḍāvyo re grāhanā mukha thaki re, karatāṅ kāṅi aradha nāma ucchāra; ...aṅta 1
evi rite āvo re suṅdara shāmaḏā re, vāṭaḍi jou ch̄uṅ vāraṅvāra...aṅta 2
nārāyaṉa nāme re udhāryo ajāmeḏane re, karatāṅ te putra taṉo re pokāra; ...aṅta 1
evuṅ te vichāri re alabelā āvajo re, amāre ch̄e tamāro ādhāra...aṅta 3
doyali veḏāmāṅ re dinānāthaji re, kahone ame keni karie āsha ? ...aṅta 1
muktānaṅdanā svāmi re suṅdara shāmaḏā re, abaḏāne teḍi rākho pāsa...aṅta 4

title: doyali veḏāmāṅ re koi kenuṅ nathi re, jyāre kare jamaḍā āvine jora; -doyali 1
content:
752. pada-2
doyali veḏāmāṅ re koi kenuṅ nathi re, jyāre kare jamaḍā āvine jora; -doyali 1
teṉi veḏā āvi re dayāḏu muja dinani re, bāṅhya grahi rahejo naṅdakishora-doyali 1
jyāre tuṭe nāḍi re ʝalāi jāya jibhaḍi re, vāje kapha sahita shvāsano ghora; -doyali 1
sagāṅ ne saṅbaṅdhi re lāge sahu luṅṭavā re, kuḍā kuḍā karine shora bakora-doyali 2
svārathanāṅ sagā re sarve saṅsāramāṅ re, tama vinā juṭhā sarve jana; -doyali 1
tame ne tamārā re jana prabhu paramārathi re, bije nava māne māruṅ mana-doyali 3
trāhi trāhi kari re pokāruṅ joi tama bhaṉi re, sevakani karajo shyāma saṅbhāḏa; -doyali 1
muktānaṅdanā svāmi re jāṉa sujāṉa ch̄o re, varṉave ch̄e veda dinadayāḏa-doyali 4

title: ā avasara re dayāḏu dayā kari re, ṭāḏavāne janmamaraṉanāṅ tāpa
content:
753. pada-3
ā avasara re dayāḏu dayā kari re, ṭāḏavāne janmamaraṉanāṅ tāpa
vāhane chaḍine re āvo ch̄o mārā vālamā re, nārāyaṉa nāma japatāṅ jāpa-ā 1
anekane āvyā re aṅtasame teḍavā re, sāthe saṅtajanano sātha
evā te tamārā re guṉa anaṅta apāra ch̄e re, sāṅbhaḏatāmāṅ sarve thāya sanātha-ā 2
adhama jāti re uddhāri bahu nārine re, jene niṅde shāstra veda purāṉa
guṉa ne avaguṉa re nātha gaṉatā nathi re, sharaṉe āvyānā shyāma sujāṉa-ā 3
karuṉārasane re pragaṭa karyo kānaji re, karavāne aneka janano uddhāra
muktānaṅdanā vahāle re mahāsukha āpiyuṅ re, kari nitya navalā neha vihāra-ā 4

title: bhalene padhāryāṅ re giradhara gājatā re, have mune kari kr̥tāratha kāna; 0 3
content:
754. pada-4
bhalene padhāryāṅ re giradhara gājatā re, have mune kari kr̥tāratha kāna; 0 3
nayaṉāṅ ṭhare ch̄e re nāthane nirakhatāṅ re, jenuṅ nitya dharine rahetā dhyāna-bhalene 1
duḥkhaḍānā dahāḍā re have to dura gayā re, lidhi ch̄elach̄abile māri sāra; 0 3
jivana joine re jaga juṭho thayo re, tama saṅga lāgyo raṅga ekatāra-bhalene 2
kamaḏā sarakhi re kari mune kānaji re, grahi guṉavaṅta māro hātha; 0 3
bhaluṅ māruṅ bhāgya re phaḏyuṅ koi kāḏanuṅ re, pāmi pati akhila bhuvanano nātha-bhalene 3
akhaṅḍa sohāgi re tamane je jāṉashe re, māṉashe mahāsukha moja apāra; 0 3
muktānaṅda kahe ch̄e re tamane parahari re, bhavajaḏa koi na pāme pāra-bhalene 4

title: ḍhāḏa : pātaḏiye haryāṅ prāṉa re...
content:
755. rāga : paraja
ḍhāḏa : pātaḏiye haryāṅ prāṉa re...
mohanajine maḏavāne, bhudharajine bheṭavāne talape ch̄e māruṅ mana
rātre na āve niṅdarā re, divase na bhāve anna. ho beni...1
sutā beṭhāṅ jāgatā re, bhitara māṅhe bhajana; beni...1
lochana rahyāṅ lalachāine re, jovāne jivana. ho beni...2
ʝaṅkhe ch̄e māro jivaḍo re, vāḫlānuṅ jovāne vadana; beni...1
diṭhā vinā dāʝe dalaḍuṅ re, kema kari kāḍhuṅ dana. ho beni...3
bhudharajine bheṭavā re, manasubo kare mana; beni...1
niṣkuḏānaṅdanāṅ nāthashuṅ re, kyāre leshuṅ āliṅgana. ho beni...4

title: sajani shriji mujane sāṅbharyāṅ re, haiḍe harakha rahyo ubharāya; sa 1
content:
756. rāga : garabi pada-1
sajani shriji mujane sāṅbharyāṅ re, haiḍe harakha rahyo ubharāya; sa 1
neṉe āṅsuni dhārā vahe re, virahe manaḍuṅ vyākuḏa thāya...sa 1
suṅdara murti shrimahārājani re, suṅdara kamaḏa sarikhāṅ neṉa...sa 2
suṅdara karatā laṭakāṅ hāthanāṅ re, suṅdara amr̥ta sarikhāṅ veṉa...sa 3
shi kahuṅ shobhā aṅgoaṅga taṉi re, nirakhi lāje koṭika kāma...sa 4
hasatāṅ hasatāṅ heta vadhāratā re, evā sukhanidhi shrighanashyāma...sa 5
sadā shvetāṅbara shriji dhāratā re, aṅbara jarakasiyāṅ koi vāra...sa 6
gucch̄a kalaṅgi torā khosatā re, gajarā bāju gulābi hāra...sa 7
e ch̄abi jovā talape āṅkhaḍi re, madhurāṅ vachana sāṅbhaḏavā kāna...sa 8
e hari maḏavāne haiḍuṅ tape re, premānaṅdanā jivanaprāṉa...sa 9

title: manaḍuṅ murtimāṅ vaḏagi rahyuṅ re, chiṅtavana karavā chitta ātura; manaḍuṅ 1
content:
757. pada-ra
manaḍuṅ murtimāṅ vaḏagi rahyuṅ re, chiṅtavana karavā chitta ātura; manaḍuṅ 1
taruṉa manohara murti nāthani re, rājivalochana jobanapura ...manaḍuṅ 1
soḏe chiḣna sahita ati shobhati re, suṅdara charaṉakamaḏani joḍa...manaḍuṅ 2
haḏavi rahine hete chāṅpati re, kyāre have purashe mananā koḍa ...manaḍuṅ 3
piṅḍi jānuṅ nitya nirakhati re, ruḍā sāthaḏa chiḣna sahita...manaḍuṅ 4
shyāma kaṭi joi jādavarāyani re, nitya nitya nautama upaje prita...manaḍuṅ 5
uṅḍi nābhi kamaḏa sarikhaḍi re, trivaḏi nirakhi udaramāṅya...manaḍuṅ 6
ch̄āti upaḍati ati opati re, have kyāre bhuja grahi bātha bharāya...manaḍuṅ 7
mukhani shobhā joi mahārājani re, lāje paṅkaja puraṉachaṅda...manaḍuṅ 8
nāsā neṉa bhruha joi bhālane re, jāya balihāri premānaṅda...manaḍuṅ 9

title: sajani nimakha na visare nāthaji re, nitya navā taruṉapaṉānā khela; sa 1
content:
758. pada-3
sajani nimakha na visare nāthaji re, nitya navā taruṉapaṉānā khela; sa 1
ā osariye āvi besatā re, ā ḍholiḍe naṭavara ch̄ela...sa 1
ā takiyo te vāṅse melatā re, ā māḏā pheravatā shyāma...sa 2
gātā goṭhiḍānā sāthamāṅ re, ghere sāde puraṉakāma...sa 3
ā mojaḍiyuṅ vahālo paheratāṅ re, ā ch̄aḍi letā karavaramāṅya...sa 4
ā pādukā peḫri āvatā re, māre maṅdira muninā rāya...sa 5
ā phaḏiyāmāṅ ghoḍi pheravatā re, māṉaki matavāli mahārāja...sa 6
saṅtani sabhā kari āṅhi besatā re, shrihari suranara muni shiratāja ...sa 7
kirtana munivarane gavarāvatā re, bheḏā gātā sahajānaṅda...sa 8
evā dharmakuṅvara hari upare re, tana mana vāri premānaṅda...sa 9

title: laṭakāṅ laṭakāḏā ghanashyāmanāṅ re, khaṭake uṅḍā aṅtaramāṅya; laṭakāṅ 1
content:
759. pada-4
laṭakāṅ laṭakāḏā ghanashyāmanāṅ re, khaṭake uṅḍā aṅtaramāṅya; laṭakāṅ 1
prita kari mujane bolāvatā re, te saṅbhāri bahu duḥkha thāya. laṭakāṅ 1
ā sajyā te shri mahārājani re, ā bājoṭhe besatā lāla. laṭakāṅ 2
ā ṭhekāṉe nāḫtā naṭavaraji re, lutā aṅga kara lai rumāla. laṭakāṅ 3
ā ṭhekāṉe jamavā besatā re, jamatā vidhavidhanā pakavāna. laṭakāṅ 4
suṅdara shāka kari vaṅtākanā re, jamine detā prasādi kahāna. laṭakāṅ 5
ā khaḏakhaḏiye nāḫtā nāthaji re, nāhine harijana muni lai sātha. laṭakāṅ 6
āvatā māṉekachokamāṅ malapatāṅ re, purajana thātāṅ joi sanātha. laṭakāṅ 7
vahālo besatā jai phula bāgamāṅ, re paheratā gajarā gulābi hāra. laṭakāṅ 8
jema jema sāṅbhare tema thāya vedanā re, premānaṅdanāṅ prāṉa ādhāra. laṭakāṅ 9

title: ḍhāḏa : ḍaṅko didho te virā vāch̄arā
content:
760. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
ḍhāḏa : ḍaṅko didho te virā vāch̄arā
āja so so varṣonāṅ vāṉāṅ vāi gayā, toye jāṉe haju kāla savārani vāta re;
sahajānaṅda svāmi, gaḍhapura jotāṅ ja shriji sāṅbhare...ṭeka
eno e darabāra enā e oraḍā, enā e toraṉa chākaḏāṅ hiṅḍoḏā khāṭa re..sahajānaṅda-1
eno e liṅbaḍo ne akṣara oraḍi, enā e gādi takiyā raṅgatapāṭa re..sahajānaṅda-2
sādhu brahmachāri pāḏāni sāthamāṅ, khāṅtilo āṅhi khelatā raṅga khela re..sahajānaṅda-3
āja suno darabāra sunā e oraḍā, sunā dise āja ghelā nadinā ghāṭa re..sahajānaṅda-4
lakṣmivāḍi lāḍilā lālani, poḍhyā jiyāṅ pātaḏiyo muja prāṉa re..sahajānaṅda-5
gaṅgājaḏie harine gotiyā, jaḏashaiyāmāṅ joyā jivana prāṉa re..sahajānaṅda-6
guṉiyala murti re gopināthani, darshana karye shānta dila thāya re..sahajānaṅda-7
māge kara joḍi māvadānaji, shriji sadāye rahejo māri sahāya re..sahajānaṅda-8

title: nirakhi nayaṉāne tr̥pti nā vaḏe re lola... ṭeka.
content:
761. ḍhāḏa : jananini joḍa sakhi nahi jaḍe re lola...
nirakhi nayaṉāne tr̥pti nā vaḏe re lola... ṭeka.
murti mādhuri eni ramya re, shrijinā sneha mane sāṅbhare re lola
dayānā bharela enāṅ dilaḍāṅ re lola, āṅkhaḍi bharela amirela re. shri-1
ghoḍale chaḍine ghele paravare re lola, khāṅte khele te niramāṅya re. shri-2
gaḍhapura gāma kere goṅdare re lola, ʝaṅkhati jue jana bhiḍa re. shri-3
dādāne darabāra dipatā re lola, ḍholiyo ḍhaḏāvi bese bahāra re. shri-4
pharati phaḏimāṅ eka liṅbaḍi re lola, ch̄āyāmāṅ jāme bhakta bhiḍa re. shri-5
tulasini māḏā māgi pherave re lola, kheṅche toḍine koi dina re. shri-6
gāye vājiṅtra sātha maṅḍaḏi re lola, chapaṭi vajāḍi vāḫlo gāya re. shri-7
āṅṭo laine alabelaḍo re lola, pheṅṭo bāṅdhine bane ch̄ela re. shri-8
suṉatā kathā te hare bolatā re lola, ḍole magana suṉi marma re. shri-9
āpi āshiṣa rāji thai jatā re lola, saṅtane bheṭe te bhari bātha re. shri-10
dayā dharine thatā ākaḏā re lola, devāne anna dhana vastra re. shri-11
ʝaḍie te brahmarasa varṣato re lola, ʝiline ʝilāve vasaṅta re. shri-12

title: sheri bhali paṉa sāṅkaḍi re, nagara bhaluṅ paṉa dura re;
content:
762. rāga : mevāḍo pada-1
sheri bhali paṉa sāṅkaḍi re, nagara bhaluṅ paṉa dura re;
eka vāra gaḍhaḍe padhārajo re... ṭeka. kesariyā
sherie āvatāṅ shobhatā re, ghoḍalie asavāra re... kesariyā...1
māṉeka chokamāṅ malapatā re, uḍe ch̄e abila gulāla re... kesariyā...2
osarie ḍholiyo ḍhaḏāvatā re, besatāṅ bahu vāra re... kesariyā...3
gopināthanāṅ maṅdiriyāṅ re, tama vinā sunāṅ dekhāya re... kesariyā...4
sahajānaṅdaji sujāṉa ch̄o re, brahmānaṅdanā rāya re... kesariyā...5

title: sunuṅ mukyuṅ tame gaḍhaḍuṅ re, kyāṅ gayā dharmakumāra re;
content:
763. pada-2
sunuṅ mukyuṅ tame gaḍhaḍuṅ re, kyāṅ gayā dharmakumāra re;
shāmaḏiyā, suṉo kahuṅ eka vinaṅti re... ṭeka. shāmaḏiyā
unmatta gaṅgānā niramāṅ re, lilā karatāṅ apāra re... shāmaḏiyā...1
tama vinā puranā janane re, anna viṣa tulya thāya re... shāmaḏiyā...2
akṣara oraḍimāṅ besatāṅ re, tama vinā suni dekhāya re... shāmaḏiyā...3
rāja mārgamāṅ chālatāṅ re, sarve muni chāre pāsa re... shāmaḏiyā...4
brahmānaṅdanā nāthaji re, āvo vahelā avināsha re... shāmaḏiyā...5

title: sahajānaṅdaji sukharupa ch̄o re, shobhātaṉāṅ shaṉagāra re;
content:
764. pada-3
sahajānaṅdaji sukharupa ch̄o re, shobhātaṉāṅ shaṉagāra re;
mohanavara, dayā kari darshana āpajo re... ṭeka. mohana
purve kahyuṅ tuṅ uddhavane re, laisha bijo avatāra re... mohana...1
puruṣottama tame pragaṭi re, karyāṅ sahunāṅ kāja re... mohana...2
sukhasāgara ghanashyāmaji re, bhaktonā sukha jahāja re... mohana...3
shriji tame bhakti dharmathi re, bhupara dharyo avatāra re... mohana...4
brahmānaṅda kahe māre tama thaki re, aṅtare sukha apāra re... mohana...5

title: ḍhāḏa : sunuṅ mukyuṅ tame gaḍhaḍuṅ re...
content:
765. rāga : dhoḏa
ḍhāḏa : sunuṅ mukyuṅ tame gaḍhaḍuṅ re...
ch̄oṭi uṅmaramāṅ māvaji re, meli chālyā gharabāra re;
shāmaḏiyā ch̄ela ch̄apaiye padhārajo re. ṭeka.
prabhāte prabhuji padhāriyā re, adhamano karavā uddhāra re. shāma 1
vanani vāṭe vālo chāliyā re, āṉi aṅtaramāṅ uṅmaga re. shāma 2
pagamāṅ paheri nahi mojaḍi re, aṅgarakhi nahi aṅga re. shāma 3
ekā eki chāli nisaryāṅ re, jovā rahyāṅ nahiṅ joḍa re. shāma 4
sutāṅ saṅbaṅdhine meliyāṅ re, purā karyāṅ nahi koḍa re. shāma 5
sakhā shodhe ghanashyāmane re, dilamāṅ thai dilagira re. shāma 6
kyāṅya maḏyā nahi māvaji re, neṉe vahe sahune nira re. shāma 7
rāmapratāpa rue ghaṉuṅ re, bhābhi rue gharamāṅhi re. shāma 8
ch̄oṭā baṅdhu icch̄ārāmaji re, rue kahi kahi bhāi re. shāma 9
shyāmane shaheramāṅ shodhiyā re, shodhiyā hāṭa bajāra re. shāma 10
anna jaḏa koi jame nahi re, neṉe vahe jaḏadhāra re. shāma 11
vanamāṅ vase ghaṉā dipaḍā re, siṅha suvara shiyāḏa sāpa re. shāma 12
tethi bisho mārā vālamā re, pāch̄ā vaḏi āvo bāpa re. shāma 13
tama vinā sahu duḥkhiyāṅ re, sagāṅ kuṭuṅba parivāra re. shāma 14
pelāṅ pritama sukha āpiyāṅre, ā same duḥkhano nahi pāra re. shāma 15
mātā vinā duḥkhi bāḏako re, nira vinā jema mina re. shāma 16
āṅkhyo vinā duḥkhi āṅdhaḏo re, tama vinā sau ema dina re.shāma 17
rāta divasa nāve niṅdarā re, dilamāṅ bahu duḥkha thāya re. shāma 18
badrinātha kahe tama vinā re, paḏa te kalpa sama jāya re. shāma 19

title: kyāre have dekhuṅ re, mārāṅ lochaniyāṅni āge nāthane kyāre... ṭeka
content:
766. rāga : paraja deshi pada-1
kyāre have dekhuṅ re, mārāṅ lochaniyāṅni āge nāthane kyāre... ṭeka
evāṅ sukr̥ta mārāṅ kyāre ude thāshe, maḏashuṅ bhuja bhari bāthane... kyāre
hete karine hari kyāre bolāvashe, melashe māthe beu hāthane... kyāre
evo divasa māre pāch̄o kyāre āvashe, melisha charaṉe jāi māthane... kyāre
premānaṅda kahe have jo maḏe, nimakha na meluṅ sukhapāthane... kyāre

title: kedi have joshu re, beni rasiyāji dharmakumārane... ṭeka kedi
content:
767. pada-2
kedi have joshu re, beni rasiyāji dharmakumārane... ṭeka kedi
janama suphaḏa tyāre jāṉashuṅ re sajani, joshu haiḍā kerā hārane... kedi
hāra paherāvi kyāre hete kari herashuṅ, neṉa taṉā shaṉagārane... kedi
ḍholiyā upara kyāre osariye birājashe, joshe potānā parivārane... kedi
premānaṅda āge kyāre gāisha, vajāḍi suṅdara sitārane... kedi

title: shrighanashyāma re mune, mohani lagāḍi mana lai gayā... ṭeka shri
content:
768. pada-3
shrighanashyāma re mune, mohani lagāḍi mana lai gayā... ṭeka shri
ch̄ela ch̄abile vahāle ch̄etari re sajani, kuḍā dilāsā mune dai gayā... shri
vāṭaḍiyuṅ joi joi uṭhi āṅkhyuṅ roi roi, shoke te prāṉa sukāi gayā... shri
keṭalā divasa mune prāṉajivananā, darashana vinā have thai gayā... shri
premānaṅda kahe shuṅ sukha levā, pāpiyā prāṉa vāṅse rahi gayā... shri

title: darashana āpo re, have dinabaṅdhu karuṉā kari... ṭeka dara
content:
769. pada-4
darashana āpo re, have dinabaṅdhu karuṉā kari... ṭeka dara
vadanakamaḏa dekhāḍo alabelā, hero amr̥ta najare bhari... dara
darashana vinā paḏa jugasama jāya ch̄e, di rāta jāye rovatāṅ hari... dara
darashana dāne kari duḥkhaḍā re ṭāḏo, dayāḏu dayā dilamāṅ dhari... dara
premānaṅda kahe joi mukha paṅkaja, laṭakāṅ upara huṅ jāuṅ mari... dara

title: araji ura dhāro re vahālā, avināshi abaḏātaṉi... ṭeka
content:
770. pada-5
araji ura dhāro re vahālā, avināshi abaḏātaṉi... ṭeka
rātadivasa ghanashyāma pokāruṅ, sāṅbhaḏajo samaratha dhaṉi... araji
darashana āpo dinānātha dayāḏu, have to hari thai ch̄e ghaṉi... araji
virahani vedanā ṭāḏo alabelaḍā, nātha padhāro baṉi ṭhaṉi... araji
premānaṅda kahe joi joi jivuṅ, shyāma chatura chiṅtāmaṉi... araji

title: shuṅ ghaṉuṅ kahiye re have, dharmakuṅvara ghanashyāmaji... ṭeka shuṅ
content:
771. pada-6
shuṅ ghaṉuṅ kahiye re have, dharmakuṅvara ghanashyāmaji... ṭeka shuṅ
aṅtarajāmi sukha sāgara svāmi, adhama uddhāraṉa nāmaji... shuṅ
nijajana jāṉi hari dayā ura āṉi, darashana āpo sukhadhāmaji... shuṅ
bahunāmi nija biruda vichāro, pāvana puraṉakāmaji... shuṅ
premānaṅda ghanashyāma tamāri, raṭaṉā lāgi ch̄e āṭhojāmaji... shuṅ

title: dharmakuṅvara kyāre āvasho, vhālā shyāma sujāṉa
content:
772. harigita
dharmakuṅvara kyāre āvasho, vhālā shyāma sujāṉa
tamare vinā mārā nāthaji, paḍyā paravasha prāṉa. dharmakuṅvara 1
virahe vyākuḏa chitta māharuṅ, atishe akaḏāya
jivana tamane joyā vinā, ghaḍi jaṅpa na thāya. dharmakuṅvara 2
divase to dilamāṅ goṭhe nahi, rāta roi roi jāya
neṉe āṅsuni dhārā vahe, kyāṅya shāṅti na thāya. dharmakuṅvara 3
maṅdira mohana tama vinā, khāli khāvāne dhāya
nitye nishvāsa mukuṅ hari, keme divasa na jāya. dharmakuṅvara 4
vādhe ch̄e virahani vedanā, vhālā jāṉo jarura
kṣaṉa sharire khamāya nahi, na thāya duḥkha dura. dharmakuṅvara 5
jema chakorane chaṅda ch̄e, tema ch̄o tame nātha
vaṉadiṭhe akaḏāuṅ ch̄uṅ, chitta ch̄e tama sātha. dharmakuṅvara 6
dinadayāḏu kahi sadā, nigamāgama gāya
duḥkha dekhi shako dāsanuṅ, e āshcharya gaṉāya. dharmakuṅvara 7
vinati suṉi vhālā māhari, shrihari tatakheva
jivana jagadishānaṅdanā, dejo darshana deva. dharmakuṅvara 8

title: kyāre have dekhuṅ re hari hasatā, mārāṅ maṅdiriyāmāṅ vasatāṅ...kyāre
content:
773. rāga : ṭhumari
kyāre have dekhuṅ re hari hasatā, mārāṅ maṅdiriyāmāṅ vasatāṅ...kyāre
jarakasiyā jāmā peḫrine, guḍho reṅṭo kaṭi kasatāṅ...kyāre-1
phulaḍāmāṅ garakāva thaine, attaramāṅ masamasatāṅ...kyāre-2
munivara sāruṅ rasoi karāvine, paṅgatamāṅ pirasatāṅ...kyāre-3
premānaṅda āge gāve tyāre, āve orā orā khasatāṅ...kyāre-4

title: laine gayo mana prāṉare māvo mārāṅ laine ṭeka
content:
774. rāga-paraja pada-1
laine gayo mana prāṉare māvo mārāṅ laine ṭeka
prāṉa laine vhāle paravasha kidhi, bhuli huṅ tanaḍānuṅ bhāna re. māvo 1
joyā vinā re jivalaḍo jāya ch̄e, thāya ch̄e jo tanaḍāmāṅ tāna re. māvo 2
neṉāṅni āge koi āṉi melāve, suṅdara shyāma sujāṉa re. māvo 3
premānaṅdanā nāthani huṅto ch̄uṅ, dāma vināni vechāṉa re. māvo 4

title: kyāṅ gayo haiḍāno hāra re, beni māro kyāṅ gayo ṭeka
content:
775. pada-2
kyāṅ gayo haiḍāno hāra re, beni māro kyāṅ gayo ṭeka
haiḍāno hāra ghanashyāma ch̄abilo, neṉāṅtaṉo shaṉagāra re. beni 1
neha nibhāvaṉa nātha amāro, prāṉataṉo ādhāra re. beni 2
je sukha durlabha deva munine, te sukhano denāra re. beni 3
premānaṅdano prāṉajivana dhana, naṭavara dharmakumāra re. beni 4

title: āṅkhaḍiyuṅ akaḏāya re, joyā vinā. āṅkhaḍiyuṅ ṭeka
content:
776. pada-3
āṅkhaḍiyuṅ akaḏāya re, joyā vinā. āṅkhaḍiyuṅ ṭeka
rāta divasa jouṅ vāṭa vhālāni, āṅkhe āṅsuḍāṅ na sukāya re. joyā 1
suni seja joi maṅdiramāṅ re, kāḏajaḍuṅ korāya re. joyā 2
shrighanashyāmanuṅ vadana joyā vinā, paḏa paḏa jugasama jāya re. joyā 3
premānaṅda kahe tanaḍuṅ tape ch̄e, maḏavāne mohanarāya re. joyā 4

title: raheti nathi haiḍe dhirare, vhālama vinā. ṭeka
content:
777. pada-4
raheti nathi haiḍe dhirare, vhālama vinā. ṭeka
suṅdara murti saṅbhāruṅ huṅ jyāre, neṉe bharāi āve nira re. vhālama 1
hasavuṅ ne bolavuṅ jovuṅ vhālānuṅ, khaṭakech̄e jāṉiye tira re. vhālama 2
besatā hari āvi je je ṭhekāṉe, te dekhine dāʝe sharira re. vhālama 3
premānaṅdanā nātha vinā māre, vādhe ch̄e verahani pira re. vhālama 4

title: mukhaḍuṅ joyānuṅ hatuṅ nima re, dāḍi māre. ṭeka
content:
778. pada-5
mukhaḍuṅ joyānuṅ hatuṅ nima re, dāḍi māre. ṭeka
mukhaḍuṅ joyā vinā pāṉie na piti, chaṅdra ne chakora joti jema re. dāḍi. 1
vadana jovā ghanashyāma vhālānuṅ, raheti hājara emani ema re. dāḍi. 2
kāma ne kāja ghara bāra saṅsāra meṅ to, melyo paḍato jema tema re. dāḍi. 3
premānaṅdano nātha joyā vinā, have karisha huṅ kema re. dāḍi 4

title: koi dekhāḍo ghanashyāma re, moḏiḍāvāḏo koi dekhāḍo ghanashyāma re.. ṭeka
content:
779. pada-6
koi dekhāḍo ghanashyāma re, moḏiḍāvāḏo koi dekhāḍo ghanashyāma re.. ṭeka
shri ghanashyāma nārāyaṉa māre, sarave sukhano dhāma re.. re. moḏiḍā1
e sāruṅ gharabāra jagata sukha, sarave kidhuṅ meṅ harāma re. moḏiḍā2
shatru kaṅpe ch̄e jenuṅ nāma suṉine, māna krodhādika kāma re. moḏiḍā3
premānaṅdanā nātha vinā sarave, vyākuḏa gokuḏa gāma re. moḏiḍā4

title: kyāre have maḏashuṅ re mārā, ḍolariyāji sukhadeṉane...kyāre
content:
780. rāga : paraja pada-1
kyāre have maḏashuṅ re mārā, ḍolariyāji sukhadeṉane...kyāre
mina sarikhā ruḍāṅ chaṅchaḏa sohāmaṉāṅ, nirakhine joshuṅ kājuneṉane...kyāre
jamavāne ṭāṉe mune potāni prasādi, deshe madhurā kahi veṉane...karavā
pāse besine have prāṉa ādhārane, dekhuṅ shāmaḏiyā mārā seṉane...karavā
devānaṅda kahe bhāve kari bheṭashuṅ, mana māruṅ karavā sāruṅ meṉane...karavā

title: jovā sāruṅ jāshuṅ re ame, navala sanehi ghanashyāmane...jovā
content:
781. pada-2
jovā sāruṅ jāshuṅ re ame, navala sanehi ghanashyāmane...jovā
jogaṉa kero tana vesha dharine, giradhara vasavā kerā gāmane...jovā
lokaḍiyāni tāji lāja saṅsāramāṅ, karavuṅ meline gharakāmane...jovā
virahane tāpe dāḫḍi tanaḍuṅ tape ch̄e, aṅtara ṭharavā kerāṅ ṭhāmane...jovā
devānaṅda kahe dilaḍāmāṅ rākhashuṅ, doḫyali veḏānā kari dāmane...jovā

title: vhālā vinā vrehani re, mune aṅtara piḍā ati thāya ch̄e...vhālā
content:
782. rāga : paraja pada-1
vhālā vinā vrehani re, mune aṅtara piḍā ati thāya ch̄e...vhālā
sunā maṅdiriyāmāṅ seja bich̄āvela, bhāḏine chitta bharamāya ch̄e...vhālā...1
khātāṅ re pitāṅ beṭhāṅ sutā svapnāmāṅ, ʝabakine tarata jagāya ch̄e...vhālā...2
gharaḍāno dhaṅdho mane hātha na lāge, maḏavāne mana lalachāya ch̄e...vhālā...3
devānaṅda kahe kyāre have dekhashuṅ, jiva jarura akaḏāya ch̄e...vhālā...4

title: meli gayā māvo re, mune paravasha kari eni pritamāṅ...meli
content:
783. pada-2
meli gayā māvo re, mune paravasha kari eni pritamāṅ...meli
adhara sudhārasa pāyo alabelaḍe, hasine bolāvi ghaṉaṅ hetamāṅ...me...1
tanaḍuṅ ghume ch̄e eni moralinā tānamāṅ, garaka thai ch̄uṅ ruḍā gitamāṅ...me...2
rasika saluṉājini miṭhi mukhalāvani, chaṭaki lagāḍi mārā chittamāṅ...me...3
devānaṅda kahe nirdaya nāthaji, manaḍuṅ lobhāṉuṅ jagajitamāṅ...me...4

title: mere to tuma eka hi ‘ekaḫ ādhārā;
content:
784. rāga : bhairavi
mere to tuma eka hi ‘ekaḫ ādhārā;
nāva ke kāga ki gati bhai meri; jahāṅ dekhuṅ tahāṅ jalanidhi khārā. 1
rasika shiromaṉi tuma bina mo kuṅ; lagata he jagasukha jarata aṅgārā. 2
tuma mo kuṅ miliyo to ānaṅda atishe; bisarata saba duḥkha vāramavārā. 3
muktānaṅda kahe aṅtarajāmi; kahāṅ samajāvuṅ mere pritama pyārā. 4

title: uḍyo uḍyo ch̄oḍi sarave sātha, uḍyo meli bheruno saṅgātha;
hari bina koi na terā, samaja nara hari bina koi na terā;
content:
786. rāga : goḍi
hari bina koi na terā, samaja nara hari bina koi na terā;
sama 1
chāra dina ki chāṅdani bite, āge bahota aṅdherā...sama 1
manuṣya deha dayā kari dini, tāte cheta saverā; sama 1
aba ko avasara bhula jāyego, sahego duḥkha ghanerā...sama ra
bharatakhaṅḍa madhya janama diyo he, jahāṅ prabhu pragaṭa baserā; sama 1
naranārāyaṉa nāma raṭaṉa kari, pāra karo bhava pherā..sama 3
kāma krodha mada lobha māna taji, ho saṅtana kā cherā; sama 1
mukatānaṅda kahe mahāsukha pāve, māna bachana dr̥ḍha merā...sama 4

title: maiṅ huṅ ādi anādi, ā to sarve upādhi; ...ṭeka
content:
787. rāga : dhoḏa
maiṅ huṅ ādi anādi, ā to sarve upādhi; ...ṭeka
saḋguru miliyā anādi, miṭa gai sarve upādhi...ṭeka
kahāṅ kāṣṭa ne kahāṅ kuhāḍā, kahāṅ hai ghaḍananahārā; maiṅ hu 1
jabate moye saḋguru miliyā, miṭa gayā sarve chāḏā...maiṅ hu 1
koṉa kuḏa ne koṉa kuṭuṅbi, koṉa māta ne tāta; maiṅ hu 1
koṉa bhāi ne koṉa bhagini, brahma hamāri jāta...maiṅ hu 2
nahi rahyāṅ maiṅ nahi gayā maiṅ, nahi sudharyāṅ nahi bigaḍā; maiṅ hu 1
hame hamārā kuḏa saṅbhāryāṅ, mata karanā kou ʝaghaḍā...maiṅ hu 3
pānimeṅ se puruṣa banāyā, maḏamutra ki kyāri; maiṅ hu 1
milyā rāma ne saryāṅ kāma, aba na rahi kouse yāri...maiṅ hu 4
āge tapasi tapasā karatā, rahi gai kiṅchita kāmā; maiṅ hu 1
te kāraṉa ā naratana dhariyā, so jānata hai rāmā...maiṅ hu 5
je kārana ā naratana dhariyā, ve sariyā hai kāma; maiṅ hu 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe pragaṭa mile mohe, ṭaḏyā nāma rupa ṭhāma...maiṅ hu 6

title: haiyānā phuṭyā hari, saṅge heta na kidhuṅ...ṭeka
content:
788. rāga : garabi pada-1
haiyānā phuṭyā hari, saṅge heta na kidhuṅ...ṭeka
lakha chorāshi keruṅ lagaḍuṅ, māthe māgi lidhuṅ re...haiyānā 1
peṭane arthe pāpa karaṅtā, pāch̄uṅ phari nava joyuṅ; ...haiyānā ra
chāra divasanā jivatara sāru, mana māyāmāṅ mohyuṅ re...haiyānā ra
janma maraṉa duḥkha garbhavāsanuṅ, te nava shakiyo ṭāḏi; ...haiyānā ra
māta pitā juvati suta saṅge, visāryāṅ vanamāḏi re...haiyānā 3
āḏasa ne ajñāna atishe, kāma bagāḍyuṅ tāruṅ; ...haiyānā ra
devānaṅda kahe dekha vichāri, māna kahyuṅ tuṅ māruṅ re...haiyānā 4

title: duniyāmāṅ ḍāhyo, ḍahāpaṉamāṅ duḥkha pāme...ṭeka
content:
789. pada-ra
duniyāmāṅ ḍāhyo, ḍahāpaṉamāṅ duḥkha pāme...ṭeka
bhavatāraṉa bhagavāna visāri, chaḍiyo ṭhāle bhāme re...duniyāmāṅ 1
manuṣya deha maḏyo ati moṭo, khoṭo jāṉi khoyo; duniyāmāṅ 1
chore chauṭe juṭhuṅ bolyo, nāhaka nira valoyo re...duniyāmāṅ ra
hari harijana saṅge heta na kidhuṅ, pidhuṅ vikhanuṅ pāṉi; duniyāmāṅ 1
sukha saṅsāri pāmyā sāru, muā lagi dhara tāṉi re...duniyāmāṅ 3
harṣa shokani nadio moṭi, temāṅ jāya taṉāṉo; duniyāmāṅ 1
devānaṅda kahe hari bhajyā nahi, ghaṉe duḥkhe gherāṉo re...duniyāmāṅ 4

title: harijana sāchā re, je uramāṅ hiṅmata rākhe; vipate varachi re, keḫdi dina vachana nava bhākhe -1
content:
790. rāga : garabi pada-1
harijana sāchā re, je uramāṅ hiṅmata rākhe; vipate varachi re, keḫdi dina vachana nava bhākhe -1
jaganuṅ sukhaduḥkha re, māyika mithyā kari jāṉe; tana dhana jātāṅ re, aṅtaramāṅ shoka na āṉe-2
para upakāri re, jana prema niyamamāṅ purā; daihika duḥkhamāṅ re, dāʝe nahi sādhu shurā-3
harine samare re, nita ahonisha umaṅga bhariyāṅ; sarva tajine re, naṭanāgara vahālā kariyāṅ-4
brahmānaṅda kahe re, evā harijanani balihāri; mastaka jātāṅ re, nava mele ṭeka visāri-5

title: ṭeka na mele re, te marada kharā jagamāṅhi; trividhi tāpe re, keḫdi aṅtara ḍole nāhi-1
content:
791. pada-2
ṭeka na mele re, te marada kharā jagamāṅhi; trividhi tāpe re, keḫdi aṅtara ḍole nāhi-1
nidhaḍaka varate re, dr̥ḍha dhiraja manamāṅ dhāri; kāḏa karmani re, shaṅkā te deve visāri-2
moḍuṅ vaheluṅ re, nishche kari eka dina maravuṅ; jaga sukha sāru re, keḫdi kāyara mana nava karavuṅ-3
aṅtara pāḍi re, samajine savaḏi āṅṭi; māthuṅ jātāṅ re, mele nahi te nara māṭi-4
koini shaṅkā re, keḫdi manamāṅ te nava dhāre; brahmānaṅdanā re, vahālāne paḏa na visāre-5

title: jo hoya hiṅmata re, narane uramāṅhi bhāri; dr̥ḍhatā joine re, teni madada kare morāri-1
content:
792. pada-3
jo hoya hiṅmata re, narane uramāṅhi bhāri; dr̥ḍhatā joine re, teni madada kare morāri-1
bika tajine re, nita hiṅmata soto bole; mastaka māyā re, sarve tr̥ṉa jevuṅ tole-2
kesari siṅhane re, jema shaṅkā mile nahi manamāṅ; ekāeki re, nirabhe thai vichare vanamāṅ-3
paṅḍe ch̄oṭo re, moṭā meṅgaḏane māre; hiṅmata vināno re, hāthi te joine hāre-4
brahmānaṅda kahe re, ema samaje te jana shurā; tana kari nākhe re, guru vachane chure churā-5

title: peṭa kaṭāri re, paherine sanamukha chālyā; pāch̄ā na vaḏe re, koinā te na rahe ʝālyā-1
content:
793. pada-4
peṭa kaṭāri re, paherine sanamukha chālyā; pāch̄ā na vaḏe re, koinā te na rahe ʝālyā-1
āmā sāmā re, uḍe bhālā aṉiyāḏā; te avasaramāṅ re, rahe rāji te matavālā -2
sāchā shurā re, jenā veri ghāva vakhāṉe; jivita juṭhuṅ re, maravuṅ te maṅgaḏa jāṉe-3
teni pere re, harijana paṉa joie tikhā; aṅtarashatrune re, lāge ati vajra sarikhā-4
māthuṅ jātāṅ re, mukhanuṅ pāṉi nava jāve; brahmānaṅda kahe re, te saṅta hari mana bhāve-5

title: satasaṅga vināṅ, (2) janma maraṉa bhramajāḏa maṭe nahiṅ jaṅtane, -ṭeka.
content:
794. rāga : soraṭha pada-2
satasaṅga vināṅ, (2) janma maraṉa bhramajāḏa maṭe nahiṅ jaṅtane, -ṭeka.
mana māna taji, (2) te māṭe sharaṉe jai raiye saṅtane-ṭeka.
jo aḍasaṭha tiratha phari āve, nitya nigamavidhi kari kari nāḫve; satasaṅga-1
keḫdi jivapaṉuṅ tenuṅ nava jāve...satasaṅga-1
jo iṅgalā piṅgalāni khabara jaḍe, kari āgraha tene keḍa paḍe; satasaṅga-1
teṉe chittane bamaṉo phera chaḍe...satasaṅga-2
koi vāsa kare jaine kāshi, koi anna na khāya rahe upavāsi; satasaṅga-1
e manani ch̄e sarave hāṅsi...satasaṅga-3
jo phiratāṅ saṅta samāja maḏe, to sukhe manani bhrāṅti ṭaḏe; satasaṅga-1
kahe brahmānaṅda saṅtamāṅhi bhaḏe...satasaṅga-4

title: ḍhāḏa : shobhe ch̄e sāri shyāma saluṉāvarani chuṅdaḍi
content:
795. sajani ṭāṉuṅ āvyuṅ re...
ḍhāḏa : shobhe ch̄e sāri shyāma saluṉāvarani chuṅdaḍi
sajani ṭāṉuṅ āvyuṅ re bhavajaḏa taravānuṅ, moṅgho manuṣyano vāro; bhavasāgarano āro, ṭeka.
ḍāhyā dilamāṅ vichāro, satsaṅga kijie...ṭeka.
sajani ā re choghaḍiyuṅ amr̥ta-lābhanuṅ, phari nahiṅ maḏe evuṅ; vijanā ʝabakārā jevuṅ,
moti parovi levuṅ...sa. 2
sajani saṅta kahe te sāchuṅ mānie, gāṅṭha vāḏi nava ch̄uuṭe; niyama nishchaya na tuṭe,
saṅsāra ch̄o ne re kuṭe...sa. 3
sāchā sādhupuruṣani sevā kijie, pāpa purvanā baḏavā; brahmapuramāṅ te bhaḏavā,
svāminārāyaṉa maḏavā...sa. 4
sajani shirane sāṭe re harine sevie, pāch̄āṅ pagalāṅ nava bharie; saṅsāra pāra utarie, sa.
nāraṉadāsa keḫ ṭharie...sa. 5

title: vachana lopi jāṉe sukha leshuṅ re, te to keḫshu keḫvāne jo reḫshuṅ re... ṭeka.
janani jivo re gopichaṅdani, putrane preryo vairāgya ji; ...jana 1
content:
797. rāga : jaṅgalo pada-1
janani jivo re gopichaṅdani, putrane preryo vairāgya ji; ...jana 1
upadesha āpyo eṉi pere, lāgyo saṅsāriḍo āga ji...jana 1
dhanya dhanya mātā dhruva taṉi, kahyāṅ kaṭhaṉa vachana ji; ...jana 1
rāja sāja sukha parahari, vege chāliyā vana ji...jana 2
bhalo re tyāga bharathari taṉo, taji jeṉe soḏaseṅ nāra ji; ...jana 1
maṅdira ʝarukhā meli kari, āsana kidhalāṅ bāḫra ji...jana 3
uṭhi na shake uṅṭiyo, bahu bolāvyo bājaṅdaji; ...jana 1
tene re dekhine trāsa upanyo, lidhi phakiri ch̄oḍyoee phaṅda ji...jana 4
evā vairāgyavaṅtane jāuṅ vāraṉe, bijā gayā re aneka ji; ...jana 1
bhalā re bhuṅḍā avani upare, gaṉatāṅ nāḫve ch̄eka ji...jana 5
kyāṅ gayuṅ kuḏa rāvaṉa taṉuṅ, sagara suta sāṭha hajāra ji; ...jana 1
na rahyuṅ nāṉuṅ rājā naṅdanuṅ, sarave supana vyavahāra ji...jana 6
evā ch̄atrapati chāli gayā, rāja muka.i rājana ji; ...jana 1
deva dānava mānava muni, sarave jāṉo supana ji...jana 7
samaji muko to sāruṅ ghaṉuṅ, jarura mukāvashe jama ji; ...jana 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe nahiṅ maṭe, sāchuṅ kahuṅ khāi sama ji...jana 8

title: jaṅgala vasāvyo jogie, taji jeṉe tanaḍāni āsha ji; ...jaṅgala 1
content:
798. pada-2
jaṅgala vasāvyo jogie, taji jeṉe tanaḍāni āsha ji; ...jaṅgala 1
vāta na game ā vishvani, āṭho pahora udāsa ji...jaṅgala 1
seja-palaṅge poḍhatā, maṅdira ʝarukhā māṅya ji; ...jaṅgala 1
tene nahi re tr̥ṉa sātharo, rahetā tarutala ch̄āṅya ji...jaṅgala 2
shāla dushālā oḍhatā, ʝiṉā jarakashi jāmā ji; ...jaṅgala 1
teṉe rākhi kaṅthā godaḍi, sahe shira shita ne ghāma ji...jaṅgala 3
bhāvatāṅ bhojana jamatā, aneka vidhināṅ anna ji; ...jaṅgala 1
te re māgaṉa lāgyā ṭukaḍā, bhikṣā bhuuvana bhuvana ji...jaṅgala 4
hāji kahetāṅ hajāruṅ uṭhatāṅ, chālatāṅ lashkara lāva ji; ...jaṅgala 1
te nara chālyā ekalā, nahiṅ, pejāruṅ pāya ji...jaṅgala 5
raho to rājā rasoeei karuṅ, jamatā jāo jogirāja ji; ...jaṅgala 1
khira nipāvuṅ kṣaṉa ekamāṅ, te to bhikṣāne kāja ji...jaṅgala 6
āhāra kāraṉe je ubho rahe, kari ekani āsha ji; ...jaṅgala 1
te jogi nahiṅ bhogi jāṉavo, aṅte thāshe vināsha ji...jaṅgala 7
rāja sāja sukha parahari, je jana leshe joga ji; .jaṅgala 1
dhana re dārāmāṅ te nahiṅ dhase, roga sama jāṉe bhoga ji...jaṅgala 8
dhanya e tyāga vairāgyane, taji jeṉe tanaḍāni āsha ji; ...jaṅgala 1
kuḏa re taji niṣkuḏa thayā, tenuṅ kuḏa avināsha ji...jaṅgala 9

title: tyāga na ṭake re vairāgya vinā, karie koṭi upāya ji; ...tyāga 1
content:
799. pada-3
tyāga na ṭake re vairāgya vinā, karie koṭi upāya ji; ...tyāga 1
aṅtara uṅḍi je icch̄ā rahe, te to kema tajāya ji...tyāga 1
vesha lidho vairāgyano, desha rahi gayo dura ji; ...tyāga 1
upara vesha acch̄o banyo, māṅhi moha bharapura ji...tyāga 2
kāma krodha lobha mohanuṅ, jyāṅ lagi muḏa na jāya ji; ...tyāga 1
saṅga prasaṅge te upaje, jyāre joga bhogano thāya ji...tyāga 3
uṣṉa rate avani upare, bija na dise bahāra ji; ...tyāga 1
ghana varase vana pāṅgare, ema indriya viṣe vikāra ji...tyāga 4
chamaka dekhine loha chaḏe, indriya viṣaya saṅyoga ji; ...tyāga 1
aṉabheṭe re abhāva ch̄e, bheṭe bhogavashe bhoga ji...tyāga 5
upara taje ne aṅtara bhaje, ema na sare artha ji; ...tyāga 1
te vaṉasyo varṉa āshramathi, aṅte karashe anartha ji...tyāga 6
bhraṣṭa thayo re joga bhogathi, jema bagaḍyuṅ dudha ji; ...tyāga 1
gayuṅ re ghr̥ta mahi mākhaṉathi, āpe thayuṅ ashuddha ji...tyāga 7
paḏamāṅ jogi paḏamāṅ bhogi, paḏamāṅ gr̥hi ne tyāgi ji; ...tyāga 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda keḫ e narano, vaṉasamajyo vairāgya ji...tyāga 8

title: ame re jaḍabharata jogiyā, icch̄uṅ nahiṅ vaibhoga ji; ...ame 1
content:
800. pada-9
ame re jaḍabharata jogiyā, icch̄uṅ nahiṅ vaibhoga ji; ...ame 1
jagata padāratha jivane, ruche nahiṅ jema roga ji...ame 1
junāṅ pānāṅ paṭa peḫrashuṅ, nahiṅ icch̄uṅ navina ji; ...ame 1
shita uṣṉa shira sahishuṅ, rākhi kaṅthā kopina ji...ame 2
khaṭarasa khāvā nahi khoḏie, jamashuṅ je maḏashe anna ji; ...ame
nirmāne dana nirgamashuṅ, raheshuṅ mane magana ji...ame 3
prita sahushuṅ parahari, karashuṅ kr̥ṣṉa bhajana ji; ...ame 1
morye amārā matamāṅ, mr̥ge karyuṅḫtuṅ vighana ji...ame 4
harṣa shoka hāṉa vr̥ddhine, seḫshuṅ sukha duḥkha tana ji; ...ame 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe nahiṅ daie, nija kuḏane lāṅch̄ana ji...ame 5

title: r̥ṣabhakuṅvarani ritane, suṉo saṅta sujāṉa ji; ..r̥ṣabha 1
content:
801. pada-10
r̥ṣabhakuṅvarani ritane, suṉo saṅta sujāṉa ji; ..r̥ṣabha 1
samartha bharata nāme kari, paraṭhyoṅ khaṅḍa pramāṉa ji...r̥ṣabha 1
rāja taji tapa ādaryuṅ, taji sahushuṅ saneha ji; ..r̥ṣabha 1
dayā māṅhi duḥkha upanyuṅ, thayo mr̥gishuṅ neha ji...r̥ṣabha 2
teṉe kari tana dhāriyuṅ, rahyuṅ jñāna abhaṅga ji; ..r̥ṣabha 1
aṅgirā kuḏamāṅ avataryāṅ, rahyāṅ sahushuṅ asaṅga ji...r̥ṣabha 3
mā bāpa meli mari gayāṅ, rahyāṅ bhāi ne bhojāi ji; ...r̥ṣabha 1
jaḍa jāṉine jevuṅ tevuṅ, anna āpe te khāya ji...r̥ṣabha 4
pāvā sāru khetara mokalyā, chora lai gayā tyāṅya ji; ...r̥ṣabha 1
detāṅ balidāna devine, kari kāḏiye sahāya ji...r̥ṣabha 5
tyāṅthi jaḍabharata joḍiyā, rāye lai shibikāya ji; ...r̥ṣabha 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda keḫ e nr̥pane, kahyo sukhano upāya ji...r̥ṣabha 6

title: jaḍa bharatani jātanā, jogi je jagamāṅya ji; ...jaḍa 1
content:
802. pada-11
jaḍa bharatani jātanā, jogi je jagamāṅya ji; ...jaḍa 1
indriya manane upare, rahe shatru sadāya ji...jaḍa 1
vikaḏa na thāya viṣaya sukhamāṅ, rahe paravata prāya ji; ...jaḍa 1
dharma dhiraja muke nahiṅ, mara mastaka jāya ji...jaḍa 2
āṭhe pora māṅ eka ghaḍi, na māne nija deha ji; ...jaḍa 1
tenā sukha sāru shuṅ kare, upāya nara eha ji...jaḍa 3
hari icch̄āe hare phare, kare jivano uddhāra ji; ...jaḍa 1
jene maḏe evā jogiyā, pāme te bhavapāra ji...jaḍa 4
evā jogine āvi maḏe, jāṉe ajāṉe je jana ji; ...jaḍa 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda e narane, kare paḏamāṅ pāvana ji...jaḍa 5

title: mune sapane na game re saṅsāra, koḫne kema kijie; ...koḫne 1
content:
803. rāga : jaṅgalo
mune sapane na game re saṅsāra, koḫne kema kijie; ...koḫne 1
vamana thayuṅ mana utaryuṅ, evo lāgyo re saṅsāra...koḫne 1
seḫja palaṅga ne poḍhaṉāṅ, koi taḏāṅse pāva; ...koḫne 1
pataṅga paḍyo te upare, māthe jama kero dāva...koḫne 2
mr̥garājanāṅ mukhamāṅ, je koi jāye jarura; ...koḫne 1
khāna pānane visari, maravuṅ dekhe hajura...koḫne 3
svārathe sahu koi maḏi, vidhavidha kare vāta; ...koḫne 1
aṅtaramāṅ kaho kema utare, najare diṭhela ghāta ...koḫne 4
samaji vichāri joi karo, taji khalakani āsha; ...koḫne 1
niṣkuḏānaṅda nishchaya karyoṅ, sukha to saḋguru pāsa...koḫne 5

title: jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e nedāna, bhaja bhagavāna re jiva jāvuṅ ch̄e...ṭeka.
content:
804. rāga : dhoḏa pada-1
jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e nedāna, bhaja bhagavāna re jiva jāvuṅ ch̄e...ṭeka.
jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e re rahevānuṅ ch̄e kāchuṅ, māne sāchuṅ re...jiva-1
jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e re māla dhana meli, ṭhāluṅ ṭheli re...jiva-2
jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e re āvuṅ tana tyāgi, jo ne jāgi re...jiva-3
jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e re āpo jamaṉe hāthe, āve sāthe re...jiva-4
jāvuṅ ch̄e re jāvuṅ ch̄e re kahe niṣkuḏānaṅda, bhaja goviṅda re...jiva-5

title: bhule māṅ re bhule māṅ re āvuṅ aṅga bhāḏi, deshe bāḏi re bhāi bhule māṅ...ṭeka.
content:
805. pada-2
bhule māṅ re bhule māṅ re āvuṅ aṅga bhāḏi, deshe bāḏi re bhāi bhule māṅ...ṭeka.
bhule māṅ re bhule mā re tana nathi tāruṅ, māne māruṅ re...bhāi-1
bhule māṅ re bhule mā re dekhi deha ruḍi, ch̄e jo kuḍi re...bhāi-2
bhule māṅ re bhule mā re deha deshe dāṭi, thāshe māṭi re...bhāi-3
bhule māṅ re bhule mā re dekhi deha sāri, jone vichāri re...bhāi-4
bhule māṅ re bhule mā re kahe niṣkuḏānaṅda, svāmi sukhakaṅda re...bhāi-5

title: āvuṅ tāruṅ dhana re jobana dhuḏa thāshe, kaṅchana jevi kāyā te rākhamāṅ roḏāshe.
content:
806. rāga : chābakho
āvuṅ tāruṅ dhana re jobana dhuḏa thāshe, kaṅchana jevi kāyā te rākhamāṅ roḏāshe.
ṭāḍhā unā re tuṅne tāva ja āvashe ne, vasamuṅ thaine vitāshe; ...āvuṅ-1
dātaṉa pāṉi ne nāhyā vinā tāri, deha badhi gaṅdhāshe re...āvuṅ-1
bolavā chālavā nahiṅ die prāṉi, tāri jibhalaḍi ʝalāshe; ...āvuṅ-1
shvāsa chaḍashe ne āṅkho pharakashe, nākani te ḍāṅḍi nami jāshe re...āvuṅ-2
vaidya teḍāve eni nāḍi jovarāve, kaḍavāṅ te auṣadha pāshe; ...āvuṅ-1
tuṭi eni buṭi nahiṅ maḏe enā, jivani shi gati thāshe re...āvuṅ-3
eka bijā vinā ghaḍie na chāle, te tāri triyā to raṅḍāshe; ...āvuṅ-1
jugo re juganuṅ ch̄eṭuṅ paḍyuṅ prāṉi tārā, nāmani te chuḍio bhaṅgāshe re...āvuṅ- 4
khokhali doṉimāṅ tāri āga ja kāḍhashe ne, masāṉe lākaḍāṅ levāshe; ...āvuṅ-1
saghaḏuṅ kuṭuṅba tane saḏagāvi dai pach̄i, bāramānāṅ kāgaḏo lakhāshe re...āvuṅ- 5
dasha divasa tāruṅ sutaka pāḏashe, ne dāḍhi ne much̄a muṅḍāshe; ...āvuṅ-1
saghaḏuṅ sutaka tāruṅ kāḍhi nākhine pach̄i, bāramānāṅ sukhaḍāṅ khavāshe re...āvuṅ-6
dayā dharma ne bhakti vinā tāruṅ, saghaḏuṅ dravya luṅṭāshe; ..āvuṅ-1
devānaṅda kahe hari bhajyā vinā jama, ch̄oṭāṅ moṭāne lai jāshe re...āvuṅ-7

title: aṅte jāvuṅ uṭhi ekalā re, saṅge āve na koya;
kara prabhu saṅgāthe dr̥ḍha pritaḍi re, mari jāvuṅ meline dhanamāla;
content:
808. rāga : garabi pada-1
kara prabhu saṅgāthe dr̥ḍha pritaḍi re, mari jāvuṅ meline dhanamāla;
aṅtakāḏe saguṅ nahi koinuṅ re-ṭeka.
saṅskāre saṅbaṅdhi sarve maḏyāṅ re, e ch̄e juṭhi māyā keri jāḏa...aṅta-1
māruṅ māruṅ karine dhana meḏavyuṅ re, temāṅ tāruṅ nathi talabhāra ...aṅta-2
sukha svapnā jevuṅ ch̄e saṅsāranuṅ re, tene jātāṅ na lāge vāra...aṅta-3
māṭe seve tuṅ sāchā saṅtane re, tārā ṭaḏashe trividhanāṅ tāpa...aṅta-4
ati moṭā puruṣane āshare re, baḏe purva janamanāṅ pāpa...aṅta-5
evuṅ samajine bhaja bhagavānane re, sukhakāri sadā ghanashyāma...aṅta-6
devānaṅdano vahālo duḥkha kāpashe re, manavāṅch̄ita puraṉakāma...aṅta-7

title: maḏyo manuṣya deha chiṅtāmaṉi re, tārā aṅgamāṅ ch̄e roga asādhya;
content:
809. pada-2
maḏyo manuṣya deha chiṅtāmaṉi re, tārā aṅgamāṅ ch̄e roga asādhya;
nathi leto nārāyaṉa nāmane re-ṭeka.
māthe janma maraṉa moṭuṅ duḥkha ch̄e re, tārā aṅtaramāṅ harine ārādhya ...nathi-1
ghaṉuṅ suʝe ch̄e kāma saṅsāranuṅ re, kare sagānuṅ nitya sanmāna...nathi-2
heta karato nathi haridāsamāṅ re, haiyā phuṭyāṅ tuṅ luṉaharāma ...nathi-3
paranāri saṅgāthe kari pritaḍi re, tāro eḏe gayo avatāra...nathi-4
bahunāmini bika nathi rākhato re, khare khāṅte maḏisha khuvāra ...nathi-5
ati kaṭhaṉa veḏā ch̄e aṅtakāḏani re, pach̄i thāshe tane pastāva...nathi-6
devānaṅdani shikhāmaṉa mānaje re, tārā aṅtaramāṅ karine uch̄āva ...nathi-7

title: tārā manamāṅ jāṉe maravuṅ nathi re, evo nishche karyo niradhāra;
content:
810. pada-3
tārā manamāṅ jāṉe maravuṅ nathi re, evo nishche karyo niradhāra;
temāṅ bhuli gayo bhagavānane re-ṭeka.
dhana dolata nāri ne ghaṉā dikarā re, khetivāḍi ghoḍi ne gharabāra...temāṅ-1
meḍi maṅdira ʝarukhā ne māḏiyā re, sukhadāyaka soneri seja...temāṅ-2
gādi takiyā ne gāla masuriyā re, ati āḍya kare ch̄e e ja...temāṅ-3
nichuṅ kāṅdha karine namato nathi re, evuṅ sādhu saṅgāthe abhimāna...temāṅ-4
maramāḏi mohanajini murati re, teni sāthe na lāgela tāna...temāṅ-5
pāpa aneka janamanā āvi maḏyā re, tāri mati malina thai maṅda...temāṅ-6
devānaṅdanā vahālāne visari gayo re, tāre gaḏe paḍyo jama phaṅda ...temāṅ-7

title: tāre māthe nagārāṅ vāge motanāṅ re, nathi eka ghaḍinoee niradhāra;
content:
811. pada-4
tāre māthe nagārāṅ vāge motanāṅ re, nathi eka ghaḍinoee niradhāra;
toya jāṉyā nahi jagadishane re-ṭeka.
moṭā meline rāja mari gayā re, jone jātā na lāge vāra. toya-1
tāruṅ jobana gayuṅ jakha māratuṅ re, māthe kāḏā maṭi gayā kesha. toya-2
aṅtakāḏe levāne jama āviyā re, teno bhāḏi bhayaṅkara vesha. toya-3
roma koṭi viṅch̄i taṉi vedanā re, duḥkha pāmyo tuṅ daivanā chora. toya-4
sagāṅ svārthi maḏyāṅ sahu luṅṭavā re, keḫnuṅ jarāya na chāle jora. toya-5
jibha ṭuṅki paḍi ne tuṭi nāḍio re, thayuṅ deha tajyānuṅ tatkāḏa. toya-6
devānaṅda kahe na jāṉyā mārā nāthane re, maḏyo māṉasano deha vishāḏa. toya-7

title: sahajānaṅda hari pragaṭa thayā, sahajānaṅda hari...ṭeka.
content:
812. rāga : kāphi pada-1
sahajānaṅda hari pragaṭa thayā, sahajānaṅda hari...ṭeka.
vyāsa munie purve je kahiḫti, te vāta sāchi kari...pragaṭa 1
kaushala deshamāṅ pragaṭyā pote, dvijakuḏa deha dhari...pragaṭa 2
adharma kerāṅ muḏa ukhāḍi, saddharma sthāpyoṅ phari...pragaṭa 3
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe durgapura āvyā, nirakhyā meṅ neṉāṅ bhari...pragaṭa 4

title: sahajānaṅda hari bhaji lyo ne, sahajānaṅda hari...ṭeka.
content:
813. pada-2
sahajānaṅda hari bhaji lyo ne, sahajānaṅda hari...ṭeka.
dāru māṭi chori averi, e chāreno tyāga kari...bhaji 1
janma maraṉanuṅ saṅkaṭa moṭuṅ, te thaki manamāṅ ḍari...bhaji 2
nārāyaṉanuṅ nāma ja letāṅ, bhavajaḏa jāsho tari...bhaji 3
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe niḥshaṅka thaine, mānajo vāta khari...bhaji 4

title: jāvuṅ jarura mari meline sarve, jāvuṅ jarura mari...ṭeka.
content:
814. pada-3
jāvuṅ jarura mari meline sarve, jāvuṅ jarura mari...ṭeka.
rāta divasa raḏyo dhanane kāje, samaryā nahi ghaḍie hari...meline 1
meḍi maṅdira māla khajinā, saṅpatta raheshe dhari...meline 2
sagāṅ saṅbaṅdhi sahu joi raheshe, kenuṅ na chāle jari...meline 3
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe jone vichāri, rahe nahi deha dhari...meline 4

title: manamāṅ vichāri jari joyuṅ nahi, manamāṅ vichāri jari...ṭeka.
content:
815. pada-4
manamāṅ vichāri jari joyuṅ nahi, manamāṅ vichāri jari...ṭeka.
sādhu janani vāta na māni, pāpini sobata kari...joyuṅ 1
nārāyaṉanuṅ nāma na lidhuṅ, manuṣya deha dhari...joyuṅ 2
juvānimāṅ jore bhariyo, chori averi kari...joyuṅ 3
niṣkuḏānaṅda kahe māgine lidhi, māthe chorāshi phari...joyuṅ 4

title: bhavasāgarano pāra na āve prabhu vinā, tapa tiratha vrata karie koṭi upāya re; ...bha 1
content:
816. rāga : garabi pada-2
bhavasāgarano pāra na āve prabhu vinā, tapa tiratha vrata karie koṭi upāya re; ...bha 1
puṉya kari amarāpuranāṅ sukha pāmiee, aṅte pāch̄o phogaṭa phero thāya re...bha 1
māyāni moṭapa te mithyā jāṉajo, nadie āvyuṅ jema pāṉinuṅ pura re; ...bha 1
teni peṭhe dhana jobana ne jivavuṅ, āka taṉāṅ jema uḍi jāshe tura re...bha 2
sagāṅ kuṭuṅbi meli maravuṅ ekaluṅ, lakha chorāshi pharavuṅ vāraṅvāra re; ...bha 1
pāpa taṉāṅ phaḏa āgaḏa tāre āvashe,karama karine bhariyā teṅ koṭhāra re...bha 3
āja amulakha māṉasanuṅ tana āviyuṅ, bhajavā sāru bhāva kari bhagavāna re;...bha 4

title: sagapaṉa sāchuṅ jāṉo shri ghanashyāmanuṅ, kevaḏa bijuṅ māne kuḍe kuḍa re; ...saga 1
content:
817. pada-3
sagapaṉa sāchuṅ jāṉo shri ghanashyāmanuṅ, kevaḏa bijuṅ māne kuḍe kuḍa re; ...saga 1
sagāṅ saṅbaṅdhi svāratha kerāṅ sobati re, meli jāshe sukhamāṅ nāṅkhi dhuḏa re...saga 1
desha videshe ḍole dhanane kāraṉe, prabhu visāri lālachamāṅ lapaṭāya re; ...saga 1
bhāgya vināno bhaṭake pāmara prāṉiyo, jo ne tāruṅ jivana eḏe jāya re...saga ra
kāḏa achānaka phojuṅ āve kārami, gheri leshe ghāṅṭe gharani bāra re; ...saga 1
nāḍi tuṭe āṅkho bahāra nisare re, te ṭāṉe shāmaḏiyo karatala sāra re...saga 3
eṭalā sāru karaje eno āsharo, māthe paḍatā maṭashe jamanā māra re; ...saga 1
devānaṅda kahe dāsapaṉāmāṅ lābha ch̄e, prema karine rākho manamāṅ pyāra re...saga 4

title: bhajyo nahi bhagavānane re, maḏyo māṉasano deha; ...bhajyo 1
content:
818. rāga : garabi pada-1
bhajyo nahi bhagavānane re, maḏyo māṉasano deha; ...bhajyo 1
prita kari paranāramāṅ, hāṅ re nicha sobata saneha...bhajyo 1
mithyā māyānāṅ joramāṅ re, thayo aṅdha ajāṉa; ...bhajyo 1
lāje viṅṭāṉo lokani, hāṅ re kare āpa vakhāṉa...bhajyo ra
chiṅtā ghaṉi chittamāṅ bhari re, hāla bhuṅḍā herāna; ...bhajyo 1
phuṭela haiyuṅ ne phela āvaḍe, hāṅ re mithyāṅ moṭapanuṅ māna...bhajyo 3
juṭhā bolo nathi jāṉato re, māthe maravāni ghāta; ...bhajyo 1
devānaṅda kahe jama āvashe, hāṅ re māra murakha khāta...bhajyo 4

title: aṅte jāvuṅ uṭhi ekalāṅ re, saṅge āve na koi; ...aṅte 1
content:
819. pada-ra
aṅte jāvuṅ uṭhi ekalāṅ re, saṅge āve na koi; ...aṅte 1
mātapitā ne bhāi dikarā, hāṅ re nāri kuṭe ch̄e roi...aṅte 1
bhukhe marine bheḏi kari re, māyā lākha karoḍa; ...aṅte 1
dāṭi raheshe darabāramāṅ, hāṅ re jone āṅkhyu kāṅ phoḍa...aṅte 2
jiva saṅgāthe jāya ch̄e re, puṉya potānāṅ pāpa; ...aṅte 1
sukha duḥkha phaḏa tenāṅ bhogave, hāṅ re jamapurimāṅ āpa...aṅte 3
rājā dharmani āgaḏe re, khāsho murakha māra; ...aṅte 1
devānaṅda kahe deha dhārasho, hāṅ re lakha chorāshi vāra...aṅte 4

title: mohanane gamavāne icch̄o mānani, tyāgo sarve juṭhi manani ṭeka jo; ..moe 1
content:
820. rāga : garabi pada-1
mohanane gamavāne icch̄o mānani, tyāgo sarve juṭhi manani ṭeka jo; ..moe 1
pativratāno dharma achaḏa kari pāḏajo, hari charaṉe rahejo abaḏā thai ch̄eka jo..moe 1
vaḏi eka vāta kahuṅ ch̄uṅ adhika vivekani, sāṅbhaḏa beni tārā sukhane kāja jo; ..moe 1
harijana saṅge rākho puraṉa pritaḍi, tyāgo mada matsara juṭhi kuḏa lāja jo..mo ra
sukhadāyaka tuṅ jāṉe suṅdara shyāmane, ati duḥkhadāyaka mana potānuṅ jāṉajo; ..moe 1
muktānaṅdano nātha magana thai sevajo, samaji vichāri bolo amr̥ta veṉa jo..mo 3

title: sāṅbhaḏa beni hari riʝyāṅni ritaḍi, mohanavarane māna saṅgāthe vera jo; ..sāṅ 3
content:
821. pada-2
sāṅbhaḏa beni hari riʝyāṅni ritaḍi, mohanavarane māna saṅgāthe vera jo; ..sāṅ 3
sādhana sarve māna bagāḍe paḏa viṣe, jema bhaḏiyuṅ paya sākaramāṅ ahi ʝera jo..sāṅ 1
dāsi thai tuṅ raheje dina dayāḏani, nichi ṭela maḏe to māne bhāgya jo; ..sāṅ 3
bhava brahmādikane nishche maḏati nathi, puruṣottama pāse beṭhāni jāgya jo..sāṅ 2
prita kare puruṣottama sāthe nitya navi, dāʝisha māṅ dekhi kenuṅ sanmāna jo; ..sāṅ 3
muktānaṅdano nātha magana thai sevajo, to riʝe rasiyo suṅdaravara kahāna jo..sāṅ 3

title: kahāna kuṅvarani rita suṉi manamāṅ dharo, to tame rahesho magana sadā hari saṅga jo; ..ka 1
content:
822. pada-3
kahāna kuṅvarani rita suṉi manamāṅ dharo, to tame rahesho magana sadā hari saṅga jo; ..ka 1
puruṣottamane nathi koi para potātaṉuṅ, puraṉakāma na rāche keḫne raṅga jo..ka 1
karuṉānidhimāṅ kāmādika vyāpe nahi, irṣyā māna taṉo nahi aṅtara lesha jo; ..ka 1
kaḍavāṅ veṉa kahe potānā dāsane, auṣadha sama āpe uttama upadesha jo..ka 2
je je vachana kahe suṅdaravara shyāmaḏo, sukha upaje tema karavo shuddha vichāra jo; ..ka 1
muktānaṅdano nātha sadā sukhadāi ch̄e, evuṅ jāṉi karajo puraṉa pyāra jo..ka 3

title: sukha sāgara harivara saṅge sukha māṉajo, ati ghaṉi mahera kari ch̄e shri mahārāja jo; ..su 1
content:
823. pada-4
sukha sāgara harivara saṅge sukha māṉajo, ati ghaṉi mahera kari ch̄e shri mahārāja jo; ..su 1
puruṣottama sāthe puraṉa sagapaṉa thayuṅ, āpaṉa tulya nahi koi bijuṅ āja jo..su 1
ravimaṅḍaḏamāṅ rāta taṉuṅ duḥkha nava naḍe, pārasa pāmye dhana durbaḏatā jāya jo; ..su 1
tema pragaṭa puruṣottamane je je maḏe, teno mahimā bhava brahmādika gāya jo..su 2
tana abhimāna taje puraṉa sukha pāmie, shāmaḏiyā saṅga vādhe sāchi prita jo; ..su 1
muktānaṅda kahe marma ghaṉo ch̄e vātamāṅ, jāṉi lejo ati uttama rasa rita jo..su 3

title: bhajyo nahi bhagavāna murakha, jivato maryoṅ. bhajyo ṭeka.
hari vinā hitakāri bijuṅ, koi tāruṅ nathi...hari ṭeka.
māṉasano avatāra moṅgho, nahi maḏe phari...māṉasano ṭeka.
bhaji le bhagavāna, sāchā saṅtane maḏi...bhaji ṭeka.
vitāvashuṅ jivana hari guṉa gānamāṅ, amr̥tamaya bhaktirasa pānamāṅ...ṭeka.
content:
828. rāga : garabi
vitāvashuṅ jivana hari guṉa gānamāṅ, amr̥tamaya bhaktirasa pānamāṅ...ṭeka.
parama prabhujināṅ prema pravāhamāṅ, nirmaḏa saritānā snānamāṅ-vitā 1
aṅtaranā jāmine aṅtara maṅdiramāṅ, padharāvashuṅ sanmānamāṅ-vitā 2
nayana bharine nirakhashuṅ nehathi, dharmakuṅvarane dhyānamāṅ-vitā 3
paṅcha viṣayane purā pich̄āṉashuṅ, joḍi deshuṅ bhagavānamāṅ-vitā 4
avināshināṅ akṣaradhāmamāṅ, besine jaishuṅ vimānamāṅ-vitā 5
manamohana prabhu sahajānaṅda shāmaḏā, vite āyuṣya tava gānamāṅ-vitā 6

title: dhiraja dhara tuṅ are adhirā, ishvara pure anna jone
content:
829. rāga : dhoḏa pada-1
dhiraja dhara tuṅ are adhirā, ishvara pure anna jone
khalaka taṉo ch̄e khaṭako prabhune, sāchuṅ māne mana jone-1
janmyuṅ tene jivāḍavāne, upāya shodhyo shuddha jone
hāḍa māṅsanā haiyā madhye, deve sarajyāṅ dudha jone-2
kiḍine kaṉa hāthine maṉa, chāra pagāne chāra jone
koshiṭāmāṅ kiṭa vase ch̄e, ishvara pure āhāra jone-3
masida kerā koṭa minārā, upara ugyāṅ ʝāḍa jone
paththara upara pāṉi varase, te ishvarano pāḍa jone-4
araṉya vanamāṅ ajagara rahe ch̄e, ḍagaluṅ na bhare doṭa jone
vishvaṅbharanuṅ biruda vichāro, khāvāni shi khoṭa jone-5
anaḏa pakṣi ākāshe rahe ch̄e, madaʝara bharakhe moṭā jone
parameshvarani kr̥pā vaḍe to, baniyā jaḏanā goṭā jone-6
marāḏane motino chāro, vakhate āpe vāḫlo jone
devānaṅda kahe deva bharose, magana thaine māḫlo jone-7

title: dhanya ch̄e dhiraja dhāre tene, bani shake bebhāna jone
content:
830. pada-2
dhanya ch̄e dhiraja dhāre tene, bani shake bebhāna jone
pāṅḍava jyāre vana paravariyā, duḥkhane didhāṅ māna jone-1
harishchaṅdrarāyane harivara sāthe, lagani kevi lāgi jone
aṅtya varaṉane ghera vechāṉā, to bhavani bhāvaṭha bhāṅgi jone-2
praḣlādajine piḍā bahu vidha, daityapatie didhi jone
sukhaḍā jevi sahana kari to, keshave rakṣā kidhi jone-3
shahera maḏyuṅ nahi sudāmāne, to paṉa ānaṅda tevo jone
moḏi bhāji vidurajini, sutara jevi sevo jone-4
mayuradhvajarāye mastaka upara, karavata lidhuṅ koḍe jone
sagāḏashāe suta vadheryoṅ, tyāgi didhā hoḍa jone-5
raṅtidevanā hr̥dayā madhye, jaraṉā kero joga jone
mādhavadāse māgi lidho, rāji thaine roga jone-6
duḥkhane dekhi harijana na ḍare, kare phikaranā phāṅkā jone
devānaṅda kahe deva bharose, kāḏa taṉā e kākā jone-7

title: bāḏaka ruve lavā māṅhe, mātā samaje marma jone
content:
831. pada-3
bāḏaka ruve lavā māṅhe, mātā samaje marma jone
rāṉini ema maraji parakhe, dharaṉidharano dharma jone-1
chāṅcha banāve tene chiṅtā, kāyara mana shida karie jone
peṭa paḍyuṅ te poṣaṉa karashe, phikara tajine pharie jone-2
hirā moti moṅghā kidhāṅ, dhanathi soṅghā dhānya jone
amr̥ta jevā amathā pāṉi, dinabaṅdhunā dāna jone-3
suraja sarvane prakāsha āpe, damaḍi na paḍe devi jone
vagara badāme vāya vāyaro, te keshava karuṉā kevi jone-4
surapaṅkhine ṭaṅke so maṉa, khāvā joie khira jone
dudhaḍalānā dariyā kāṅṭhe, sarajyāṅ tenāṅ sharira jone-5
janmyuṅ tene jivāḍavāne, māvatarane mana mamatā jone
saunā pitā ch̄e vishvaṅbhara, shāthi na bharo samatā jone-6
ajaba dayāḏu ch̄e alabelo, haiyuṅ rākho hātha jone
devānaṅda kahe pratita rākho, beli badrinātha jone-7

title: shuṅ karavā tuṅ sukhane māṭe, de ch̄e doṭā doṭa jone
content:
832. pada-4
shuṅ karavā tuṅ sukhane māṭe, de ch̄e doṭā doṭa jone
tārā sukha to tujane shodhe, sui reḫ tāṉi soḍa jone-1
māgyā vinā maḏe mehulā, māgyā maḏe to māga jone
mota sarikhuṅye māgyuṅ na maḏe, jivalaḍā tuṅ jāga jone-2
avasara vinā phaḏa na āve, so maṉa pāṉi siṅchi jone
putra vinā pāraṉiyuṅ khāli, so maṉa sākara vaheṅchi jone-3
bhāgya vinānuṅ sukha na maḏe, saṅkaṭa āve shāthi jone
pāraṉiyāmāṅ sarve ʝulāvata, hema bharelā hāthi jone-4
jagamāṅ sarve hema ʝulāvata, vāṅʝaṉi na raheta vanitā jone
lālacha rākhe lābha maḏe to, koi na dākhata dinatā jone-5
bhāgya vinā bhogavavānuṅ sukha, shidane thāye aḏaguṅ jone
koṭi upāye keḍa na mele, vajra thaine vaḏagyuṅ jone-6
hiṅmata rākhine harine bhaji lyo, biji āshā khāli jone
devānaṅda kahe sukha duḥkha rachanā, bhāve karine bhāḏi jone-7

title: re sagapaṉa harivaranuṅ sāchuṅ, bijuṅ sarve kṣaṉabhaṅgura kāchuṅ; ṭeka.
re lagani to harivarathi lāgi, meṅ tana dhanani āshā tyāgi; ṭeka.
re shira sāṭe naṭavarane varie, re pāch̄āṅ te pagalāṅ nava bharie; ṭeka.
re dhariyā aṅtara giridhāri, shuṅ karashe ghoḏyāṅ have saṅsāri; ṭeka.
koi koinuṅ nathi re, koeei koinuṅ nathi re;
tame bhāve bhaji lyo bhagavāna, jivana thoḍuṅ rahyuṅ;
bhavasāgaranāṅ nira tarine, jāvuṅ sāme tira;
content:
839. ḍhāḏa : paga mane dhovā dyo raghurāyaji...
bhavasāgaranāṅ nira tarine, jāvuṅ sāme tira;
saṅto bhavasāgaranāṅ niraji...ṭeka.
āshā tr̥ṣṉā nadi ne saṅgama, gājatāṅ gaṅbhiraji; ...saṅto-1
manasubā rupi loḍha moṭāṅ, thāvāṅ na die sthira...saṅto-1
kāma krodha ne lobha moṭāṅ, magaramacch̄ani bhiraji; ...saṅto-1
bhāmini rupi bhamarimāṅthi, sāchavavuṅ ja sharira...saṅto-2
suratā rupi saḍha chaḍāvi, shāṅti rupa samiraji; ...saṅto-1
nāva harināṅ nāma rupi, dhāro nāṅgaḏa dhira...saṅto-3
khevaṭa jñāni guru goti, dharmi dhyāni dhiraji; ...saṅto-1
māva kavi kahe turata tarashe, satsaṅgi shuravira...saṅto-4

title: akṣaradhāme kema jāsho jijñāsu ? akṣara jātāne māyā rokashe;
content:
840. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
akṣaradhāme kema jāsho jijñāsu ? akṣara jātāne māyā rokashe;
traṉa dehathi judo ātmāne jāṉi, brahmarupa thātāṅ māyā bhāgashe
svāminārāyaṉa svāminārāyaṉa, smaraṉa karashe te akṣara pāmashe... ṭeka 1
akṣaradhāme kema jāsho jijñāsu ? akṣara jātāne siddhiyuṅ rokashe; ...svāmi 2
siddhiyuṅ to ch̄e devone durlabha, amane to motiḍe vadhāvashe; ...svāmi 2
shrijini murti sanmukha rākhashuṅ, shriji amane tyāṅ ugārashe...svāmi 2
akṣaradhāma āghuṅ abajo jojana, pāṅkho vinānā kema pahoṅchashuṅ; ...svāmi 2
pāṅkho shrijini ājñā upāsanā, te thaki aṉu dura lāgashe...svāmi 3
akṣaradhāme kema jāsho jijñāsu ? akṣara jātāṅ sagāo rokashe; ...svāmi 2
sagā saṅbaṅdhine satsaṅga oḏakhāvashuṅ, mahimā samajine sukha māṉashuṅ...svāmi 4
mahāpuruṣadāsaji gurune pratāpe, māvadāna akṣaranuṅ sukha māṉashe; ...svāmi 2
svāminārāyaṉa svāminārāyaṉa, smaraṉa karashe te akṣara pāmashe...svāmi 5

title: junuṅ to thayuṅ re devaḏa, junuṅ to thayuṅ; māro haṅsalo nāno ne devaḏa, junuṅ to thayuṅ...ṭeka.
content:
841. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
junuṅ to thayuṅ re devaḏa, junuṅ to thayuṅ; māro haṅsalo nāno ne devaḏa, junuṅ to thayuṅ...ṭeka.
ā re kāyā re haṅsā, ḍolavāne lāgi re; paḍi gayā dāṅta māṅyali, rekhuṅ to rahyuṅ...māro-1
tāre ne māre haṅsā, pritaḍiyuṅ baṅdhāṉi re; uḍi gayo haṅsa piṅjara, paḍi re rahyuṅ...māro-2
bāi mirāṅ kahe ch̄e prabhu, giridharanā guṉa; premano pyālo tamane, pāuṅ ne piuṅ...māro-3

title: vaiṣṉavajana to tene re kahie, je piḍa parāi jāṉe re; -vaiṣṉava 1
content:
842. rāga : āshāvari
vaiṣṉavajana to tene re kahie, je piḍa parāi jāṉe re; -vaiṣṉava 1
paraduḥkhe upakāra kare toya, mana abhimāna na āṉe re-vaiṣṉava 1
sakaḏa lokamāṅ sahune vaṅde, niṅdā na kare keni re; -vaiṣṉava 1
vācha kāch̄a mana nishchala rākhe, dhanya dhanya janani teni re-vaiṣṉava 2
samadr̥ṣṭi ne tr̥ṣṉā tyāgi, parastri jene māta re; -vaiṣṉava 1
jiḣvā thaki asatya na bole, paradhana nava dhare hātha re-vaiṣṉava 3
moha māyā vyāpe nahi jene, dr̥ḍha vairāgya jenā manamāṅ re; -vaiṣṉava 1
rāmanāma shuṅ tāḏi lāgi, sakaḏa tiratha tenā tanamāṅ re-vaiṣṉava 4
vaṉalobhi ne kapaṭa rahita ch̄e, kāma krodha nivāryā re; -vaiṣṉava 1
bhaṉe narasaiṅyo tenuṅ darshana karatāṅ, kuḏa ekotera tāryā re-vaiṣṉava 5

title: harine bhajatā haji koini lāja, jatā nathi jāṉi re
content:
843. ḍhāḏa : lokaḍhāḏa bhajana
harine bhajatā haji koini lāja, jatā nathi jāṉi re
jeni suratā shāmaḏiyā sātha, vade veda vāṉi re. ṭeka.
vahāle ugāryo prahalāḋ, hiraṉyakashyapu māryo re
vibhiṣaṉane āpyuṅ rājya, rāvaṉa saṅhāryo re. 1
vahāle narasiṅha mahetāne hāra, hātho hātha āpyo re
dhruvane āpyuṅ avichala rāja, potāno kari thāpyo re. 2
vahāle mirāṅ te bāināṅ ʝera, haḏāhaḏa pidhāṅ re
pāṅchāḏināṅ puryāṅ chira, pāṅḍava kāma kidhāṅ re. 3
āvo hari bhajavāno lahāvo, bhajana koi karashe re
kara joḍi kahe premaḏadāsa, bhaktonā duḥkha harashe re. 4

title: bhutaḏa bhakti padāratha moṭuṅ, brahmalokamāṅ nāhi re; -bhutaḏa 1
content:
844. rāga : bhairavi
bhutaḏa bhakti padāratha moṭuṅ, brahmalokamāṅ nāhi re; -bhutaḏa 1
puṉya kari amarāpuri pāmyā, aṅte chorāsimāṅhi re-bhutaḏa 1
