shākotsava lilā
mahā suda-7

title: sāṅbhaḏa sajani lilā puruṣottama taṉi;
sāṅbhaḏa sajani nāma kahuṅ te gāmanāṅ;
vaḏi vakhāṉuṅ shākotsava lilā kari;
jame jivanaji shāka karela nija hāthanuṅ;
dhanya dhanya shuṅ varṉavuṅ bhāgya loyātaṉāṅ;
vaḏi vakhāṉuṅ lilā loyā gāmani;
jarā kahe do sāṅvariyā se āyā kare, āyā kare mata jāyā kare...jarā-1
content:
1154. rāga : vāchaspati
jarā kahe do sāṅvariyā se āyā kare, āyā kare mata jāyā kare...jarā-1
dina nahi chena raina nahi niṅdiyā, svapane meṅ darasa dikhāyā kare...jarā-2
yaha kapaṭi ko kapaṭa na buʝe, logana ko bharamāyā kare...jarā-3
avadha bita gai phira jahāṅ tahāṅ, badana ko kyuṅ ch̄ipāyā kare...jarā-4
māva kahe more shyāma na āye, aba to jiyā gabharāyā kare...jarā-5

title: dikhalā didāra pyārā, mehabuba hamārā...dikhalāṭeka
content:
1155. rāga : rekhatā-kalāvati
dikhalā didāra pyārā, mehabuba hamārā...dikhalāṭeka
māshuka jarā de denā, neno kā najārā; ...dikhalā 1
itane meṅ to hovegā, āshakuṅdā gujārā...dikhalā 1
kurabāna kiyā tere nāma para, gharabāra saṅsārā; ...dikhalā 1
phakiri leke phiratā huṅ, karane kuṅ didārā...dikhalā 2
takasira māpha karanā, suna sarajanahārā; ...dikhalā 1
premānaṅda kuṅ mulākāta denā, naṅda dulārā...dikhalā 3

title: irāde roja karate hai magara vo tuṭa jāte hai,
content:
1156. rāga : yamana kalyāṉa
irāde roja karate hai magara vo tuṭa jāte hai,
vo hi gaḍhapura jāte hai jinhe shriji bulāte hai.
mere dila se puch̄o gaḍhapura ki surata kyā hai,
shāno shokata mere ghanashyāma ke ghara ki kyā hai; ...1
chāṅda gaḍhapura meṅ hai chāṅdani gaḍhapura meṅ hai,
jo he roshana vo sitāre sabhi gaḍhapura meṅ hai...1
gariboṅ kā sabhi ālama nigāhabara jo hai,
jahāṅpanāha jahāṅ nura ki asara jo hai; ...1
sabhi avatāra ke saratāja jo gaḍhapura meṅ hai,
vo gopinātha ke dara para sabhi gaḍhapura meṅ hai...2
puri dvārāvati mathurā meri gaḍhapura meṅ hai,
mere badripati jagadisha bhi gaḍhapura meṅ hai; ...1
mere kāshi mere kābā sabhi gaḍhapura meṅ hai,
jo he roshana vo sitāre sabhi gaḍhapura meṅ hai...3

title: dila lāgyā hamārā phakiri se...dila
content:
1157. rāga : kāphi
dila lāgyā hamārā phakiri se...dila
duniyādāra duḥkhi saba dekhe, rāṅka aru rāva dilagirise...dila-1
tina tāpa jagavyāpa rahyo he, jaratahe moha jaṅjirise...dila-2
pāyā dhana so rahata na pāve, mara gayā kara kara merise...dila-3
brahmānaṅda kahe ānaṅda āye, adala brahmakhamirise...dila-4

title: nārāyaṉa nāma he bhāri, liyo saba prema se dhāri; ...1
content:
1158. gaʝala
nārāyaṉa nāma he bhāri, liyo saba prema se dhāri; ...1
mahimā nāma ko bhāri, adhama koṭi liye tāri...1
ajāmila karma kyā kinā, nahi kach̄u dāna bhi dinā; ...1
kevala hari nāma ko linā, diyā yamapāsha se ṭāri...2
rahi shabari adhama jāti, raṭana hari nāma kuṅ bhāri; ...1
jaṅgala se bora bina āti, ridaya meṅ rāma ko dhāri...3
rasoi karma to karati, binā choke banāti thi; ...1
prabhu preme jamāti thi, lagi jagadisha ko pyāri...4
ḍube gajarāja jaba jala meṅ, paḍe vaha ʝuḍa ke ch̄ala meṅ; ...1
pukāre nāma ko dila meṅ, hari goviṅda giridhāri...5

title: kyā bharosā hai isa jiṅdagi kā, sātha deti nahi ye kisi kā. kyā...ṭeka
ḍhāḏa : ch̄apaiyā ke nivāsi namuṅ...
content:
1160. rāga : lokaḍhāḏa
ḍhāḏa : ch̄apaiyā ke nivāsi namuṅ...
ch̄apaiyā ke nivāsi namuṅ bārabāra huṅ,
āyo sharana tihāre shriji tāra tāra tuma...āyo
bhaktoṅ ko shriji tumane nirāsha nā kiyā,
māṅgā jinhe jo chāhā varadāna de diyā;
di bhukti mukti sātha meṅ kitanā udāra tuma...āyo-1
ch̄apaiyā meṅ janama liyo gaḍhapura maiṅ rahyo,
saṅta haribhakta ko upadesha tuma diyo;
hāṅ prema saritā meṅ pulakita kiyoṅ tuma...āyo-2
jivana ki rāha pe unhe chalanā shikhā diyā,
samashera ki jagā pe mālā thamā diyā ;
bhule hue insāna ko dikhāyo rāha tuma...āyo-3
kabhi na āyā haiṅ tu kabhi nā āyegā,
bhaje jo nāma terā parama dhāma pāyegā;
mukto ke sātha sātha hameṅ dhāma diyo tuma...āyo-4

title: mere māshukaki , surata kahā kahuṅ;
āja baṅgalemeṅ ghuṅgharuṅ bāje......ṭeka
content:
1162. rāga : ṭhumari
āja baṅgalemeṅ ghuṅgharuṅ bāje......ṭeka
braṅdābanaki kuṅjameṅ baṅgalā, tahāṅ rādhāshyāma birāje....āja...1
bājata mr̥daṅga gāta gopi gana, thai thai hota samāje....āja...2
nāchata suṅdara shyāma rādhikā, nirakhi ratipati lāje....āja...3
premānaṅda ghanashyāma suṅdara ch̄abi, abilokita duḥkha bhāje....āja...4

title: ḍhāḏa : teri sāvari surata ch̄aṭādāra...
content:
1163. rāga : ṭhumari pada-1
ḍhāḏa : teri sāvari surata ch̄aṭādāra...
gaḍhapurapati gopinātha bāṅsuri bajāvo,
bāṅsuri bajāo sura saṅgitameṅ gāvo. gaḍhapura ṭeka.
baṅsi kara grahi kr̥pāla tānanaseṅ subhaga tāla,
gaṅbhira vara sura gopāla, gānaseṅ gajāo. gaḍhapura 1
baṅsi ko ajaba gāna, yāte karuṉā nidhāna,
kamalāvara dhurjaṭila dhyānakuṅ tajāo. gaḍhapura 2
sāte sura tina grāma murch̄anā manobhirāma,
ese ekisa bhinna bhedakuṅ bajāo. gaḍhapura 3
harijana jaba sunata sura hovata ura prema pura,
agaṉita avani asura dilakuṅ dajāo. gaḍhapura 4
baṅsi juta aharnisha baṅsike mama ura munisha,
kahave jagadisha chitta snehakuṅ sajāo. gaḍhapura 5
ai ai
chaṅdrāvaḏā

title: paranāri shuṅ prita kari, tene ruṭhyā rāma, 1
content:
1164. shri goviṅdarāmanāṅ chaṅdrāvaḏā : upadesha viṣe
paranāri shuṅ prita kari, tene ruṭhyā rāma, 1
mātāne to bhāre māri, suʝyuṅ bhuṅḍuṅ kāma
suʝyuṅ bhuṅḍuṅ kāma te kevuṅ, (enā) pitr̥ svarge kaṅpe evuṅ, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma eni matya phari ch̄e, paranāri shuṅ prita kari ch̄e. 1
sarpa khāya to sukhethi khājo, tethi ruḍi lhāya,
paranāri ke paisā sanmukha chālye, mahā duḥkha thāya
mahā duḥkha thāya te kevuṅ, bhava bhaṭakaṉamāṅ nākhe evuṅ, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma (ethi) aḏagā thājo; sarpa khāya to sukhethi thājo. 2
pāṅcha pāpa sarva pāpathi bhāri, te mahāpāpa kahevāya, 1
brahmahatyā ne chora sonāno, trijo jāri kahevāya
trijo jāri te anyāye chāle, madya kephi teni sobata ʝāle, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma sāṅbhaḏo naranāri, pāṅcha pāpa sarva pāpathi bhāri. 3
gāphala baṅdā garva nava karie, garve gayuṅ rāvaṉanuṅ rāja,
sitā harine sarve khoyuṅ, evuṅ nahiṅ keḫne āja
evuṅ nahiṅ keḫne āja te bhāi, laṅkāpatine samudrani khāi, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma pagaluṅ joine bharie, gāphala baṅdā garva na karie. 4
jiva jagatano evo ḍāhyo, kathā sāṅbhaḏavā jāya, 1
bhāṅḍa bhavaiyā bhuṅgaḏā vāge, tyāṅ paṉa taiyāra thāya
tyāṅ paṉa teyāra thāya te jovā, ne buḍhḍhāpaṉani lāja khovā, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma gadheḍo gaṅgāmāṅ nāhyo, jiva jagatano evo ḍāhyo. 5
gāḍā upara vhoro beṭho, vāṭe chālyu jāya, 1
māragamāṅ to rodā āvyā, uṅchā nichuṅ thāya
uṅchā nichuṅ thāya te gāḍuṅ, vorāji tame ʝālajo nāḍuṅ, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma jai paḍyo heṭho, gāḍā upara voro beṭho. 6
savaḏuṅ keḫtāṅ samajyo āḍuṅ, teni samajaṉamāṅ bahu phera, 1
gāḍā uparathi paḍatuṅ melyuṅ, māthuṅ thai gayuṅ ʝera
māthuṅ thai gayuṅ ʝera te phuṭi, toya murakha mele nahiṅ muṭhi, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma e vorānuṅ nāḍuṅ, savaḏuṅ kahetā samajyo āḍuṅ. 7
sākara muki rākha ja khāya, jema nānuṅ bāḏa, 1
māvatara jāṉe māṅduṅ paḍashe, mukāve tatkāḏa
mukāve tatkāḏa te mā bāpa tema tema, bāḏaka kare saṅtāpa, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma rotuṅ jāya, sākara muki rākha ja khāya. 8
trāṅbiyāni eka tolaḍi laie, te vagāḍie vāraṅvāra, 1
guru karie to keḫch̄e kālāghelā, ema vahyo jāya saṅsāra
ema vahyo jāya saṅsāra te jāshe, pātra evuṅ kāraja thāshe, 1
kahe goviṅdarāma samaju tene kahie, trāṅbiyāni eka tolaḍi laie. 9
kāmi krodhi lobhi laṅpaṭa, pāpi jiva pilāya, 10
jamanā kiṅkara joḍā māri, jamapurimāṅ lai jāya
jamapurimāṅ lai jāya te jyāre, khari khabara paḍashe tyāre, 10
kahe goviṅdarāma chichoḍo saṅpaṭa, kāmi krodhi lobhi laṅpaṭa. 10
sākara kidhe moḍhuṅ miṭhuṅ, kahuṅ kadie na thāya, 10
nāma taṉuṅ nāḍuṅ ʝāline, kaiṅka taṉātā jāya
kaiṅka taṉātā jāya te jāshe, paṉa khādhe moḍhuṅ miṭhuṅ thāshe, 10
kahe goviṅdarāma nāmi vinānuṅ nāma te diṭhuṅ, sākara kidhe moḍhuṅ miṭhuṅ. 11
guru karie to jñāni karie, sata asatane joi,
baḏada laie to kheḍine laie, ḍobuṅ laie doi
ḍobuṅ laie to doine laie, samaju nāma te tenuṅ kahie, 10
kahe goviṅdarāma bhavasāgara to tarie, guru karie to jñāni karie. 12
imāna rākhine āṅkaḍo vāve, ne prabaḏa pāṉi pāya,
bāra mahinā siṅchyā kare tyāre, phaḏaphula to thāya
phaḏaphula to thāya te kevāṅ, diṭhāmāṅ to keri jevāṅ, 10
kahe goviṅdarāma svāda kāṅi kerino na āve, imāna rākhine āṅkaḍo vāve. 13
chaṅdrāvaḏā
bhiṅte bhoyaṅga kāḍhi tala jāre, (tene) puji lāge pāya, 10
bhoyaṅga jo pragaṭa dekhe to, murakha māravā jāya
murakha māravā jāya te pāpi, bhiṅte to puje ch̄e thāpi, 10
kahe goviṅdarāma pragaṭane māre bhiṅte, bhoyaṅga kāḍhi tala jāre. 14

title: siṅhane chāmaḍe bhupa thai beṭho, prajāpatino ghoḍo,
content:
1165. shri kovidarāmanāṅ chaṅdrāvaḏā : upadesha viṣe
siṅhane chāmaḍe bhupa thai beṭho, prajāpatino ghoḍo,
paṉa bhuṅkyo tyāṅ maḏi badhāe, kāḍhyo barābara khoḍo
kāḍhyo barābara khoḍā navāji, kāna bhuṅsi pach̄i nāṭhā gadhāji, 1
kahe kovidarāma eno shuṅ neṭho, siṅhane chāmaḍe bhupa thai beṭho. 1
sāpano ḍaṅkhela noḏiyo turata, noḏavela suṅghavā dhāya, 1
tema saṅsāre dāʝela mānavi, saṅtane sharaṉe jāya
saṅtane sharaṉe jāya kyama vāru ? aṅtaranā ḍaṅkha ruʝāvavā sāru, 1
kahe kovidarāma jaṅgamāṅ ʝuʝata, sāpano ḍaṅkhela noḏiyo turata. 2
ākhā mulakamāṅ tape suraja paṉa, ghuḍane nitya aṅdhāruṅ,
ujāsa sāthe āḍavera ene, aṅdhāruṅ lāge sāruṅ te kevuṅ ?
muḍha mānavini murkhāi jevuṅ, kahe kovidarāma ekaluṅ jaḍapaṉa, 1
ākhā mulakamāṅ tape suraja, paṉa ghuḍane nitya aṅdhāruṅ. 3
māna mamatānā prauḍha bhaḍākā, kare nahi niṣṭhā bhaṅga, 1
manamukhi jñānanā goṭāmāṅ jeno, badale nahiṅ kedi raṅga
badale nahi kedi raṅga te kavo ? shriji siddhāṅtane shobhāve evo, 1
kahe kovidarāma bhakta e pākā, māna mamatānā prauḍha bhaḍākā. 4
sārā narasāno nahi varatāro, ne haḍiyuṅ kāḍhatā phare, 1
daṅbhi prapaṅchine panāre vevalā, tana mana dhana dhuḏa kare
tana mana dhana dhuḏa kare te kevā ? satsaṅganuṅ dhoraṉa chukāve evā, 1
kahe kovidarāma e premalā dhāro, sārā narasāno nahi varatāro. 5
lābhane khātara banine laṭu, bhagata bani jāya moṭā, 1
svāratha kāje dhyāna dhari bese, aṅdarathi sāva khoṭā
chaṅdrāvaḏā
aṅdarathi sāva khoṭā te kevā ? chokhkhā parasādiyā oḏakhi levā, 1
kahe kovidarāma pātāḏanā chaṭu, lābhane khātara banine laṭu. 6
aṅdarathi kuḍiyo uparathi kāji, satsaṅgamāṅ bhuṅḍāi bhare, 1
potānuṅ bhāṉuṅ, bharavāne māṭe, kaiṅke kaubhāṅḍo kare
kaiṅka kaubhāṅḍo kare te kevāṅ ? halakāino jemāṅ pāra nahiṅ evā, 1
kahe kovidarāma jāṉo e pāji, aṅdarathi kuḍiyāne uparathi kāji. 7
dharamane nāme potāni ʝaṅḍi, sauthi uṅcheri rākhe,
moṭā moṭānāṅ oṭhāṅ āpine, potānuṅ mahātama bhākhe
potānuṅ mahātama bhākhe bhakhāve, khāṭa savādiyā ḍholaki bajāve, 1
kahe kovidarāma e pekho pākhaṅḍi, dharamane nāme potāni ʝaṅḍi. 8
dharamanā baḏa vinā bhagatanā sarakho, gaḏāmāṅ gāḏiyo ghāle, 1
vichāra vinānā gāḍarani peṭhe, uṅdhuṅ ghāline hāle
uṅdhuṅ ghāline hāle namālāṅ, jyāṅ tyāṅ bhekhaḍe bharātāṅ ṭhālāṅ, 1
kahe kovidarāma pāmara parakho, dharamanā baḏa vinā bhagatanā sarakho. 9
bhagata maṅḍaḏimāṅ bhāre hālyo ch̄e, bhagavāna thāvāno vā, 10
thoḍika āṅkhyuṅ viṅchi bese tyāṅ, upaḍe ene gaṅḍavā
upaḍe ene gaṅḍavā te kevo ? bhaphākiyāune bhāva evo, 10
kahe kovidarāma ḍhoṅga phālyo ch̄e, bhagata maṅḍaḏimāṅ bhāre hālyo ch̄e. 10
maṉidhara nāgane ḍolato dekhi, gho sāmi ḍolavā lāgi, 10
rupa nahiṅ raṅga nahiṅ, koi vāte ḍhaṅga nahiṅ, puṅch̄aḍie juo to bāṅḍe bāṅḍi
puṅch̄aḍie juo to bāṅḍi te kevi, namālu samarathani hoḍa kare evi, 10
kahe kovidarāma e to adekhi, maṉidhara nāgane ḍolato dekhi. 11

title: prauḍha siṅdhu pare ʝukati pashchime, madhyamāṅ eshiyāni aṭāri, 1
content:
1166. dhanya ho dhanya saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ch̄aṅda
prauḍha siṅdhu pare ʝukati pashchime, madhyamāṅ eshiyāni aṭāri, 1
hiṅda-devi taṉi kamara para chamakati, dr̥ḍha kasi tikṣṉa jāṉe kaṭāri ! 1
pahāḍa unnata mukhe kirti ucchāratā, garjati jalanidhi gānasaraṉi, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 1
rasika haiḍāṅ lase marma mukha maṅḍale, mānavi miṭhaḍāṅ premabhināṅ, 1
pāṉi jyāṅ ākarāṅ maradani muṅch̄anā, lalita lāvaṉya jyāṅ suṅdarināṅ
sajala ghanarājimāṅ ʝabukati vija shi, ghuṅghaṭe chamakati salajja ramaṉi, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 2
bhagara bheṅso vaḍi hāthaṉi jevaḍi, dhenu jyāṅ siṅha sanmukha dhasati, 1
ghoḍio māṉaki tikhi tājaṉa sami, jātavaṅti ghaṉi jyāṅ nipajati
yuddhamāṅ aḍaga tramajuṭamāṅ nā haṭhe, vegavati dise chapala haraṉi, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 3
vikaṭa giri gahavare vāgha siṅho, rame gajavatāṅ jaṅgalone huṅkāre, 1
mānabhaṅge thai maraṉiyā āthaḍe, bhāravaṭiyā bhaḍavira bhāre
shauryagito ahā ! guṅjati ehanāṅ, ghughave gheli saritā ḍuṅgarani, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 4
kaḍaka dharati jahāṅ khaḍakani ākari, ḍuṅgarā ḍuṅgarine karāḍo, 1
mukuṭa shā maṅdiro gājatā shira dhari, gajavatāṅ gagana uṅchā pahāḍo
gira āraṅbhati gāṅḍi jyāṅ nesamāṅ, khaḏakati dudhani piyuṣa ʝaraṉi, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 5
dhāvine dudha majabuta dharati taṉāṅ, pāka pauṣṭika jyāṅ vividha pāke, 1
maghamaghe puṣpa makaraṅda bhamarā piye, koyalo gāna gāti na thāke
lili kuṅjāra nāghera shi bhumikā, lahera jyāṅ siṅdhuni shāṅti karaṉi, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 6
āvi shatruṅjaye jāya giranāra para, anala paṅkhi samo surya vyome, 1
gahanatala ghumaṭathi ʝabakatāṅ emane, picch̄a verāya agaṉita bhome
udayane astamāṅ shobhati kṣitija shi ! chāṅdalo choḍine bhāla taraṉi, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 7
dvārikā kanakani durgapuri jahāṅ, kr̥ṣṉani kirti dipti prakāshe, 1
yādavi yuddhanāṅ smaraṉa prāchina jyāṅ, saṅgharyā siṅdhutaṭamāṅ prabhāse
svāminārāyaṉe dharma saṅsthāpine, shikhavi bhakti niṣkāma karaṉi, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 8
bhakta narasiṅha jyāṅ nāchiyo nehamāṅ, saṅpadā pāmiyo jyāṅ sudāmo, 1
vira gāṅdhi dayānaṅda jyāṅ nipajyā, sati ane saṅtano jyāṅ visāmo
gāme gāma ubhā sthaṅbha pokāratā, shuranā guṉani gāthavaraṉi, 1
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 9
bhakti ne shaurye raṅga roḏāi jyāṅ, gurjari guṉagaṅbhira girā, 10
gitāsāgara mahi masta e malapati, alapati madhura ālāpa dhirā
bhāṭa ne chāraṉo bhabhakatā kavita jyāṅ, paṅchamo veda duho sucharaṉi, 10
bhārati bhomani vaṅdu tanayā vaḍi, dhanya ! ho dhanya ! saurāṣṭra dharaṉi ! 10
chaṅdrāvaḏā
dohā-ch̄aṅda saṅgraha

title: dekhata baḍa bhāga lāga, pota sarasa navala pāga, ..jaya 1
content:
1167. ch̄aṅda - charchari
• dekhata baḍa bhāga lāga, pota sarasa navala pāga, ..jaya 1
aṅtara anurāga jāga, ch̄abi athāga bhāri; ..jaya 1
ati vishāla tilaka bhāla, nirakhata jana ho nihāla, ..jaya 1
unnata traya rekha jāla, kāla vyāla hāri; ..jaya 1
vilasita bhr̥ṅha shyāma vaṅka, chiṅtata ura jāta shaṅka, ..jaya 1
mr̥gamada bhara bicha paṅka, aṅka bhramara gyāni; ..jaya 1
jaya jaya ghanashyāma sāma, aṅbuja dr̥ga kr̥ta udāma, ..jaya 1
suṅdara sukhadhāma nāma, sāmare gumāni..jaya 1
• shrona kona dr̥ga lakira, tikṣṉa manu kāma tira, ..jaya 02
nāsā ch̄abi dipa kira, dhira dhyāna lāve; ..jaya 02
kuṅḍala shubha shravana kina, nautama krati ati navina, ..jaya 02
manahu hema jugala mina, chaṅda milana āve; ..jaya 02
guṉa nidhi kapola gora, chitavata chitta leta chora, ..jaya 02
tāke bicha dach̄ana kora, jora tila nishāni...jaya 02
• maṅda maṅda mukha hasaṅta, dārima sama paṅkti daṅta, ..jaya 02
samarata mahāṅta saṅta, khaṅta saṅta karake; ..jaya 02
lobhita chita adhara lāla, vilasita vidruma pravāla, ..jaya 02
rājata atishaya rasāla, tāla vaṅsi dharake; ..jaya 02
aṅbaka phala chibuka jāna, kaṅbu sama kaṅṭhamāna, ..jaya 02
dhārata shiva ādi dhyāna, āna ura na āni...jaya 3
• diradha ati doraḍaṅḍa, motina bhujabaṅdha maṅḍa, ..jaya 02
khaladalabala kara vikhaṅḍa, ati prachaṅḍa māre; ..jaya 02
hiyapara bana navalahāra, shobhita ati jalaja sāra, ..jaya 02
dekhata jana vāravāra, agha apāra ṭāre; jaya 02
prauḍha uccha ura prathula, phahare shubha gaṅdha phula, ..jaya 02
mani bhara naṅga bara amula, dulari vakhāni.. jaya 4
• udara tuṅga ati anupa, guṉavata tila sāma gupa, ..jaya 02
nābhi mānu premakupa, rupa ajaba rāje; ..jaya 02
shobhita hr̥da kaṭipradesha, kāṅchi naṅga jaḍita besa, ..jaya 02
chiṅtata urageṅ munesha, agha asheṣa bhāṅje; ..jaya 02
uru ataṅta rupavāna, garuḍa piṭha shobhamāna, ..jaya 02
nija jana jehi dharata dhyāna, prāna preṣṭa jāni.. jaya 5
• jānu dau rupavaṅta, lalita kara shri ataṅta, ..jaya 02
samarata jehi muni anaṅta, aṅta janma āve; ..jaya 02
jana mana priya jugala jaṅga, roma alpa ajaba raṅga, ..jaya 02
chitavata chitta chaḍhata raṅga, ati umaṅga pāve; ..jaya 02
gulphana ch̄abi adhika shobha, sthiti chala mana deta thobha, ..jaya 02
nirakhata ura miṭata kṣobha, lobha ādi glāni.. jaya 6
• charana praṣṭa chita harāta, taru tamāla ch̄abi lajāta, ..jaya 02
samarata tatakāla āta, rāta prāta manameṅ; ..jaya 02
jākuṅ nita sheṣa gāta, ajahu puni nahi aghāta, ..jaya 02
tulasi jehi sthaḏa rahāta, pāta mānuṅ janameṅ; ..jaya 02
nakha utaṅga raṅga lāla, shobhita manu dipamāla, ..jaya 02
rājata kidhuṅ chaṅdrabāla, khyāla karata dhyāni.. jaya 7
• vilasita charaṉāraviṅda, komala ati prema kaṅda, ..jaya 02
dhyāvata bhava miṭata phaṅda, ch̄aṅda stavana bole; ..jaya 02
prasarata jehi pada prasaṅga, punya bharita sarita gaṅga, ..jaya 02
agha vināsha parsa aṅga, ho uttaṅga ḍole; ..jaya 02
rājata mahiṅ urdhva rekha, vajrādika sahita prekha, ..jaya 02
brahmānaṅda dekha dekha, lekhata kurabāni.. jaya 8
dohā-ch̄aṅda saṅgraha

title: ghamaghama ghuṅgharuṅ ghamaṅka, samamama ʝāṅʝara ṭhamaṅka, ..hari 01
content:
1168. ch̄aṅda - charchari
• ghamaghama ghuṅgharuṅ ghamaṅka, samamama ʝāṅʝara ṭhamaṅka, ..hari 01
dhamamama mama bhu ghamaṅka, gata nishaṅka gāve; ..hari 01
ʝaga ʝaga ʝaga ʝagamagāṭa, thaga thaga thai thaita thāṭa, ..hari 01
nautama paga dr̥ga nirāṭa, lalita nāṭa lāve; ..hari 01
lathabatha hatha guṅtha lina, patha patha piya satha pravina, ..hari 01
katha katha gratha shesha kina, jutha navina jāche; ..hari 01
harihara aja hera hera, vikasata sura berabera, ..hari 01
pharagaṭa ghaṭa phera phera, naṭavara nāche..hari 01
• saṅta abhirāma dhāma, kramata ramata bhramata kāma, ..hari 01
pramata shramata namata grāma, vāma hāma lobhe; ..hari 01
aṭana ghaṭana ati udāma, thana gana tana ṭhāma ṭhāma, ..hari 01
taja vishrāma ati vibhrāma, sāma suṅdara shobhe; ..hari 01
jamanāke nita nira, khelata balavira vira, ..hari 01
chahuṅvara thaṭa saghaṭa bhira, kaṭi sudhira kāche...hari 02
• nautama ch̄abi naṅda naṅda, mukha suhāsa maṅda maṅda, ..hari 01
daṅpati juta dvaṅda dvaṅda, jagata vaṅda ḍole; ..hari 01
vanitā sura vraṅda vraṅda, nirakhata ānaṅda kaṅda, ..hari 01
gati ati svacch̄aṅda ch̄aṅda, jaya jaya bole; ..hari 01
jugalita kara jora jora, ṭhamaka ʝamaka ṭhora ṭhora, ..hari 01
vimala tāna tora ghora, morali bāje...hari 03
• ṭheṅṭheṅ baja traṅbaka ṭhora, cheṅcheṅ sharanāyi sora, ..hari 01
gheṅgheṅ baja praṉava ḍhora, gheṅgheṅ bole; ..hari 01
ʝuka ʝuka ʝuka bajata ʝaṅja, ṭuka ṭuka maṅjira raṅja, ..hari 01
ḍuka ḍuka upaṅga chaṅga, ati umaṅga ḍole; ..hari 01
dragaḍadā dragaḍadā pakhāja, thragaḍadā thai thai samāja, ..hari 01
kaḍakaḍadā kaḍakaḍadā dukaḍa, trukaṭa ghana thaṭa rāche...hari 04

title: ākarṣata chitachāra, purava uttara dvāra; ..jayajaya 01
content:
1169. ch̄aṅda charchari
• ākarṣata chitachāra, purava uttara dvāra; ..jayajaya 01
dādākhāchara darabāra, niṅbavr̥kṣa nirakho. ..jayajaya 01
haradama saṅto hajāra, jamatā jyāṅ jamaṉavāra; ..jayajaya 01
pote prabhu pirasanāra, puruṣottama parakho. ..jayajaya 01
saṅto shira kari pyāra, reḍata ghr̥ta dadhi dhāra; ..jayajaya 01
aḋbhuta lilā apāra, eha sthāna dhāro. ..jayajaya 01
jayajaya jadunātha hātha, murali dhari mugaṭa mātha; ..jayajaya 01
gaḍhapurapati gopinātha, āsharo tihāro..jayajaya 01
• kaliyugamāṅ kalpavr̥kṣa, nirakho ā niṅbavr̥kṣa; ..jayajaya 01
puruṣottamaji pratyakṣa, saṅta sabhā bharatā. ..jayajaya 01
detā brahma jñāna dāna, premijana karata pāna; ..jayajaya 01
vachanāmr̥tathi mahāna, prashna uttara karatā. ..jayajaya 01
munijana sahu dhare dhyāna, guṉijana sahu kare gāna; ..jayajaya 01
uttamanuṅ sthāna jāna, akṣara niradhāro.jayajaya 02
• puruṣottama dhari pāga, birājata lakṣmibāga; ..jayajaya 01
gāvata saṅta raṅgarāga, sāṅja samāri. ..jayajaya 01
muktānaṅdaji mahāna, premānaṅda karata gāna; ..jayajaya 01
saṅgita sāhitya jñāna, brahmamuni bhāri. ..jayajaya 01
chaṅpā jui jāi phula, ḍolara mogarā amula; ..jayajaya 01
gaherā gulāba phula hāra hajāro.jayajaya 03
• suṅdara vaiṅtāka shāka, puruṣottama karata pāka; ..jayajaya 01
hovata vāsudeva hāka, paṅkita kari pirase, ..jayajaya 01
vāḍi lakṣmi svarupa, koṭika brahmāṅḍabhupa; ..jayajaya 01
kāyama ālaya svarupa, dehotsarga darase. ..jayajaya 01
icch̄ārāma anujavira, rājata raghuvira dhira; ..jayajaya 01
brājata shriji maṅdira, purva disha pyāro.jayajaya 04
• unmatta gaṅgā abhaṅga, yamunā sarasvati gaṅga; ..jayajaya 01
tāpi narmadā saṅga, nāvata tole. ..jayajaya 01
jāmeṅ shriji rupa saṅta, nhāye munivara mahaṅta; ..jayajaya 01
tāko mahimā anaṅta, khaḏakhaḏiye khele. ..jayajaya 01
ghelā jaḏa buṅda pāya, agaṉita pātaka jalāya; ..jayajaya 01
aṅte akṣara apāya, adhamako udhāro.jayajaya 05
• khabhe jariyāni khesa, baṅsidhara gopavesha; ..jayajaya 01
vilasata rādhā vrajesha, naṅdako dulāro. ..jayajaya 01
hirā naṅga jaḍita hāra, gajarā torā apāra; ..jayajaya 01
jariyāni vastradhāra, puranachaṅdrapyāro. ..jayajaya 01
kāne kuṅḍaḏa jaḍita, bhāḏe tilaka bhaḏita; ..jayajaya 01
murati manahara lalita, snehathi saṅbhāro.jayajaya 06
• shrijiko aṅga aṅga, bhāva purṉa he abhaṅga; ..jayajaya 01
aṅtara āvata umaṅga, nirakhata jana najare. ..jayajaya 01
rājata harikr̥ṣṉa rāja, karavāne shubha kāja; ..jayajaya 01
āpyo kavirāja āja, māvadāna majare. ..jayajaya 01
chiṅtana tava charanach̄āya, aṅte akṣara apāya; ..jayajaya 01
sevakani kari sahāya, araji ura dhāro.jayajaya 07

title: sākhi rachi charmanāṅ putaḏāṅ akhaṅḍa ajoḍa abheva;
content:
1170. chāmaḍānāṅ putaḏāṅ
sākhi • rachi charmanāṅ putaḏāṅ akhaṅḍa ajoḍa abheva;
te pich̄e jivatāṅ kare te mochi muja deva- 1
ch̄apaya • chāmaḍāṅnāṅ putaḏāṅ rache ch̄e chaturāi kari, - 1
chāmaḍāṅnā baḏado ne bakarāṅ banāve ch̄e; - 1
chāmaḍāṅnā hāthi ghoḍā hajāro hajāra roja, - 1
junāṅ bhāṅgi jātāṅ jāya navāṅ nipajāve ch̄e. - 1
chāmaḍāṅni gāyo bheṅso shuddha dudha dovā de ch̄e, - 1
chāmaḍāṅnā popaṭone rāṉio paḍhāve ch̄e; - 1
kevuṅ chāmaḍāṅnuṅ kāma kidhuṅ dalapatarāma, - 1
evā mochini visheṣa bhakti mane bhāve ch̄e.- ra
• hāḍakāṅno māḏo māṅsavāḏo vaḏi rudhirāḏo, - 1
rachi kāya joḍā joḍa kema ghālyā kochine; - 1
chaturāi kari vaḏi chaḍāvyuṅ rupāḏuṅ āḏuṅ, - 1
ṭebho na jaṉāya kema ghāli āra ghoṅchine. - 1
hāle chāle hāma ghāle bhāḏe laḍe bheḏa pāḍe, - 1
prauḍha evā parvatone pāḍe ṭochi ṭochine; - 1
kevuṅ chāmaḍāṅnuṅ kāma didhuṅ dalapatarāma, - 1
māna meli moṭā deva mānuṅ ch̄uṅ te mochine.- 3
• jeni jotāṅ gāmo gāma peḍhio ch̄e ṭhāma ṭhāma, - 1
chāmaḍāṅnā dhaṅdhāvāḏo vaḍo te vepāri ch̄e; - 1
junāṅ junāṅ chāmaḍānāṅ ch̄eka churechurā kari, - 1
te churānāṅ tājā rache evi hoṅshiyāri ch̄e. - 1
moṭā moṭā loka jenāṅ mālani saṅbhāḏa rākhe, - 1
bhupatināṅ bhupa teha jenāṅ kārabāri ch̄e; - 1
kevuṅ chāmaḍānuṅ kāma kidhuṅ dalapatarāma, - 1
evā mochini visheṣa bhakti mane bhāve ch̄e.- 4
• koi kahe kāno kāḏo koi kahe e rupāḏo, - 1
koi kahe āvo ane koi kahe tevo ch̄e; - 1
koi kahe kapaṭi e koi kahe kāmaṉagāro, - 1
koi kahe mākhaṉachora te mākhaṉanāṅ jevo ch̄e. - 1
koi kahe maḏato nathi koi kahe maḏi chukyo, - 1
koi kahe kānuḍo jarura jovā jevo ch̄e; - 1
rāmabhakta jyārathi meṅ vāta jāṉi kānuḍāni, - 1
nakki karyuṅ jarura potāno kari levo ch̄e- 5
dohā-ch̄aṅda saṅgraha

title: sarasara para sadhara amaratara anusara, karakara varadhara mela kare, 01
content:
1171. ch̄aṅda : reṉaki
• sarasara para sadhara amaratara anusara, karakara varadhara mela kare, 01
harihara sura avara ach̄ara ati manahara, bharabhara ati ura harakha bhare
nirakhata nara pravara pravara gaṉa nirajara, nikaṭa mukuṭa shira savara name, 01
ghaṉarava paṭa pharara gharara pada ghughara, raṅgabhara suṅdara shyāma rame, ji re raṅga 01
• ʝaṉaṉaṉaṉaṉa ʝaṉaṉa khaṉaṉa pada ʝāṅʝara, goma ghaṉaṉa gaṉaṉaṉa gayaṉe, 01
taṉaṉa baja taṅta ṭhaṉaṉa ṭaṅkārava, raṉaṉaṉa sura dhaṉaṉaṉa rayaṉe
traṉa traha ati thraṉaṉa ghraṉaṉa baja trāṅsā, bhramaṉa bhamara tata ramaṉa bhrame,..ghaṉa 02
• ʝaṭapaṭa paṭa ulaṭa palaṭa naṭavara ʝaṭa, laṭa paṭa kaṭa ghaṭa nipaṭa lale, 01
kokaṭa ati ukaṭa trukaṭa gati ghina kaṭa, mana ḍara maṭa laṭa lapaṭa male
jamunā taṭa pragaṭa amara ara raṭa juṭa, sura thara khe khaṭa teṅṉa same,..ghaṉa 03
• ghama ghama ati ghamaka ṭhamaka pada ghughara, dhama dhama, krama sama hota dharā, 01
bhrama bhramavata viṣama parishrama vata bhrama, khama khama dama ahi viphama kharā
gamagati ati agama nigama na lahata, gama naṭavata ramaʝama gama manameṅ,..ghaṉa 04
• gata gata para ugata tugata nr̥ta priyagata, rata unamata chita vadhata rati, 01
tatapara dhrata nachata uchata mukha thaitata, āvrata ata uta bhramata ati
dhidhitata gata bajata mr̥daṅga sura udhadhata, krata bhrata nara tata ataṅta krame, ..ghaṉa 05
• thanagana tana nachata pavana prachalana thana, sumana gagana dhuna magana surā, 01
mana mana vara kr̥shra prashana dhana tana mana, dhana dhana vana dhana tāsa dharā
visare tana bhāna khāna pāna vidhi, gāna tāna jehi kāna game, ..ghaṉa 06
• ḍhala ḍhala raṅga pragala aḍhala janapara ḍhala, ʝala ʝala aṉakala teja ʝare, 01
khala khala bhuja chuḍa chapala ati khalakata, kāna katohala prabala kare
vala vala galahasta tu mala chala chita vala, jugala jugala pratiraṅga jame, ..ghaṉa 07
• saravasa vasa moha darasa surathita shashi, arasa parasa trasa charasa ati, 01
kasakasa paṭa hulasa vilasa chita ākrasa, rasatasa khusa hasa varasa rati
drasa nava rasa sarasa bhayo brahmānaṅda, anarasa manasa tarasa athame,..ghaṉa 08
rādhāramaṉadevani stuti

title: jehi nāma ādhā gayaṅda sādhā, jala agādhā aṅtare, 0 1
content:
1172. harigita ch̄aṅda
• jehi nāma ādhā gayaṅda sādhā, jala agādhā aṅtare, 0 1
jaba juḍa khādhā kari hādhā, sharaṉa lādhā anusare; 0 1
miṭa gai upādhā chena bādhā, baṅdha dādhā dhā kari, 0 1
jaya ramanarādhā mitra mādhā, harana bādhā shrihari,..jaya 1
• vasudeva dvāre deha dhāre, bhāra ṭāre bhoma ke, 0 1
sura kāja sāre saṅta tāre, dveṣi māre homa ke; 0 1
surapati haṅkāre megha vāre, vraja ugāre giradhāri,..jaya 2
• baka lina prānā shakaṭa bhānāṅ, jagatajānā jo rahe, 0 1
vraja ho tuphānāṅ vyoma tānāṅ, kaṅṭha ṭānā do rahe; 0 1
atiseṅ muṅʝānā mr̥tyu mānāṅ, kari bich̄āni shilapari,..jaya 3
• rādhā sugori vaya kishori, sāṅja bhori nisare, 0 1
taba āta dori aṅta khori, dāna chori shira dhare; 0 1
kari draga kaṭhori jori jori, bāṅha mori bala kari,..jaya 4
• naṭavara taraṅgi chāla chaṅgi, navala raṅgi nātha jyuṅ, 0 1
laṭake kalaṅgi mānataṅgi, jita jaṅgi hātha jyuṅ; 0 1
tanateṅ tribhaṅgi gopa saṅgi, triya umaṅgi ikṣari,..jaya 5
• murali bajaiyā goparaiyā, lāra gaiyā bana phire, 0 1
baladeva bhaiyā saṅga laiyā, vraja kanaiyā bichare; 0 1
bali jāta maiyā nr̥ta karaiyā, kahata thaiyā phari phari,..jaya 6
• putanā jyuṅ māri nathyo kāri, dhenu chāri pritaseṅ, 0 1
triyagopa tāri vrajabihāri, ramana nyāri ritaseṅ; 0 1
dvijadeva nāri samaja sāri, achala yāri anusari,..jaya 7
• ahi nāthyo kālā jaharavālā, rahita tālā nr̥ta kare, 0 1
viṣatoya ṭālā jiyata bālā, harikr̥pālā najjare; 0 1
gala phulamālā saṅga gvālā, bāta lālā bāṅsari,..jaya 8
• vrajake vilāsi prema pāsi, vadana hāsi maṅda jyuṅ, 0 1
judha ke adhyāsi duṣṭanāsi, jana prakāshi chaṅda jyuṅ; 0 1
rasaruparāsi nita hulāsi, araṉyavāsi triya tari,..jaya 9
• premi khajinā raṅga bhinā, tilaka dinā bhāla jyuṅ, 10
vasu kopa kinā jānadinā, rākhi linā gvāla jyuṅ
jayāke adhinā loka tinā, pravinā saravo pari,..jaya 10
• vrajanāra vāli mukta māli, nayana lāli rekhahe, 10
phani damyo kāli kari behāli, triyā utāli dekhahe
draha kina khāli pira ṭāli, charitra bhāli shrivari,..jaya 11
• vanameṅ vilāsā ho hulāsā, ramata rāsā raṅgameṅ, 10
kula daitya nāsā kari tamāsā, ati ujāsā aṅgame
muni brahma dāsā rakho pāsā, darsha āshā ura khari,..jaya 12

title: he purṉa puruṣottama prabhu, parabrahma jaya sarvopari,
content:
1173. rāga : harigita ch̄aṅda pada-1
• he purṉa puruṣottama prabhu, parabrahma jaya sarvopari,
sukhakaṅda sahajānaṅdaji, kamaniya murti mādhuri;
ch̄o vimala amr̥tadhāmavāsi, sauṅkhyarāshi shrihari,
he bhaktajana pratipāḏa rākho, sharaṉamāṅ karuṉā kari..1
• he akhila vishvādhāra tanu, sākāra tejomaya mahā,
agaṉita brahmāṅḍo uḍe, tava dhāma akṣaramāṅ ahā;
ch̄e sakala vibhuti divya shakti, āpamāṅthi utari,
he bhaktajana pratipāḏa rākho, sharaṉamāṅ karuṉā kari..2
• avatāra lai avani viṣe, saddharmani glāni same,
nijabhakta kāraṉarupa bahubahu, dhārine vicharo tame;
utthāpi muḏa adharmanāṅ, saddharma sthāpo ch̄o phari,
he bhaktajana pratipāḏa rākho, sharaṉamāṅ karuṉā kari..3
• ā samayamāṅ sāmarthya rupa guṉa, pragaṭa purṉa karyā prabhu,
bhavamāṅ bhaṭakatāṅ jivanuṅ, ajñāna ghana haravā vibhu;
saddharma bhakti jñānane, vairāgyani vr̥ṣṭi kari,
he bhaktajana pratipāḏa rākho, sharaṉamāṅ karuṉā kari..4

title: shrirāmachandra kr̥pāḏu bhaja mana, haraṉa bhavabhaya dāruṉaṅ ॥
content:
1174. stuti : harigita ch̄aṅda
• shrirāmachandra kr̥pāḏu bhaja mana, haraṉa bhavabhaya dāruṉaṅ ॥
navakaṅja -lochana kaṅja mukha kara, kaṅja pada kaṅjāruṉaṅ ॥
• kaṅdarpa agaṉita amita ch̄abi, navanila niraja suṅdaraṅ ॥
paṭapita mānahuṅ taḍita ruchi shuchi, naumi janakasutāvaraṅ ॥
• bhaja dinabaṅdhu dinesha dānava, daityavaṅsha nikaṅdanaṅ ॥
raghunaṅda ānaṅda kaṅda kaushalachaṅda, dasharatha naṅdanaṅ ॥
• shira mukuṭa kuṅḍala tilaka chāru , udāra aṅga vibhuṣaṉaṅ ॥
ājānabhuja shara-chāpa-dhara, saṅgrāma-jita kharaduṣaṉaṅ ॥
• iti vadati tulasidāsa, shaṅkara sheṣa muni-manaraṅjanaṅ ॥
mama hr̥daya-kaṅja nivāsa kuruṅ, kāmādi khala-dala gaṅjanaṅ ॥

title: bhaye pragaṭa kr̥pālā dinadayālā kaushalyā hitakāri, ॥1॥
content:
1175. ch̄aṅda : bhaye pragaṭa kr̥pālā, rā.cha.mā. - bālakāṅḍa
• bhaye pragaṭa kr̥pālā dinadayālā kaushalyā hitakāri, ॥1॥
haraṣita mahatāri muni mana hāri aḋbhuta rupa vichāri
lochana abhirāmā tanu ghanashyāmā nija āyudha bhuja chāri, ॥1॥
bhuṣana banamālā nayana bisālā shobhāsiṅdhu kharāri. ॥1॥
• kaha dui kara jori (a)stuti tori kehi bidhi karauṅ anaṅtā, ॥1॥
māyā guna gyānā tita amānā veda purāna bhanaṅtā
karunā sukhasāgara saba guna āgara jehi gāvahiṅ shruti saṅtā, ॥1॥
so mama hita lāgi jana anurāgi bhayau pragaṭa shrikaṅtā. ॥2॥
• brahmāṅḍa nikāyā nirmita māyā roma roma prati veda kahai, ॥1॥
mama ura so bāsi yaha upahāsi sunata dhira mati thira na rahai
upajā jaba gyānā prabhu musukānā charita bahuta bidha kinhi chahai, ॥1॥
kahi kathā suhāi mātu bujāi jehi prakāra suta prema lahai. ॥3॥
• mātā puni boli so mati ḍoli tajahu tāta yaha rupā, ॥1॥
kijai shishulilā ati priyasilā yaha sukha parama anupā
suni bachana sujānā rodana ṭhānā hoi bālaka surabhupā, ॥1॥
yaha charita je gāvahiṅ haripada pāvahiṅ te na parahiṅ bhavakupā. ॥4॥

title: harigita ch̄aṅda
content:
1176. divya saṅgita, shri tribhovanabhāi vyāsa
harigita ch̄aṅda
ḍhāḏa : ‘bhulo bhale bijuṅ badhuṅ...ḫ
• ā sr̥ṣṭi sahu jaḍa-chetane bharapura shi ubharāya ch̄e, ....1
tenuṅ barābara saṅchālana sarvatra niyamita thāya ch̄e. ....1
sarjana thatuṅ pālana thatuṅ ne nāsha thāto jāya ch̄e, ....1
emāṅ niraṅtara divya saṅgita shreyanuṅ saṅbhaḏāya ch̄e !....1
• vāyu vahe varasāda varase sāgaro garjana kare, ....1
vidyuta kare chamakāra pāvaka bhasma karato paravare. ....1
shashi surya tārā-tejanā abhiṣeka avirata thāya ch̄e, ....1
emāṅ niraṅtara divya saṅgita shreyanuṅ saṅbhaḏāya ch̄e !....2
• ubhā himāchala ādi girivara gaṅga shi saritā vahe, ....1
pashu paṅkhigaṉathi dhvani nitanita saghana vana gāji rahe. ....1
saṅdhyā uṣānā svāṅga manahara nita navā badalāya ch̄e, ....1
emāṅ niraṅtara divya saṅgita shreyanuṅ saṅbhaḏāya ch̄e !....3
• ch̄o karmayogi, sāṅkhyayogi, jñāni ke dhyāni hashe, ....1
saṅsāranāṅ sukha duḥkhayoge tr̥pta ke saṅtapta e. ....1
paṉa e sakaḏa parameshani icch̄ā taṉo samavāya ch̄e, ....1
emāṅ niraṅtara divya saṅgita shreyanuṅ saṅbhaḏāya ch̄e !....4

title: harigita ch̄aṅda
content:
1177. shakti sahajānaṅdani, shri tribhovanabhāi vyāsa
harigita ch̄aṅda
ḍhāḏa : ‘bhulo bhale bijuṅ badhuṅ...ḫ
• paththara mahiṅ khaḍako mahiṅ jaḏadhodha masta taraṅgamāṅ, ....1
siṅdhu taṉāṅ ghughavāṭamāṅye shakti sahajānaṅdani. ...1
• vaḏi chaṅdramāṅ ādityamāṅ saṅdhyā taṉā navaraṅgamāṅ, ....1
ʝaraṉāṅ taṉāṅ mr̥du hāsyamāṅye shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 2
• ghānaghora vādaḏa vyomamāṅ gaṅbhira garaje megha jyāṅ, ....1
vidyutanā chamakāramāṅye shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 3
• jaḏa pavana pāvaka pr̥thvimāṅ baḏamāṅ gatimāṅ tattvamāṅ, ....1
brahmāṅḍamāṅ chokhuṅṭa vyāpi shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 4
• nirjana araṉye vastimāṅ giri guhā vikaṭa khiṉamāṅ, ....1
ā hr̥daya mama dhaḍaki rahyuṅ tyāṅ shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 5
• ā sr̥ṣṭinā sauṅdaryamāṅ sahu prāṉionā prāṉamāṅ, ....1
vr̥ṣṭithi khili sr̥ṣṭimāṅye shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 6
• manabuddhi jyāṅ pahoṅche nahi vāṉi grahe jyāṅ mauna tyāṅ,
....1
ānaṅda sacchiḋ jyāṅ bhayo tyāṅ shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 7
• kālindri taṭa ramaṉiya sthaḏa jyāṅ kr̥ṣṉamaya gopi bani, ....1
murali dhuni gāji rahi tyāṅ shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 8
• jyāṅ shiva-dhanuṣa khaṅḍana karyuṅ dashakaṅdha churṉa karyo jahāṅ, ....1
parashu paḍyā jyāṅ pāya tyāṅye shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 9
• brahmāṅḍa koṭi asaṅkhyamāṅ paramāṉumāṅ paramāṉumāṅ, ....1
niḥsima kālaniyaṅtraṉāmāṅ shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 10
• mana indriyone buddhi ātmā jyāṅ dhase tyāṅ te rame, ....11
sarvatra bhuvanomāṅ bhari ch̄e shakti sahajānaṅdani. ... 11

title: vidyā maḏe vasudhā maḏe, vidhavidha bahu vaibhava maḏe, ....1
content:
1178. vidyā maḏe vasudhā maḏe..
• vidyā maḏe vasudhā maḏe, vidhavidha bahu vaibhava maḏe, ....1
adhikārani padavi maḏe, vaḏi mānitā mānava maḏe; ....1
kāyā ruḍi jāyā maḏe, māyā ghaṉi ja vishāḏa ch̄e, ....1
paṉa sajjanatā nahi eka to e, vātamāṅ sho māla ch̄e ?....1
• mukha chaṅdra sarakhuṅ ramya ch̄e, gorā gulābi gāla ch̄e,
....1
vaḏi nāka namaṉuṅ nayana suṅdara, haṅsa sarakhi chāla ch̄e; ....1
phakkaḍa suṅvāḏā vāṅkaḍā shira, pheshanebala bāla ch̄e, ....1
chāritramāṅ nahiṅ ḍhaṅga to e, vātamāṅ sho māla ch̄e ?....2
• ḍahāpaṉa ghaṉuṅ anubhava ghaṉo, mukhamāṅ bhari ch̄e mādhuri, ....1
saujanya darshanani atishaya, āvaḍe ch̄e chāturi; ....1
chāritrya para sevā ane, dhārmikapaṉāni ḍhāla ch̄e, ....1
bhiṅtara bharyo jo daṅbha to e, vātamāṅ sho māla ch̄e ?....3

title: bhaṭa veda paḍhaṅdā saṅdhyā vaṅdā, karma na phaṅdā uraʝaṅdā, ..saḋ...1
content:
1179. bhaṭa veda paḍhaṅdā... (ch̄aṅda - tribhaṅgi)
• bhaṭa veda paḍhaṅdā saṅdhyā vaṅdā, karma na phaṅdā uraʝaṅdā, ..saḋ...1
omakāra japaṅdā munya rahaṅdā, aṅtaramaṅdā muraʝaṅdā; ..saḋ...1
puni kathā kahaṅdā loka ṭhagaṅdā, vikaḏa phiraṅdā varataṅdā, ..saḋ...1
saḋguru kā baṅdā brahmānaṅdā sācha kahaṅdā sabahaṅdā..saḋ...1
• aru phakirā pharatā kalamā bharatā, aṅtara jaratā nahi ṭharatā, ..saḋ...1
jivana kuṅ maratā shaṅka na dharatā, jyuṅ hara karatā nahi ḍaratā; ..saḋ...1
bolata barabaratā kaṅṭha hukaratā, pach̄ima dharatā ghumaṅdā..saḋ...2
• ākhata arihaṅtā jaṅtā jaṅtā, karma kathaṅtā bharamaṅtā, ..saḋ...1
viṣaye varataṅtā kaṅchana kāṅtā, aṅtara shāṅtā nahi aṅtā; ..saḋ...1
aru karma karaṅtā nahi ḍarapaṅtā, nahi bhagavaṅtā ucharaṅdā..saḋ..3
• kahāvata vairāgi lubadhā lāgi, aṅtara āgi triyarāgi, ..saḋ...1
jvālā viṣa jāgi māyā pāgi, akala vekāgi nirabhāgi; ..saḋ...1
bāṅdhata ghara bāgi lajjā tyāgi, dhana aru ḍhāṅgi dhāraṅdā..saḋ...4
• bhakti ke bhagalā bāta na phagalā, aṅtara dagalā viṣa ḍhagalā, ..saḋ...1
dekhata ṭagaṭagalā ḍolata nagalā, thiraṭhava pagalā jaga ṭhagalā; ..saḋ...1
bāhara gati bagalā aṅtara kagalā, vākā saṅgalā ch̄āḍaṅdā..saḋ...5
• gala dhārata mālā aṅtara kālā, viṣe bihālā chitta chālā, ..saḋ...1
majabuta masālā trapata rasālā, ṭhākura thālā paṅḍapālā; ..saḋ...1
mana krodha karālā jarata jaṅjālā, aṅtara ṭhālā muraʝaṅdā..saḋ...6
• vairāgāṅ ʝaṅḍi dekhata bhaṅḍi, ātama-khaṅḍi karmakaṅḍi, ..saḋ...1
ura jaḍatā uṅḍi mamatā maṅḍi, ṭilā ṭuṅḍi pākhaṅḍi; ..saḋ...1
rākhata ghara raṅḍi saba vidhi ch̄aṅḍi, patharā piṅḍi pujaṅdā..saḋ...7
• nāvata jala nikā dhārata ṭikā, gala kaṅṭhi kā tulasi kā, ..saḋ...1
aru miṭhā jiha kā kapaṭi hiya kā, nāhina ṭhikā muraghi kā; ..saḋ...1
bānā haraji kā vikala bili kā, kiṅkara triya kā viṣakaṅdā..saḋ...8
• bhekhana ke dhāri saba meṅ khvāri, aṅtara bhāri ahaṅkāri, ..saḋ...1
bolata mukha gāri rākhata nāri, māyā yāri vyāpāri; ..saḋ...1
jaba maṅgalakāri, guru milyāri, bhramanā ṭāri jagaphaṅdā..saḋ...9

title: shri harililāmr̥taṁ : kaḏasha-2, vishrāma-8
content:
1180. tribhaṅgi ch̄aṅda
shri harililāmr̥taṁ : kaḏasha-2, vishrāma-8
• jaya nātha niraṅjana khalabala gaṅjana, janabhaya bhaṅjana bhagavaṅtā, ...1
jaya jaya sukhadhāmā nirmala nāmā, shri ghanashyāma shobhaṅtā; ...1
jaya jaya vr̥ṣalālā mauktikamālā, kr̥ṣṉakr̥pālā sukhakāri, ...1
jaya naratanudhāri vishvavihāri, aja avikāri asurāri...1
• jaya jaya mahārājā garibanivājā, saṅta samājā pada seve, ...1
tava guṉa ura dhāri shrutiākāri, kirti uchāri aja jeve; ...1
ā asurapramattā kāḏiyadattā, iti nijasattā vistāri, ...1
jaya naratanudhāri vishvavihāri, aja avikāri asurāri...2
• rāvaṉa raṉa roḏyo chāṉura choḏyo, girivara toḏyo nātha tame, ...1
tethi paṉa bhāri piḍā amāri, shyāma vidāri āja same; ...1
madhu māṅsāhāri kr̥tyakāri, hato surāri duḥkha kāri, ...1
jaya naratanudhāri vishvavihāri, aja avikāri asurāri...3
• iṅdrādika devā kahiye kevā, aja bhava jevā bhaya rākhe, ...1
evo mahāpāpi prauḍhapratāpi, maṅtro jāpi baḏa bhākhe; ...1
kara shastra na dhāri āpa aghāri, didho vidāri bhaya bhāri, ...1
jaya naratanudhāri vishvavihāri, aja avikāri asurāri...4
• sau tirtha pharine charaṉa dharine, shuddha karine sukha āpo, ...1
asuroni ṭoḏi kṣitimāṅ khoḏi, raṉamāṅ roḏi duḥkha kāpo; ...1
shrutimārga batāvo, jana samajāvo, dhāma rachāvo mana dhāri, ...1
jaya naratanudhāri vishvavihāri, aja avikāri asurāri...5

title: suṅdara ch̄abi pyāri tribhuvana nyāri, anaṅta apāri upakāri, ...1
content:
1181. tribhaṅgi ch̄aṅda
• suṅdara ch̄abi pyāri tribhuvana nyāri, anaṅta apāri upakāri, ...1
agaṉita naranāri sharaṉa ugāri, bhavaduḥkhavāri utāri; ...1
shikhavata buddhi sāri viṣayavisāri, raṭata ucchāri tripurāri, ...1
jayahari vrata dhāri janaduḥkhahāri, ati sukhakāri avatāri...1
• nija jana sukha dātā sabajagatrātā, rahata vidhātā guṉa gātā, ...1
samarata sukhashātā vimala vikhyātā, bhaktimātā dharmatātā; ...1
ratipati mada hātā raṅga nija rātā, dhyāna lagātā kāmāri, ...1
jaya hari vrata dhāri jana duḥkhahāri, ati sukhakāri, avatāri...2
• sukha saṅpata dariyā, ati raṅga bhariyā, pada chitta dhariyā uddhariyā, ...1
kali satajula kariyā, bhavaduḥkhahariyā, janamanaṭhariyā kramajariyā; ...1
saba taji anusariyā soi ugariyā, viṣaya visariyā saṅsāri, ...1
jayahari vrata dhāri janaduḥkhahāri, ati sukhakāri, avatāri...3
• naṭavara navaraṅgi chalata tribhaṅgi, lalita kalaṅgi shira chaṅgi, ...1
tanulahara taraṅgi prema prasaṅgi, achala abhaṅgi umaṅgi; ...1
kalijana kusaṅgi kiya satasaṅgi, munibrahmaraṅgi balihāri, ...1
jayahari vrata dhāri janaduḥkhahāri, ati sukhakāri avatāri...4

title: rāga : dhoḏa
sāha bhayo umarāha bhayo, patasāha bhayo jagashiṣa nayo hai
content:
1183. ghanashyāmāṣṭaka - savaiyā
• sāha bhayo umarāha bhayo, patasāha bhayo jagashiṣa nayo hai
rāgi bhayo baḍabhāgi bhayo, vitarāgi bhayo vana jāya rahyo hai
māni bhayo niramāni bhayo, paramāni bhayo jasavāsa layo hai
brahmamuni ghanashyāma ko āshraya, jo na bhayo to kach̄u na bhayo hai. 1
• nāri mili phulavāri mili, ju aṭāri mili mahiṅ kācha ḍhalyo hai
puta mile ghara suta mile, bahu duta mile nija bena palyo hai
khāna mile aru pāna mile, sanamāna mile kahuṅ bhāgya khulyo hai
brahmamuni ghanashyāma ko āshraya, jo na bhayo to kach̄u na bhayo hai. 2
• bhoga liyo ru udyoga liyo tana, joga liyo bina roga jiyo hai
jāna liyo kahu tāna liyo, bahu dāna liyo gajarāja kiyo hai
bāja liyo gajarāja liyo, saba sāja liyo jasa gāja rahyo hai
brahmamuni ghanashyāma ko āshraya, jo na bhayo to kach̄u na bhayo hai. 3
• tyāgi banyo anurāgi banyo, baḍabhāgi banyo arisena hanyo hai
sura banyo magarura banyo, dhanapura banyo chakachura sunyo hai
tāli banyo aru khyāli banyo, sukhapāli banyo baḍabhāli ganyo hai
brahmamuni ghanashyāma ko āshraya, jo na bhayo to kach̄u na bhayo hai. 4
• dhāma kiyo kahuṅ kāma kiyo, jaga nāma kiyo jasa vyāpa rahyo hai
dāna kiyo sanamāna kiyo, abhimāna kiyo karake jukiya hai
dāva kiyo kahu bhāva kiyo, ṭhaharāva kiyo kahuṅ rāja liyo hai
brahmamuni ghanashyāma ko āshraya, jo na bhayo to kach̄u na bhayo hai. 5
• gita paḍhyo jagarita paḍhyo, nr̥pa nita paḍhyo tana raṅga chaḍhyo hai
bhāsa paḍhyo anuprāsa paḍhyo, rasa rāsaru nyāya prakāsha draḍhyo hai
keda paḍhyo bahu bheda paḍhyo, saba veda paḍhyo paḍhi māna baḍhyo hai
brahmamuni ghanashyāma ko āshraya, jo na bhayo to kach̄u na bhayo hai. 6
• desha gayo paradesha gayo, ghara bheṣa gayo chahu dhāma rahyo hai
kāshi gayo aru nāshi gayo, tana ghāsi gayo ati paṅtha bhayo hai
shoka gayo suraloka gayo, vidhi loka mana roka ṭhyo hai
brahmamuni ghanashyāma ko āshraya, jo na bhayo to kach̄u na bhayo hai. 7
• jāga karyo punya bhāga karyo, saba tyāga karyo kahuṅ na rāga dharyo hai;
nyāsa karyo upavāsa karyo, vanavāsa karyo tahāṅ pyāsa maryo hai;
jāpa karyo sura thāpa karyo, su vilāpa karyo tana tāpa paryo hai;
brahmamuni ghanashyāma ko āshraya, jo na bhayo to kach̄u na bhayo hai. 8

title: rāja bhayo kahā kāja saryo, mahārāja bhayo kahā lāja baḍhāi, 1
content:
1184. ch̄aṅda - prakirṉa
• rāja bhayo kahā kāja saryo, mahārāja bhayo kahā lāja baḍhāi, 1
sāha bhayo kahā bāta baḍi, patasāha bhayo kahā āna phirāi
deva bhayo tou kāha bhayo, ahameva baḍho tr̥ṣṉā adhikāra, 1
brahmamuni satsaṅga vinā, saba aura bhayo to kahā bhayo bhāi. 1
• shri ghanashyāma kahe suna nārada, aṅtara shuddha mero mata aihe, 1
mo saṅga pyāra udāra sadā mana, nāma ucchāra ahonisha laihe
saṅta sacche jagamāṅhi phire, tilakuṅ duḥkha āya niraṅtara daihe, 1
brahmamuni bhagavaṅta kahe soya, moya bhajana puni narkameṅ jaihe. 2
• nāma baḍe dhana dhāma baḍe, jagamāṅhi baḍi kirti pragaṭi hai, 1
buddhi baḍi chaturāi baḍi, aru lāvaṉatā tanameṅ lapaṭi hai
dvāra hajārana loka khaḍe riddhi, indrahuṅ te nahi eka ghaṭi hai, 1
tulasi raghuvira ki bhakti binā, jyuṅ suṅdara nāri nāka kaṭi hai. 3
• tārāke teja meṅ chaṅdra ch̄upe nahi, surya ch̄upe nahi bādala ch̄āyo, 1
raṉa chaḍyo rajaputa ch̄upe nahiṅ, dātā ch̄upe nahiṅ māgana āyo
chaṅchala nāriko naina ch̄upe nahiṅ, prita ch̄upe nahiṅ piṭha dekhāyo, 1
kavi gaṅga kahe suna shāha akabara, karma ch̄upe nahiṅ bhabhuta lagāyo. 4
• māta kahe mero puta saputa ke, beni kahe mero suṅdara bhaiyā, 1
tāta kahe mero he kuladipaka, lokameṅ lāja adhika baḍhaiyā
nari kahe mero prānapati, jinake jāke meṅ leu balaiyā, 1
kavi gaṅga kahe suno shāha akabara, jinake gāṅṭha sapheda rupaiyā. 5
• rati bina rāja rati bina pāṭa, rati bina ch̄atra nahiṅ eka ṭiko, 1
rati bina sādhu rati bina saṅta, rati bina joga na hoya jatiko
rati bina māta rati bina tāta, rati bina mānasa lāgata phiko, 1
kavi gaṅga kahe suna shāha akabara, nara eka rati bina eka ratiko. 6
• māta mile puni tāta mile, surabhrāta mile juvati sukhadāi, 1
rāja mile gaja bāja mile, saba sāja mile mana vācch̄ita pāi
loka mile paraloka mile, vidhi loka mile vaikuṅṭha hi jāi, 1
suṅdara ora mile sabahi sukha, saṅta samāgama durlabha bhāi. 7

title: ghora kalikālanā dora ch̄uṭyā, ane duṣṭatānuṅ badhe jora vyāpyuṅ; -dhanya1
content:
1185. dharmadhvaja ch̄aṅdo, shri tribhovanabhāi vyāsa
• ghora kalikālanā dora ch̄uṭyā, ane duṣṭatānuṅ badhe jora vyāpyuṅ; -dhanya1
bhakti saddharmanā mārga ruṅdhi didhā, karma niṣkāmanuṅ muḏa kāpyuṅ; -dhanya1
veda satshāstranā artha avaḏā karyāṅ, paṅḍite pāpa mārge jaine; -dhanya1
dhanya ho dharmadhvaja ropiyo e same, shri svāminārāyaṉe pragaṭa thaine-dhanya1
• dharmaguruo taji dharmanāṅ ācharaṉa, pāpani vr̥ttio poṣatāḫtā; -dhanya1
praṉata naranārināṅ shila ne shiyaḏane, bhraṣṭa kari shiṣyane shoṣatāḫtā; -dhanya1
kaṣṭa bahu pāmatāṅ daivi jivo sahu, āsurini upādhi sahine,-dhanya2
• indriyārāmanā dhāma dhiṅgā banyāṅ, ātmalakṣi ati kaṣṭa pāmyāṅ; -dhanya1
raja tame ghora ghamasāṉa māṅḍyāṅ are ! sattvanāṅ tattva to sau uthāmyāṅ; -dhanya1
tyāga māṅ rāganā vividha raṅgo chaḍyā, yajña ne yāgani oṭa laine;-dhanya3
• tapa tapasvi bhulyāṅ vyasana vamaḏe ḍubyāṅ, dāma ne vāmamāṅ nitya ramatā; -dhanya1
kāma ne krodha mada moha dveṣe bharyā, lobha ne lālache bhraṣṭa bhamatā; -dhanya1
maṅtra ne taṅtramāṅ lokane guṅchavyā, vhemi upadesha avaḏā daine;-dhanya4
• jogi jati jaṅgamo vividha veshe phari, dharmanā nāmathi dhutatāḫtāṅ; -dhanya1
tapāsi khākhi aḍabaṅganā ʝuṅḍa to, trāsa detāṅ nahi chuktāḫtāṅ; -dhanya1
uparathi sādhutā bhiṅtaramāṅ bhraṣṭatā, kaika pharatā gurudeva thaine;-dhanya5
• maṅtra muṭha choṭa ne kāmaṉo ṭumaṉo, deva dugarāṅ bhuvā ne bharāḍi; -dhanya1
bhuta ne palita jina ḍākiṉi shākiṉi, piḍatāḫtāṅ prajāne anāḍi; -dhanya1
ṭhaga dhutārā ane jādu kimiyāgarā, ḍāratā lokane pedhi jaine,-dhanya6
• dāru ne māṅsa chori vyabhichāra ch̄aḏa, dyutani chaḍi hati khuba bharati; -dhanya1
bhāṅga gāṅjā taṉi chalama bahu phuṅkati, sādhuḍāni ghaṉi phoja pharati; -dhanya1
bhāna bhuli hati dharma ne karmanuṅ, āryajanatā adharme vahine;-dhanya7

title: aṣāḍha ucchāraṅ megha malāraṅ, bani bahāraṁ jaladhāraṁ, ...1
content:
1186. sākhi : ch̄aṅda
• aṣāḍha ucchāraṅ megha malāraṅ, bani bahāraṁ jaladhāraṁ, ...1
dādura ḍukāraṅ mayura pukāraṅ, taḍitā tāraṅma vistāraṁ; ...1
nāma lahi sabhāraṅ pyāsa apāraṅ, naṅda kumārama nirakhyāri, ...1
kahe rādhe pyāri mai balihāri, gokula āvo giradhāri...1
• kaṅkuṅ māṅsakāti tiyaṅ madhamāti, dipajalāti raṅgarāti, ...1
maṅdire mahelāti sabe suhāti, meharapāti ʝuʝakāti; ...1
biraha jala jāti, niṅda na āti morāri, ...1
kahe rādhe pyāri meṅ balihāri, gokula āvo giradhāri...2
• shrāvaṉa jaba barase suṅdara sara se, bādala barase aṅbara se, ...1
taruvara bhi barase lajjā baharase, nadiyā barase sāgara se; ...1
daṅpati duḥkha harashe lajjā, lajjā lahara se sukhakāri, ...1
-dhanya1 kahe rādhe pyāri mai balihāri, gokula āvo giradhāra...3

title: gaḍhapura dhāma sohāmaṉu, jyāṅ birāje gopinātha;
ehi macch̄a ehi kacch̄a, ehi shukara tanu dhāryo;
shripatiṅ shridharaṅ sarvadeveshvaraṅ bhaktidharmātmajaṅ vāsudevaṅ hariṅ ॥
content:
1189. shripatiṅ
shripatiṅ shridharaṅ sarvadeveshvaraṅ bhaktidharmātmajaṅ vāsudevaṅ hariṅ ॥
mādhavamaṅ keshavaṅ kāmadaṅ kāraṉaṅ shrisvāminārāyaṉaṅ nilakaṅṭhaṅ bhaje ॥
